text: Ideally we would have increased tail mass and reduced pectoral limb mass but , unfortunately , this is not experimentally feasible .
label: advmod nsubj aux root amod compound obj cc conj amod compound obj cc punct advmod punct nsubj cop advmod advmod conj punct

text: We argue that our experimental approach , although not perfect , was effective in displacing the CoM and recreating locomotor patterns expected in non-avian theropods .
label: nsubj root mark nmod amod nsubj punct mark advmod advcl punct cop ccomp mark advcl det obj cc conj compound obj acl case amod obl punct

text: Thus , we expect that careful phenotypic manipulation of extant birds can open new avenues of experimental investigation into unexplored facets of dinosaur locomotor mechanics and energetics , providing a more nuanced understanding of the relationship between form and function in dinosaur evolution .
label: advmod punct nsubj root mark amod amod nsubj case amod nmod aux ccomp amod obj case amod nmod case amod nmod case compound compound nmod cc conj punct advcl det advmod amod obj case det nmod case nmod cc conj case compound nmod punct

text: Re(a)d Wedding :
label: amod root punct

text: A Comparative Discourse Analysis of Fan Responses to Game of Thrones
label: det amod compound root case compound nmod case nmod case nmod

text: It is no exaggeration to say that HBO ’s Game of Thrones is more than just a television series or a successful brand :
label: expl cop det root mark csubj mark nmod case nsubj case nmod cop ccomp case advmod det compound obl cc det amod conj punct

text: it is a transmedia system in the sense first used by Marsha Kinder ( 1991 ) and popularized by Henry Jenkins ( 2006 ) , in which media - hopping networks of intertextualities extend the “ storyworld ” of an original production .
label: nsubj cop det compound root case det nmod advmod acl case obl flat punct nmod punct cc conj case obl flat punct nmod punct punct case obl compound punct amod nsubj case nmod acl det punct obj punct case det amod nmod punct

text: Now spanning six seasons and 60 episodes , with an average global viewership ( from its most recent season ) of 25.1 million viewers per episode ( Shepherd , 2016 ) , it has spawned five video games , a graphic novel adaptation , several companion books , two rap albums , a 28 - city orchestral tour , a wide variety of tabletop games , toys , merchandise and mobile apps , and countless podcasts , fanfics and other fan - based creations .
label: advmod advcl nummod obj cc nummod conj punct case det amod amod obl punct case nmod advmod amod nmod punct case compound nummod nmod case nmod punct dep punct nmod punct punct nsubj aux root nummod compound obj punct det amod compound conj punct amod compound conj punct nummod compound conj punct det nummod punct compound amod conj punct det amod conj case compound nmod punct conj punct conj cc amod conj punct cc amod conj punct conj cc amod compound punct amod conj punct

text: Given the volume of content this represents , it is easy to forget that the television series itself is an adaptation of a book series with a pre-existing fandom .
label: case det advcl case nmod nsubj acl punct expl cop root mark csubj mark det compound nsubj nmod cop det ccomp case det compound nmod case det amod nmod punct

text: As such , the Game of Thrones storyworld represents a remarkably rich and challenging environment for fans old and new , who must negotiate an increasingly complex network of paratexts and intertexts in order to fully engage with its narratives .
label: case obl punct det compound case nmod nsubj root det advmod amod cc conj obj case nmod amod cc conj punct nsubj aux acl det advmod amod obj case nmod cc conj mark fixed mark advmod advcl case nmod obl punct

text: In this sense , fans of the series represent an emerging model for cultural consumption that should be carefully explored .
label: case det obl punct nsubj case det nmod root det amod obj case amod nmod obj aux aux advmod acl punct

text: Transmedia systems , like that exemplified by Game of Thrones , are becoming increasingly prevalent ( e.g. , Star Wars , Harry Potter , The Walking Dead , the Marvel Cinematic Universe , etc ) ; these systems demonstrate , in microcosm , the global challenge of managing the fire - hose flow of information in contemporary postdigital society .
label: compound nsubj punct case nmod acl case obl case nmod punct aux root advmod xcomp punct advmod punct compound parataxis punct conj flat punct det amod conj punct det compound amod conj punct conj punct punct det nsubj parataxis punct case obl punct det amod obj mark acl det compound punct compound obj case nmod case amod amod nmod punct

text: The study of how people , as fans , access and manage information within a transmedia system provides valuable insight that contributes not only to practitioners and scholars of the media industry , but to the wider context of cultural studies , by offering findings on this new model of the fan as consumer and information - user .
label: det nsubj case nmod nsubj punct case nmod punct advcl cc conj obj case det compound obl root amod obj nsubj acl advmod advmod case obl cc conj case det compound nmod punct cc case det amod conj case amod nmod punct mark advcl obj case det amod nmod case det nmod case nmod cc compound punct conj punct

text: For us , as digital humanists , defining the “ transmedia fan ” is of particular relevance as we seek to understand contemporary social and cultural transformations engendered by digital technologies .
label: case obl punct case amod nmod punct csubj det punct compound obj punct cop case amod root mark nsubj advcl mark xcomp amod amod cc conj obj acl case amod obl punct

text: Methodology
label: root

text: As a first step in defining the “ transmedia fan ” , the current project undertakes a comparative discourse analysis of online conversations of Game of Thrones fans .
label: case det amod obl mark acl det punct compound obj punct punct det amod nsubj root det amod compound obj case amod nmod case compound case nmod nmod punct

text: One of the most dramatic plot developments in the source material ( Martin , 2000 ) was adapted to the screen in the penultimate episode of the third season , “ The Rains of Castamere ” ( Benioff & Weiss , 2013 ) .
label: nsubj case det advmod amod compound nmod case det compound nmod punct dep punct nmod punct aux root case det obl case det amod obl case det amod nmod punct punct det appos case nmod punct punct dep cc conj punct nmod punct punct

text: Readers of the book series had long anticipated and dreaded the events of the “ Red Wedding ” , while fans of the show unfamiliar with Martin ’s narrative were largely taken unawares by the pivotal episode .
label: nsubj case det compound nmod aux advmod root cc conj det obj case det punct amod nmod punct punct mark nsubj case det nmod amod case nmod case obl aux advmod advcl advmod case det amod obl punct

text: Since the television series ’ inception , writers at The AV Club have written two critical reviews for each episode :
label: case det compound nmod case obl punct nsubj case det compound nmod aux root nummod amod obj case det nmod punct

text: one for viewers familiar with the books ( i.e. , “ Experts ” ) and one for viewers unfamiliar with the books and averse to “ spoilers ” ( i.e. , “ Newbies ” ) .
label: root case nmod amod case det obl punct advmod punct punct appos punct punct cc conj case nmod amod case det obl cc conj case punct obl punct punct advmod punct punct appos punct punct punct

text: What results are two completely separate reviews of “ The Rains of Castamere ” which in turn document the fans ’ reactions to the episode in the form of user comment threads :
label: nsubj acl cop nummod advmod amod root case punct det nmod case nmod punct nsubj case obl acl det nmod case obj case det nmod case det obl case compound compound nmod punct

text: one comment thread where fans were expected to be shocked by the outcome of the episode and one comment thread where fans had hotly anticipated it .
label: nummod compound root advmod nsubj aux acl mark aux xcomp case det obl case det nmod cc nummod compound conj advmod nsubj aux advmod acl obj punct

text: As a pilot project , the current work takes the content of both comment threads — a corpus of approximately 5,600 comments — and analyzes each thread separately using a qualitative coding method aligned with constructivist grounded theory ( Charmaz , 2006 ) .
label: case det compound obl punct det amod nsubj root det obj case det compound nmod punct det appos case advmod nummod nmod punct cc conj det obj advmod advcl det amod compound obj acl case amod amod obl punct dep punct nmod punct punct

text: Through this analysis , a categorization of themes emerges illustrating tactics for negotiating intertexts and paratexts unique to each group of fans .
label: case det obl punct det nsubj case nmod root advcl obj mark acl obj cc conj amod case det obl case nmod punct

text: These themes fall under two broad categories :
label: det nsubj root case nummod amod obl punct

text: negotiation ( i.e. , emotional responses ) and tactical negotiation ( i.e. , cognitive , or reasoned responses ) .
label: root punct advmod punct amod appos punct cc amod conj punct advmod punct amod punct cc conj appos punct punct

text: A comparison of categories and sub-categories between both groups provides preliminary findings to support an emergent model , or models , of the “ transmedia fan ” .
label: det nsubj case nmod cc conj case det nmod root amod obj mark acl det amod obj punct cc conj punct case det punct compound nmod punct punct

text: Conclusion
label: root

text: The present research represents a first step in exploring the impact of transmedia systems , as exemplified by Game of Thrones , through the study of fans .
label: det amod nsubj root det amod obj mark acl det obj case compound nmod punct mark acl case obl case nmod punct case det obl case nmod punct

text: The question posed by this research is , fundamentally , an examination of how the problem of “ access ” is framed in postdigital society from the perspective of the consumer .
label: det nsubj acl case det obl cop punct advmod punct det root case nmod det nsubj case punct nmod punct aux advcl case amod obl case det obl case det nmod punct

text: Future research should explore the negotiation tactics observed in transmedia fans using the principles of De Certeau ’s ( 1984 ) everyday life practice , in order to extend its application to the broader context of modern - day consumers .
label: amod nsubj aux root det compound obj acl case compound obl xcomp det obj case nmod flat case punct nmod punct amod compound nmod punct mark fixed mark advcl nmod obj case det amod obl case amod punct compound nmod punct

text: The current study will contribute to the development of further qualitative and quantitative research that will more clearly define the information behaviors of the transmedia fan .
label: det amod nsubj aux root case det obl case amod amod cc conj nmod nsubj aux advmod advmod acl det compound obj case det compound nmod punct

text: This project is of relevance to researchers in media studies , fan studies , information studies and digital humanities .
label: det nsubj cop case root case nmod case compound nmod punct compound conj punct compound conj cc amod conj punct

text: Daniel Bernoulli
label: root flat

text: Daniel Bernoulli FRS ( German pronunciation : [ bɛʁˈnʊli ] ; 8 February 1700 – 17 March 1782 ) was a Swiss mathematician and physicist and was one of the many prominent mathematicians in the Bernoulli family .
label: nsubj flat appos punct amod dep punct punct parataxis punct punct parataxis compound nmod case nmod compound nmod punct cop det amod root cc conj cc cop conj case det amod amod nmod case det compound nmod punct

text: He is particularly remembered for his applications of mathematics to mechanics , especially fluid mechanics , and for his pioneering work in probability and statistics .
label: nsubj aux advmod root case nmod obl case nmod case nmod punct advmod compound parataxis punct cc case nmod amod conj case nmod cc conj punct

text: His name is commemorated in the Bernoulli 's principle , a particular example of the conservation of energy , which describes the mathematics of the mechanism underlying the operation of two important technologies of the 20th century : the carburetor and the airplane wing .
label: nmod nsubj aux root case det nmod case obl punct det amod appos case det nmod case nmod punct nsubj acl det obj case det nmod acl det obj case nummod amod nmod case det amod nmod punct det appos cc det compound conj punct

text: Daniel Bernoulli
label: root flat

text: Early life
label: amod root

text: Frontpage of Hydrodynamica ( 1738 )
label: root case nmod punct nmod punct

text: Daniel Bernoulli was born in Groningen , in the Netherlands , into a family of distinguished mathematicians .
label: nsubj flat aux root case obl punct case det nmod punct case det obl case amod nmod punct

text: The Bernoulli family came originally from Antwerp , at that time in the Spanish Netherlands , but emigrated to escape the Spanish persecution of the Huguenots .
label: det compound nsubj root advmod case obl punct case det nmod case det amod nmod punct cc conj mark advcl det amod obj case det nmod punct

text: After a brief period in Frankfurt the family moved to Basel , in Switzerland .
label: case det amod obl case nmod det nsubj root case obl punct case nmod punct

text: Daniel was a son of Johann Bernoulli ( one of the " early developers " of calculus ) and a nephew of Jacob Bernoulli ( who " was the first to discover the theory of probability " ) .
label: nsubj cop det root case nmod flat punct appos case det punct amod nmod punct case nmod punct cc det conj case nmod flat punct nsubj punct cop det acl mark acl det obj case nmod punct punct punct

text: He had two brothers , Niklaus and Johann II .
label: nsubj root nummod obj punct appos cc conj dep punct

text: Daniel Bernoulli was described by W. W. Rouse Ball as " by far the ablest of the younger Bernoullis " .
label: nsubj flat aux root case obl flat flat flat case punct case obl det obl case det amod obl punct punct

text: He is said to have had a bad relationship with his father .
label: nsubj aux root mark aux xcomp det amod obj case nmod nmod punct

text: Upon both of them entering and tying for first place in a scientific contest at the University of Paris , Johann , unable to bear the " shame " of being compared Daniel 's equal , banned Daniel from his house .
label: mark nsubj case nmod advcl cc conj case amod obl case det amod obl case det nmod case nmod punct nsubj punct acl mark xcomp det punct obj punct mark aux acl nmod case xcomp punct root obj case nmod obl punct

text: Johann Bernoulli also plagiarized some key ideas from Daniel 's book Hydrodynamica in his own book Hydraulica which he backdated to before Hydrodynamica .
label: nsubj flat advmod root det amod obj case nmod case obl appos case nmod amod obl appos obj nsubj acl mark case advcl punct

text: Despite Daniel 's attempts at reconciliation , his father carried the grudge until his death .
label: case nmod case obl case nmod punct nmod nsubj root det obj case nmod obl punct

text: Around schooling age , his father , Johann , encouraged him to study business , there being poor rewards awaiting a mathematician .
label: case amod obl punct nmod nsubj punct appos punct root obj mark xcomp obj punct expl advcl amod nsubj acl det obj punct

text: However , Daniel refused , because he wanted to study mathematics .
label: advmod punct nsubj root punct mark nsubj advcl mark xcomp obj punct

text: He later gave in to his father 's wish and studied business .
label: nsubj advmod root compound case nmod nmod case obl cc conj obj punct

text: His father then asked him to study in medicine , and Daniel agreed under the condition that his father would teach him mathematics privately , which they continued for some time .
label: nmod nsubj advmod root iobj mark xcomp case obl punct cc nsubj conj case det obl mark nmod nsubj aux acl iobj obj advmod punct obj nsubj advcl case det obl punct

text: Daniel studied medicine at Basel , Heidelberg , and Strasbourg , and earned a PhD in anatomy and botany in 1721 .
label: nsubj root obj case obl punct conj punct cc conj punct cc conj det obj case nmod cc conj case obl punct

text: He was a contemporary and close friend of Leonhard Euler .
label: nsubj cop det root cc amod conj case obl flat punct

text: He went to St. Petersburg in 1724 as professor of mathematics , but was very unhappy there , and a temporary illness in 1733 gave him an excuse for leaving St. Petersburg .
label: nsubj root case obl flat case obl case obl case nmod punct cc cop advmod conj advmod punct cc det amod nsubj case nmod conj iobj det obj mark acl obj flat punct

text: He returned to the University of Basel , where he successively held the chairs of medicine , metaphysics , and natural philosophy until his death .
label: nsubj root case det obl case nmod punct advmod nsubj advmod advcl det obj case nmod punct conj punct cc amod conj case nmod obl punct

text: In May , 1750 he was elected a Fellow of the Royal Society .
label: case obl punct nmod nsubj aux root det xcomp case det amod nmod punct

text: Mathematical work
label: amod root

text: His earliest mathematical work was the Exercitationes ( Mathematical Exercises ) , published in 1724 with the help of Goldbach .
label: nmod amod amod nsubj cop det root punct amod appos punct punct acl case obl case det obl case nmod punct

text: Two years later he pointed out for the first time the frequent desirability of resolving a compound motion into motions of translation and motion of rotation .
label: nummod obl advmod nsubj root compound case det amod obl det amod obj mark acl det amod obj case obl case nmod cc conj case nmod punct

text: His chief work is Hydrodynamica , published in 1738 ;
label: nmod amod nsubj cop root punct acl case obl punct

text: it resembles Joseph Louis Lagrange 's Mécanique Analytique in being arranged so that all the results are consequences of a single principle , namely , conservation of energy .
label: nsubj root nmod flat flat case compound xcomp mark aux advcl mark fixed det det nsubj cop advcl case det amod nmod punct advmod punct appos case nmod punct

text: This was followed by a memoir on the theory of the tides , to which , conjointly with the memoirs by Euler and Colin Maclaurin , a prize was awarded by the French Academy : these three memoirs contain all that was done on this subject between the publication of Isaac Newton 's Philosophiae Naturalis Principia Mathematica and the investigations of Pierre - Simon Laplace .
label: nsubj aux root case det obl case det nmod case det nmod punct case obl punct advmod case det obl case nmod cc conj flat punct det nsubj aux acl case det amod obl punct det nummod nsubj parataxis obj nsubj aux acl case det obl case det obl case nmod flat case compound compound compound nmod cc det conj case nmod punct flat flat punct

text: Bernoulli also wrote a large number of papers on various mechanical questions , especially on problems connected with vibrating strings , and the solutions given by Brook Taylor and by Jean le Rond d'Alembert .
label: nsubj advmod root det amod obj case nmod case amod amod nmod punct advmod case nmod acl case amod obl punct cc det conj acl case obl flat cc case conj flat flat flat punct

text: Together Bernoulli and Euler tried to discover more about the flow of fluids .
label: advmod nsubj cc conj root mark xcomp obj case det obl case nmod punct

text: In particular , they wanted to know about the relationship between the speed at which blood flows and its pressure .
label: case obl punct nsubj root mark xcomp case det obl case det nmod case obl nsubj acl cc nmod conj punct

text: To investigate this , Daniel experimented by puncturing the wall of a pipe with a small open ended straw and noted that the height to which the fluid rose up the straw was related to fluid 's pressure in the pipe .
label: mark advcl obj punct nsubj root mark advcl det obj case det nmod case det amod amod amod obl cc conj mark det nsubj case obl det nsubj acl case det obl cop ccomp case nmod case obl case det nmod punct

text: Soon physicians all over Europe were measuring patients ' blood pressure by sticking point - ended glass tubes directly into their arteries .
label: advmod nsubj advmod case nmod aux root nmod case compound obj mark advcl compound punct amod compound obj advmod case nmod obl punct

text: It was not until about 170 years later , in 1896 that an Italian doctor discovered a less painful method which is still in use today .
label: expl cop advmod case advmod nummod obl root punct case obl mark det amod nsubj advcl det advmod amod obj nsubj cop advmod case acl obl punct

text: However , Bernoulli 's method of measuring pressure is still used today in modern aircraft to measure the speed of the air passing the plane ; that is its air speed .
label: advmod punct nmod case nsubj mark acl obj aux advmod root obl case amod obl mark advcl det obj case det nmod acl det obj punct advmod fixed nmod compound appos punct

text: Taking his discoveries further , Daniel Bernoulli now returned to his earlier work on Conservation of Energy .
label: advcl nmod obj advmod punct nsubj flat advmod root case nmod amod obl case nmod case nmod punct

text: It was known that a moving body exchanges its kinetic energy for potential energy when it gains height .
label: expl aux root mark det amod nsubj csubj nmod amod obj case amod obl advmod nsubj advcl obj punct

text: Daniel realised that in a similar way , a moving fluid exchanges its kinetic energy for pressure .
label: nsubj root mark case det amod obl punct det amod nsubj ccomp nmod amod obj case obl punct

text: Mathematically this law is now written : ½ ρ u 2 + P = constant where P is pressure , ρ is the density of the fluid and u is its velocity .
label: advmod det nsubj aux advmod root punct nummod nsubj dep nummod cc conj parataxis obj advmod nsubj cop advcl punct nsubj cop det conj case det nmod cc nsubj cop nmod conj punct

text: A consequence of this law is that if the velocity increases then the pressure falls .
label: det nsubj case det nmod cop mark mark det nsubj advcl advmod det nsubj root punct

text: This is exploited by the wing of an aeroplane which is designed to create an area above its surface where the air velocity increases .
label: nsubj aux root case det obl case det nmod nsubj aux acl mark advcl det obj case nmod nmod advmod det compound nsubj acl punct

text: The pressure in this area is lower than that under the wing , so the wing is pushed upwards by the relatively higher pressure under the wing .
label: det nsubj case det nmod cop root case obl case det nmod punct advmod det nsubj aux parataxis advmod case det advmod amod obl case det nmod punct

text: Early life
label: amod root

text: Born in Tianjin with ancestry in Changzhou , Jiangsu province , Chao went to the United States with a Boxer Indemnity Scholarship in 1910 to study mathematics and physics at Cornell University , where he was a classmate and lifelong friend of Hu Shih , the leader of the New Culture Movement .
label: acl case obl case obl case nmod punct compound appos punct nsubj root case det amod obl case det compound compound obl case obl mark advcl obj cc conj case compound obl punct advmod nsubj cop det acl cc amod conj case nmod flat punct det appos case det amod compound nmod punct

text: He then became interested in philosophy , and earned a Ph.D. in philosophy from Harvard University in 1918 with a dissertation entitled " Continuity : Study in Methodology " .
label: nsubj advmod root xcomp case obl punct cc conj det obj case nmod case compound nmod case obl case det obl acl punct xcomp punct appos case nmod punct punct

text: Already in college his interests had turned to music and languages .
label: advmod case obl nmod nsubj aux root case obl cc conj punct

text: He spoke German and French fluently and some Japanese , and he had a reading knowledge of ancient Greek and Latin .
label: nsubj root obj cc conj advmod cc det conj punct cc nsubj conj det compound obj case amod nmod cc conj punct

text: He served as Bertrand Russell 's interpreter when Russell visited China in 1920 .
label: nsubj root case nmod flat case obl advmod nsubj advcl obj case obl punct

text: In his My Linguistic Autobiography , he wrote of his ability to pick up a Chinese dialect quickly , without much effort .
label: case nmod nmod amod obl punct nsubj root case nmod obl mark acl compound det amod obj advmod punct case amod obl punct

text: Chao possessed a natural gift for hearing fine distinctions in pronunciation that was said to be " legendary for its acuity " , enabling him to record the sounds of various dialects with a high degree of accuracy .
label: nsubj root det amod obj mark acl amod obj case nmod nsubj aux acl mark cop punct xcomp case nmod obl punct punct advcl obj mark xcomp det obj case amod nmod case det amod obl case nmod punct

text: Career development and later life
label: compound root cc amod conj

text: He returned to China in 1920 , marrying the physician Yang Buwei there that year .
label: nsubj root case obl case obl punct advcl det obj appos flat advmod det obl punct

text: The ceremony was simple , rather than the noisy traditional wedding , attended only by Hu Shih and one other friend .
label: det nsubj cop root punct cc fixed det amod amod conj punct advcl advmod case obl flat cc nummod amod conj punct

text: Hu 's account of it in the newspapers made the couple a model of modern marriage for China 's New Culture generation .
label: nmod case nsubj case nmod case det nmod root det obj det xcomp case amod nmod case nmod case amod compound nmod punct

text: Chao taught mathematics at Tsinghua University and , one year later , returned to the United States to teach at Harvard .
label: nsubj root obj case compound obl cc punct nummod obl advmod punct conj case det amod obl mark advcl case obl punct

text: He again returned to China in 1925 , teaching at Tsinghua , and beginning a survey of the Wu dialects in 1926 .
label: nsubj advmod root case obl case obl punct advcl case obl punct cc conj det obj case det compound nmod case obl punct

text: He began to conduct linguistic fieldwork throughout China for the Institute of History and Philology of Academia Sinica from 1928 onwards .
label: nsubj root mark xcomp amod obj case obl case det obl case nmod cc conj case nmod flat case obl advmod punct

text: During this period of time , he collaborated with Luo Changpei and Li Fang - Kuei , the other two leading Chinese linguists of his generation , to edit and render into Chinese Bernhard Karlgren 's monumental Etudes sur la Phonologie Chinoise ( published in 1940 ) .
label: case det obl case nmod punct nsubj root case obl flat cc conj flat punct flat punct det amod nummod amod amod appos case nmod nmod punct mark advcl cc conj case obl nmod flat case amod obj flat flat flat flat punct acl case obl punct punct

text: He left for the US in 1938 , and resided there afterwards .
label: nsubj root case det obl case obl punct cc conj advmod advmod punct

text: In 1945 , he served as president of the Linguistic Society of America , and a special issue of the society 's journal Language was dedicated to him in 1966 .
label: case obl punct nsubj root case obl case det amod nmod case nmod punct cc det amod nsubj case det nmod case nmod appos aux conj case obl case obl punct

text: He became an American citizen in 1954 .
label: nsubj root det amod xcomp case obl punct

text: In the 1950s he was among the first members of the Society for General Systems Research .
label: case det nmod nsubj cop case det amod root case det nmod case amod compound nmod punct

text: From 1947 to 1960 , he taught at the University of California at Berkeley , where in 1952 , he became Agassiz Professor of Oriental Languages .
label: case obl case obl punct nsubj root case det obl case nmod case nmod punct advmod case obl punct nsubj acl compound xcomp case amod nmod punct

text: Both Chao and Yang were known for their good senses of humor , he particularly for his love of subtle jokes and language puns : they published a family history entitled , Life with Chaos : the autobiography of a Chinese family .
label: cc nsubj cc conj aux root case nmod amod obl case nmod punct parataxis advmod case nmod orphan case amod nmod cc compound conj punct nsubj parataxis det compound obj acl punct xcomp case nmod punct det appos case det amod nmod punct

text: Late in his life , he was invited by Deng Xiaoping to return to China in 1981 .
label: advmod case nmod obl punct nsubj aux root case obl flat mark xcomp case obl case obl punct

text: Previously at the invitation of Premier Zhou En - Lai , Chao and his wife returned to China in 1973 for the first time since the 1940s .
label: advmod case det obl case nmod flat flat punct flat punct nsubj cc nmod conj root case obl case obl case det amod obl case det nmod punct

text: He visited China again between May and June in 1981 after his wife died in March the same year .
label: nsubj root obj advmod case obl cc conj case obl mark nmod nsubj advcl case obl det amod nmod punct

text: He died in Cambridge , Massachusetts .
label: nsubj root case obl punct appos punct

text: His first daughter Rulan Chao Pian ( 1922 - 2013 ) was Professor of East Asian Studies and Music at Harvard .
label: nmod amod nsubj appos flat flat punct nmod case nmod punct cop root case compound amod nmod cc conj case nmod punct

text: His third daughter Lensey , born in 1929 , is a children 's book author and mathematician .
label: nmod amod nsubj appos punct acl case obl punct cop det nmod case compound root cc conj punct

text: Pierre Charles L'Enfant ,
label: root flat flat punct

text: Pierre Charles L'Enfant ( French : [ pjɛʁ ʃɑʁl lɑ̃fɑ̃ ] ; August 2 , 1754 – June 14 , 1825 ) , self - identified as Peter Charles L'Enfant while living in the United States , was a French - born American military engineer who designed the basic plan for Washington , D.C. ( capital city of the U.S. ) known today as the L'Enfant Plan ( 1791 ) .
label: nsubj flat flat punct dep punct punct parataxis flat flat punct punct compound nmod punct nmod case compound nmod punct nmod punct punct compound punct acl case obl flat flat mark advcl case det amod obl punct cop det compound punct amod amod amod root nsubj acl det amod obj case nmod punct appos punct compound appos case det nmod punct acl obl case det compound obl punct nmod punct punct

text: Early life and education
label: amod root cc conj

text: L'Enfant was born in Paris , France on August 2 , 1754 , the third child and second son of Pierre L'Enfant ( 1704 – 1787 ) , a painter with a good reputation in the service of King Louis XV of France , ( 1710 - 1774 , reigned 1715 - 1774 ) , and Marie L'Enfant , the daughter of a minor official at court .
label: nsubj aux root case obl punct appos case compound obl punct nmod punct det amod advcl cc amod conj case nmod flat punct nmod case nmod punct punct det appos case det amod nmod case det nmod case nmod flat dep case nmod punct punct nmod case nmod punct parataxis obl case nmod punct punct cc conj flat punct det appos case det amod nmod case nmod punct

text: In 1758 , his brother Pierre Joseph died at the age of six , and Pierre Charles became the eldest son .
label: case obl punct nmod nsubj appos flat root case det obl case nmod punct cc nsubj flat conj det amod xcomp punct

text: He studied art at the Royal Academy in the Louvre , as well as with his father at the Royal Academy of Painting and Sculpture .
label: nsubj root obj case det amod obl case det nmod punct cc fixed fixed case nmod conj case det amod orphan case nmod cc conj punct

text: He left school in France to enlist in the American Revolutionary War on the side of the rebelling colonials .
label: nsubj root obj case nmod mark advcl case det amod amod obl case det obl case det amod nmod punct

text: Military service
label: amod root

text: L'Enfant was recruited by Pierre Augustin Caron de Beaumarchais to serve in the American Revolutionary War in the United States .
label: nsubj aux root case obl flat flat flat flat mark advcl case det amod amod obl case det amod nmod punct

text: He arrived in 1777 at the age of 23 , and served as a military engineer in the Continental Army with Major General Lafayette .
label: nsubj root case obl case det obl case nmod punct cc conj case det amod obl case det amod obl case obl flat flat punct

text: He was commissioned as a captain in the Corps of Engineers on April 3 , 1779 to rank from February 18 , 1778 .
label: nsubj aux root case det obl case det nmod case nmod case compound obl punct nmod mark xcomp case compound obl punct nmod punct

text: Despite his aristocratic origins , L'Enfant closely identified with the United States , changing his first name from Pierre to Peter when he first came to the rebelling colonies in 1777 .
label: case nmod amod obl punct nsubj advmod root case det amod obl punct advcl nmod amod obj case obl case obl advmod nsubj advmod advcl case det amod obl case obl punct

text: L'Enfant served on General George Washington 's staff at Valley Forge .
label: nsubj root case nmod flat flat case obl case obl flat punct

text: While there , the Marquis de Lafayette commissioned L'Enfant to paint a portrait of Washington .
label: mark advcl punct det nsubj flat flat root obj mark xcomp det obj case nmod punct

text: He was wounded at the Siege of Savannah on October 9 , 1779 .
label: nsubj aux root case det obl case nmod case compound obl punct nmod punct

text: He recovered and became a prisoner of war at surrender of Charleston , South Carolina on May 12 , 1780 .
label: nsubj root cc conj det xcomp case nmod case obl case nmod punct compound appos case compound obl punct nmod punct

text: He was exchanged in November 1780 and served on General George Washington 's staff for the remainder of the American Revolution .
label: nsubj aux root case obl nmod cc conj case nmod flat flat case obl case det obl case det amod nmod punct

text: L'Enfant was promoted by brevet to Major in the Corps of Engineers on May 2 , 1783 , in recognition of his service to the cause of American liberty .
label: nsubj aux root case obl case obl case det nmod case nmod case compound obl punct nmod punct case obl case nmod nmod case det nmod case amod nmod punct

text: He was discharged when the Continental Army was disbanded in December 1783 .
label: nsubj aux root advmod det amod nsubj aux advcl case obl nmod punct

text: After the war , L'Enfant designed the badge of the Society of the Cincinnati , an organization of former officers of the Continental Army , shaped as an eagle , at the request of Washington .
label: case det obl punct nsubj root det obj case det nmod case det nmod punct det appos case amod nmod case det amod nmod punct acl case det obl punct case det obl case nmod punct

text: He was sent to France to have insignias made for members of the Society , a group of veterans of the war .
label: nsubj aux root case obl mark advcl obj xcomp case obl case det nmod punct det appos case nmod case det nmod punct

text: Career
label: root

text: Post–Revolutionary War
label: compound root

text: Following the American Revolutionary War , L'Enfant established a successful and highly profitable civil engineering firm in New York City .
label: case det amod amod obl punct nsubj root det amod cc advmod conj amod compound obj case amod compound nmod punct

text: He achieved some fame as an architect by redesigning the City Hall in New York for the First Congress of the United States ( See : Federal Hall ) .
label: nsubj root det obj case det obl mark advcl det compound obj case amod nmod case det amod obl case det amod nmod punct parataxis punct amod obj punct punct

text: He also designed furniture and houses for the wealthy as well as coins and medals , including the insignia of the Society of the Cincinnati .
label: nsubj advmod root obj cc conj case det nmod cc fixed fixed conj cc conj punct case det nmod case det nmod case det nmod punct

text: He was also a friend of Alexander Hamilton , and some of their correspondances from 1790 to 1801 now reside in the National Archives .
label: nsubj cop advmod det root case nmod flat punct cc nsubj case nmod nmod case nmod case nmod advmod conj case det amod obl punct

text: While L'Enfant was in New York City , he was initiated into Freemasonry .
label: mark nsubj cop case amod compound advcl punct nsubj aux root case obl punct

text: His initiation took place on April 17 , 1789 , at Holland Lodge No. 8 , F&AM , which the Grand Lodge of New York F&AM had chartered in 1787 .
label: nmod nsubj root obj case compound obl punct nmod punct case compound obl compound dep punct appos punct obj det amod nsubj case amod nmod appos aux acl case obl punct

text: L'Enfant took only the first of three degrees offered by the Lodge and did not progress further in Freemasonry .
label: nsubj root advmod det obj case nummod obl acl case det obl cc aux advmod conj advmod case obl punct

text: Charles J. Fillmore
label: root flat flat

text: Charles J. Fillmore ( August 9 , 1929 – February 13 , 2014 ) was an American linguist and Professor of Linguistics at the University of California , Berkeley .
label: nsubj flat flat punct compound nmod punct nmod case compound nmod punct nmod punct cop det amod root cc conj case nmod case det nmod case nmod punct appos punct

text: He received his Ph.D. in Linguistics from the University of Michigan in 1961 .
label: nsubj root nmod obj case nmod case det obl case nmod case obl punct

text: Fillmore spent ten years at The Ohio State University and a year as a Fellow at the Center for Advanced Study in the Behavioral Sciences at Stanford University before joining Berkeley 's Department of Linguistics in 1971 . [ 1 ]
label: nsubj root nummod obj case det compound compound nmod cc det conj case det nmod case det nmod case amod nmod case det amod nmod case compound nmod mark advcl nmod case obj case nmod case obl punct punct dep punct

text: Fillmore was extremely influential in the areas of syntax and lexical semantics .
label: nsubj cop advmod root case det obl case nmod cc amod conj punct

text: A three–day conference was held at UC Berkeley in celebration of his 80th birthday in 2009 . [ 2 ]
label: det amod nsubj aux root case compound obl case obl case nmod amod nmod case obl punct punct dep punct

text: Fillmore received the 2012 Lifetime Achievement Award of the Association for Computational Linguistics . [ 3 ]
label: nsubj root det compound compound compound obj case det nmod case compound nmod punct punct dep punct

text: He died in 2014 . [ 4 ]
label: nsubj root case obl punct punct dep punct

text: Early years
label: amod root

text: Fillmore spent three years in the U.S. Army stationed in Japan , where he intercepted coded Russian conversations on short - wave radio and taught himself Japanese . [ 2 ]
label: nsubj root nummod obj case det compound obl advcl case obl punct advmod nsubj acl amod amod obj case amod punct compound nmod cc conj iobj obj punct punct dep punct

text: Following his discharge , he taught English at a Buddhist girls ' school while also taking classes at Kyoto University .
label: case nmod obl punct nsubj root obj case det amod nmod case obl mark advmod advcl obj case compound obl punct

text: He returned to the US , receiving his doctorate at the University of Michigan and then teaching at The Ohio State University in Columbus .
label: nsubj root case det obl punct advcl nmod obj case det obl case nmod cc advmod conj case det compound compound obl case nmod punct

text: At the time , he was still a proponent of Noam Chomsky 's theory of generative grammar during its earliest transformational grammar phase .
label: case det obl punct nsubj cop advmod det root case nmod flat case nmod case amod nmod case nmod amod amod compound nmod punct

text: In 1963 , his seminal article The position of embedding transformations in a Grammar introduced the transformational cycle .
label: case obl punct nmod amod nsubj det appos case amod nmod case det nmod root det amod obj punct

text: The central idea is to first apply rules to the smallest applicable unit , then to the smallest unit containing that one , and so on . [ 5 ]
label: det amod nsubj cop mark advmod root obj case det amod amod obl punct conj case det amod orphan acl det obj punct cc conj advmod punct punct dep punct

text: This principle has been a foundational insight for theories of syntax since that time .
label: det nsubj aux cop det amod root case nmod case nmod case det obl punct

text: Cognitive linguistics
label: amod root

text: By 1965 , Fillmore had come to acknowledge that semantics plays a crucial role in grammar . [ 6 ]
label: case obl punct nsubj aux root mark xcomp mark nsubj ccomp det amod obj case nmod punct punct dep punct

text: In 1968 , he published his theory of Case Grammar ( Fillmore 1968 ) , which highlighted the fact that syntactic structure can be predicted by semantic participants .
label: case obl punct nsubj root nmod obj case compound nmod punct parataxis nmod punct punct nsubj acl det obj mark amod nsubj aux aux acl case amod obl punct

text: An action can have an agent , a patient , purposes , locations , and so on .
label: det nsubj aux root det obj punct det conj punct conj punct conj punct cc conj advmod punct

text: These participants were called " cases " in his original paper , but later came to be known as semantic roles or thematic relations , which are similar to theta roles in generative grammar .
label: det nsubj aux root punct xcomp punct case nmod amod obl punct cc advmod conj mark aux xcomp case amod obl cc amod conj punct nsubj cop acl case compound obl case amod nmod punct

text: Following his move to the University of California , Berkeley , in 1971 , this theory eventually evolved into a broader cognitive linguistic theory called Frame Semantics ( 1976 ) .
label: case nmod obl case det nmod case nmod punct appos punct case obl punct det nsubj advmod root case det amod amod amod obl acl compound xcomp punct nmod punct punct

text: A commercial event , for instance , crucially involved elements such as a seller , a buyer , some good , and some money .
label: det amod nsubj punct case obl punct advmod root obj case fixed det nmod punct det conj punct det conj punct cc det conj punct

text: In language , such an event can be expressed in a variety of different ways , e.g. using the verb ' to sell ' or the verb ' to buy ' .
label: case obl punct det det nsubj aux aux root case det obl case amod nmod punct advmod advcl det obj punct mark appos punct cc det conj punct mark appos punct punct

text: According to frame semantics , meaning is best studied in terms of the mental concepts and participants in the minds of the speaker and addressee .
label: case fixed compound obl punct nsubj aux advmod root case obl case det amod nmod cc conj case det nmod case det nmod cc conj punct

text: Around the same time , Fillmore 's Santa Cruz Lectures on Deixis , delivered in 1971 and published in 1975 , contributed to establishing the field of linguistic pragmatics , which studies the relationship between linguistic form and the context of utterance . [ 7 ] [ 8 ]
label: case det amod obl punct nmod case compound flat nsubj case nmod punct acl case obl cc conj case obl punct root mark advcl det obj case amod nmod punct nsubj acl det obj case amod nmod cc det conj case nmod punct punct dep punct punct dep punct

text: In all of this research , he illuminated the fundamental importance of semantics , and its role in motivating syntactic and morphological phenomena .
label: case obl case det nmod punct nsubj root det amod obj case nmod punct cc nmod conj mark acl amod cc conj obj punct

text: His collaboration with Paul Kay and George Lakoff was generalized into the theory of Construction Grammar .
label: nmod nsubj case nmod flat cc conj flat aux root case det obl case compound nmod punct

text: This work aimed at developing a complete theory of grammar that would fully acknowledge the role of semantics right from the start , while simultaneously adopting constraint - based formalisms as popular in computer science and natural language processing .
label: det nsubj root mark advcl det amod obj case nmod nsubj aux advmod acl det obj case nmod advmod case det obl punct mark advmod advcl compound punct amod obj case acl case compound obl cc amod compound conj punct

text: This theory built on the notion of construction from traditional and pedagogical grammars rather than the rule - based formalisms that dominate most of generative grammar .
label: det nsubj root case det obl case nmod case amod cc conj nmod cc fixed det compound punct amod conj nsubj acl obj case amod obl punct

text: One of Fillmore 's most widely noticed works of the time ( with Paul Kay and Cathy O'Connor ) appeared in ' Language ' in 1988 as " Regularity and Idiomaticity in Grammatical Constructions : The Case of Let Alone " .
label: nsubj case nmod case advmod advmod amod nmod case det nmod punct case nmod flat cc conj flat punct root case punct obl punct case obl case punct obl cc conj case amod nmod punct det appos case nmod fixed punct punct

text: Their paper highlighted the merits of such a theory of by focusing on the ' let alone ' construction .
label: nmod nsubj root det obj case det det nmod nmod mark advcl case det punct compound fixed punct obl punct

text: Over time , construction grammar developed into a research area of its own , and a number of variants have been proposed over the years by different researchers .
label: case obl punct compound nsubj root case det compound obl case nmod nmod punct cc det nsubj case nmod aux aux conj case det obl case amod obl punct

text: Fillmore is now widely recognized as one of the founders of cognitive linguistics .
label: nsubj aux advmod advmod root case obl case det nmod case amod nmod punct

text: The first chapter of “ Cognitive Linguistics ” by Cruse and Croft ( 2004 ) , for instance , begins with a summary of Fillmore 's work .
label: det amod nsubj case punct amod nmod punct case nmod cc conj punct nmod punct punct case obl punct root case det obl case nmod case nmod punct

text: Fillmore served as President of the Linguistic Society of America in 1991 and was awarded an honorary doctorate from the University of Chicago in 2000 . [ 7 ]
label: nsubj root case obl case det compound nmod case nmod case obl cc aux conj det amod obj case det obl case nmod case obl punct punct dep punct

text: His legacy continues with his many notable students , including Adele Goldberg , Laura Michaelis , Christopher Johnson , Miriam R. L. Petruck , Len Talmy , and Eve Sweetser .
label: nmod nsubj root case nmod amod amod obl punct case nmod flat punct conj flat punct conj flat punct conj flat flat flat punct conj flat punct cc conj flat punct

text: FrameNet
label: root

text: In the 1990s , Fillmore taught classes in computational lexicography at the University of Pisa , where he met Sue Atkins , who was conducting frame - semantic analyses from a lexicographic perspective .
label: case det obl punct nsubj root obj case amod nmod case det obl case nmod punct advmod nsubj acl obj flat punct nsubj aux acl compound punct amod obj case det amod obl punct

text: In their subsequent discussions and collaborations , Fillmore came to acknowledge the importance of considering corpus data . [ 2 ]
label: case nmod amod obl cc conj punct nsubj root mark xcomp det obj mark acl compound obj punct punct dep punct

text: They discussed the " dictionary of the future " , in which every word would be linked to example sentences from corpora . [ 7 ] [ 9 ]
label: nsubj root det punct obj case det nmod punct punct case obl det nsubj aux aux acl case compound obl case nmod punct punct dep punct punct dep punct

text: After 23 years at the University of California , Berkeley , Fillmore retired in 1994 and joined Berkeley 's International Computer Science Institute . [ 6 ]
label: case nummod obl case det nmod case nmod punct appos punct nsubj root case obl cc conj nmod case amod compound compound obj punct punct dep punct

text: There , he started a project called FrameNet , an on - line structured description of the English lexicon implementing much of what he had earlier proposed more theoretically in his theory of Frame semantics , while implementing the idea of emphasizing example sentences from corpora .
label: advmod punct nsubj root det obj acl xcomp punct det case punct amod amod appos case det compound nmod acl obj case nmod nsubj aux advmod acl advmod advmod case nmod obl case compound nmod punct mark advcl det obj mark acl compound obj case nmod punct

text: In FrameNet , words are described in terms of the frames they evoke .
label: case obl punct nsubj aux root case obl case det nmod nsubj acl punct

text: Data is gathered from the British National Corpus , annotated for semantic and syntactic relations , and stored in a database organized by both lexical items and Frames .
label: nsubj aux root case det amod amod obl punct conj case amod cc conj obl punct cc conj case det obl acl case cc amod obl cc conj punct

text: Final days
label: amod root

text: Siméon Poisson reviewed Galois ' paper on equation theory and declared it " incomprehensible " .
label: nsubj flat root nmod case obj case compound nmod cc conj obj punct xcomp punct punct

text: Galois returned to mathematics after his expulsion from the École Normale , although he continued to spend time in political activities .
label: nsubj root case obl case nmod obl case det compound nmod punct mark nsubj advcl mark xcomp obj case amod obl punct

text: After his expulsion became official in January 1831 , he attempted to start a private class in advanced algebra which attracted some interest , but this waned , as it seemed that his political activism had priority . [ 4 ] [ 7 ]
label: mark nmod nsubj advcl xcomp case obl nmod punct nsubj root mark xcomp det amod obj case amod nmod nsubj acl det obj punct cc nsubj conj punct mark expl advcl mark nmod amod nsubj ccomp obj punct punct dep punct punct conj punct

text: Siméon Poisson asked him to submit his work on the theory of equations , which he did on 17 January 1831 .

text: Patrick Leopold Gordon of Auchleuchries ( 31 March 1635 in Auchleuchries , Aberdeenshire , Scotland – 29 November 1699 in Moscow , Russia ) was a general and rear admiral in Russia , of Scottish origin .
label: nsubj flat flat case nmod punct parataxis compound nmod case nmod punct appos punct appos case nmod compound nmod case nmod punct appos punct cop det root cc amod conj case nmod punct case amod nmod punct

text: He was descended from a family of Aberdeenshire , holders of the small estate of Auchleuchries , near Ellon .
label: nsubj aux root case det obl case nmod punct appos case det amod nmod case nmod punct case nmod punct

text: The family was connected with the noble branch of Haddo .
label: det nsubj aux root case det amod obl case nmod punct

text: As a result of his distinguished service for Sweden , Poland and Russia he rose in ranks from trooper to full general , and became principal advisor and close friend of Tsar Peter the Great .
label: case det obl case nmod amod nmod case nmod punct conj cc conj nsubj root case obl case obl case amod obl punct cc conj amod xcomp cc amod conj case nmod flat det appos punct

text: Gordon assumed the additional Christian name of Leopold when confirmed as a Roman Catholic shortly before his death .
label: nsubj root det amod amod obj case nmod advmod advcl case det amod obl advmod case nmod obl punct

text: Life
label: root

text: Gordon was brought up and remained a lifelong Roman Catholic , at a time when the Church was being persecuted in Scotland , which had become Calvinist .
label: nsubj aux root compound cc conj det amod amod xcomp punct case det obl advmod det nsubj aux aux acl case obl punct nsubj aux acl xcomp punct

text: After an education at the parish schools of Cruden and Ellon , at age of fifteen he entered the Jesuit college at Braunsberg , East Prussia , then part of Poland ; however , his character did not tolerate well the strict and sombre way of life at the school , and he soon decided to return home .
label: case det obl case det compound nmod case nmod cc conj punct case obl case nmod nsubj root det amod obj case nmod punct compound appos punct advmod appos case nmod punct advmod punct nmod nsubj aux advmod parataxis advmod det amod cc conj obj case nmod case det nmod punct cc nsubj advmod conj mark xcomp advmod punct

text: He changed his mind , however , before re-embarking on the journey back to Scotland , and after journeying on foot in several parts of what is today Germany , in 1655 he enlisted at Hamburg into the military service of Sweden .
label: nsubj root nmod obj punct advmod punct mark advcl case det obl advmod case nmod punct cc mark advcl case obl case amod obl case nmod cop obl acl punct case obl nsubj conj case obl case det amod obl case nmod punct

text: In the course of the next five years he served alternately for Poland and Sweden and was taken prisoner by both .
label: case det obl case det amod nummod nmod nsubj root advmod case obl cc conj cc aux conj xcomp case obl punct

text: At the Battle of Chudnov in 1660 , Gordon was wounded . [ 1 ]
label: case det obl case nmod case obl punct nsubj aux root punct punct dep punct

text: Upon hearing of the Stuart restoration , Gordon left the Polish service , but found himself unable to obtain military employment in Scotland or England . [ 1 ]
label: mark advcl case det amod obl punct nsubj root det amod obj punct cc conj obj xcomp mark xcomp amod obj case obl cc conj punct punct dep punct

text: In 1661 , after further experiences as a soldier of fortune , he joined the Russian army under Tsar Aleksei I , and in 1665 was sent on a special mission to England .
label: case obl punct case amod obl case det nmod case nmod punct nsubj root det amod obj case obl flat amod punct cc case obl aux conj case det amod obl case obl punct

text: After his return he distinguished himself in several wars against the Turks and Tatars in southern Russia .
label: case nmod obl nsubj root obj case amod obl case det nmod cc conj case amod nmod punct

text: Gordon disliked the Russian service , complaining of the corruption and venality of Russian officials , which left him , in his own words , " almost at wit s end with vexation " . [ 2 ]
label: nsubj root det amod obj punct advcl case det obl cc conj case amod nmod punct nsubj acl nsubj punct case nmod amod nmod punct punct advmod case nmod case xcomp case nmod punct punct punct dep punct

text: However , in recognition of his service he was promoted to major - general in 1678 , was appointed to the high command at Kiev in 1679 , and in 1683 was made lieutenant - general .
label: advmod punct case obl case nmod nmod nsubj aux root case obl punct flat case obl punct aux conj case det amod obl case nmod case obl punct cc case obl aux conj compound punct xcomp punct

text: He was not the only Scottish soldier in the Tsar 's service ; his fellow - Scots Paul Menzies and Alexander Livingston also found themselves in Russia fleeing religious intolerance or seeking adventure .
label: nsubj cop advmod det amod amod root case det nmod case nmod punct nmod amod punct nsubj appos flat cc conj flat advmod parataxis obj case obl advcl amod obj cc conj obj punct

text: Gordon visited England and Scotland in 1686 .
label: nsubj root obj cc conj case obl punct

text: In 1687 and 1689 he took part in expeditions against the Tatars in the Crimea , being made a full general .
label: case obl cc conj nsubj root obj case obl case det nmod case det nmod punct aux advcl det amod xcomp punct

text: Later in 1689 a revolution broke out in Moscow , and with the troops under his command Gordon virtually decided events in favour of Peter the Great , [ 3 ] and against the Regent , Tsarevna Sophia Alekseyevna .
label: advmod case obl det nsubj root compound case obl punct cc case det obl case nmod nmod nsubj advmod conj obj case obl case nmod det appos punct punct dep punct cc case det obl punct appos flat flat punct

text: Consequently , he was for the remainder of his life in high favour with the Tsar , who confided to him the command of his capital during his absence from Russia .
label: advmod punct nsubj cop case det root case nmod nmod case amod nmod case det nmod punct nsubj acl case obl det obj case nmod nmod case nmod obl case nmod punct

text: In 1696 , Gordon 's design of a " moveable rampart " played a key role in helping the Russians take Azov . [ 3 ]
label: case obl punct nmod case nsubj case det punct amod nmod punct root det amod obj mark advcl det nsubj ccomp obj punct punct dep punct

text: Gordon 's alleged tomb at Vvedenskoye Cemetery in Moscow .
label: nmod case amod root case compound nmod case nmod punct

text: One of Gordon 's greatest achievements was securing permission from the Tsars to establish the first Roman Catholic church and school in Muscovy , of which he remained the main benefactor , and headed the Catholic community in Russia until his death .
label: nsubj case nmod case amod nmod aux root obj case det nmod mark advcl det amod amod compound obj cc conj case nmod punct case obl nsubj acl det amod xcomp punct cc conj det amod obj case nmod case nmod obl punct

text: For his services his second son James , brigadier of the Russian army , was created Count of the Holy Roman Empire in 1701 .
label: case nmod obl nmod amod nsubj appos punct appos case det amod nmod punct aux root xcomp case det amod amod nmod case obl punct

text: The Tsar employed him in organizing his army according to the West European system ; and raised him to the rank of full general .
label: det nsubj root obj mark advcl nmod obj case fixed det compound amod obl punct cc conj obj case det obl case amod nmod punct

text: At the end of his life the Tsar , who had visited Gordon frequently during his illness , was with him when he died , and with his own hands closed his eyes .
label: case det nmod case nmod nmod det nsubj punct nsubj aux acl obj advmod case nmod obl punct cop case root advmod nsubj advcl punct cc case nmod amod obl conj nmod obj punct

text: Originally buried in the Foreign Quarter , his remains were reinterred at Azov in 1877 , with an inscription in German which mistakenly gives his rank as Oberst , Colonel .
label: advmod advcl case det amod obl punct nmod nsubj aux root case obl case obl punct case det obl case nmod nsubj advmod acl nmod obj case obl punct appos punct

text: General Gordon left behind him a uniquely detailed diary of his life and times , written in English .
label: nsubj flat root case obl det advmod amod obj case nmod nmod cc conj punct acl case obl punct

label: nsubj aux root case obl case det compound compound compound obl case nmod punct

text: An incomplete and faulty German translation , edited by Dr Moritz Posselt ( Tagebuch des Generals Patrick Gordon ) was published , the first volume at Moscow in 1849 , the second at St Petersburg in 1851 , and the third at St Petersburg in 1853 ; and Passages from the Diary of General Patrick Gordon of Auchleuchries ( 1635 – 1699 ) , was printed , under the editorship of Joseph Robertson , for the Spalding Club , at Aberdeen , Scotland , 1859 .

text: Dame Zaha Mohammad Hadid DBE RA ( Arabic : زها حديد Zahā Ḥadīd ; 31 October 1950 – 31 March 2016 ) was an Iraqi - British architect .
label: nsubj flat flat flat compound compound punct dep punct compound appos compound appos punct nmod compound nmod case nmod compound nmod punct cop det compound punct amod root punct

text: She was the first woman to receive the Pritzker Architecture Prize , in 2004 .
label: nsubj cop det amod root mark acl det compound compound obj punct case obl punct

text: She received the UK 's most prestigious architectural award , the Stirling Prize , in 2010 and 2011 .
label: nsubj root det nmod case advmod amod amod obj punct det compound appos punct case obl cc conj punct

text: In 2012 , she was made a Dame by Elizabeth II for services to architecture , and in 2015 she became the first and only woman to be awarded the Royal Gold Medal from the Royal Institute of British Architects .
label: case obl punct nsubj aux root det xcomp case obl dep case obl case nmod punct cc case obl nsubj conj det amod cc conj xcomp mark aux acl det amod compound obj case det amod obl case amod nmod punct

text: She was described by The Guardian of London as the ' Queen of the curve ' , who " liberated architectural geometry , giving it a whole new expressive identity . "
label: nsubj aux root case det obl case nmod case det punct obl case det nmod punct punct nsubj punct acl amod obj punct advcl iobj det amod amod amod obj punct punct

text: Her major works include the aquatic centre for the London 2012 Olympics , Michigan State University 's Broad Art Museum in the US , and the Guangzhou Opera House in China .
label: nmod amod nsubj root det amod obj case det compound compound nmod punct compound compound nmod case compound compound conj case det nmod punct cc det compound compound conj case nmod punct

text: Some of her designs have been presented posthumously , including the statuette for the 2017 Brit Awards , and many of her buildings are still under construction , including the Al Wakrah Stadium in Qatar , a venue for the 2022 FIFA World Cup .
label: nsubj case nmod nmod aux aux root advmod punct case det nmod case det compound compound nmod punct cc nsubj case nmod obl cop advmod case conj punct case det compound flat nmod case nmod punct det appos case det compound compound compound nmod punct

text: Early life and academic career
label: amod root cc amod conj

text: Hadid was born on 31 October 1950 in Baghdad , Iraq , to an upper - class Iraqi family .
label: nsubj aux root case obl compound nmod case obl punct appos punct case det amod punct compound amod obl punct

text: Her father Mohammed Hadid Muhammad al - Hajj Husayn Hadid was a wealthy industrialist from Mosul .
label: nmod nsubj appos flat flat flat punct flat flat flat cop det amod root case nmod punct

text: He co-founded the left - liberal al - Ahali group in 1932 , a significant political organisation in the 1930s and 1940s .
label: nsubj root det amod punct amod compound punct flat obj case obl punct det amod amod appos case det obl cc conj punct

text: He was the co-founder of the National Democratic Party in Iraq .
label: nsubj cop det root case det compound compound nmod case nmod punct

text: He served as minister of finance after the overthrow of the monarch after the 1958 Iraqi coup d'état for the government of General Abd al - Karim Qasim .
label: nsubj root case obl case nmod case det obl case det nmod case det compound amod nmod flat case det obl case nmod flat flat punct flat flat punct

text: Her mother Wajiha al - Sabunji was an artist from Mosul .
label: nmod nsubj appos flat punct flat cop det root case nmod punct

text: In the 1960s Hadid attended boarding schools in England and Switzerland .
label: case det obl nsubj root compound obj case nmod cc conj punct

text: Hadid studied mathematics at the American University of Beirut before moving , in 1972 , to London to study at the Architectural Association School of Architecture .
label: nsubj root obj case det compound obl case nmod mark advcl punct case obl punct case obl mark advcl case det compound compound obl case nmod punct

text: There she studied with Rem Koolhaas , Elia Zenghelis and Bernard Tschumi .
label: advmod nsubj root case obl flat punct conj flat cc conj flat punct

text: Her former professor , Koolhaas , described her at graduation as " a planet in her own orbit . "
label: nmod amod nsubj punct appos punct root obj case obl case punct det obl case nmod amod nmod punct punct

text: Zenghelis described her as the most outstanding pupil he ever taught .
label: nsubj root obj case det advmod amod obl nsubj advmod acl punct

text: " We called her the inventor of the 89 degrees .
label: punct nsubj root obj det xcomp case det nummod nmod punct

text: Nothing was ever at 90 degrees .
label: nsubj cop advmod case nummod root punct

text: She had spectacular vision .
label: nsubj root amod obj punct

text: All the buildings were exploding into tiny little pieces . "
label: det det nsubj aux root case amod amod obl punct punct

text: He recalled that she was less interested in details , such as staircases .
label: nsubj root mark nsubj cop advmod ccomp case obl punct case fixed nmod punct

text: " The way she drew a staircase you would smash your head against the ceiling , and the space was reducing and reducing , and you would end up in the upper corner of the ceiling .
label: punct det obl nsubj acl det obj nsubj aux root nmod obj case det obl punct cc det nsubj aux conj cc conj punct cc nsubj aux conj compound case det amod obl case det nmod punct

text: She could n’t care about tiny details .
label: nsubj aux advmod root case amod obl punct

text: Her mind was on the broader pictures —
label: nmod nsubj cop case det amod root punct

text: when it came to the joinery she knew we could fix that later .
label: advmod nsubj advcl case det obl nsubj root nsubj aux ccomp obj advmod punct

text: She was right . ’
label: nsubj cop root punct punct

text: Her fourth - year student project was a painting of a hotel in the form of a bridge , inspired by the works of the Russian suprematist artist Kazimir Malevich
label: nmod amod punct compound compound nsubj cop det root case det nmod case det nmod case det nmod punct acl case det obl case det amod compound compound compound nmod

text: Ichiyō Higuchi
label: root flat

text: Ichiyō Higuchi ( 樋口 一葉 Higuchi Ichiyō , May 2 , 1872 – November 23 , 1896 ) was a pen name of Japanese author Natsu Higuchi ( 樋口 奈津 Higuchi Natsu ) , also known as Natsuko Higuchi ( 樋口 夏子 Higuchi Natsuko ) .
label: nsubj flat punct appos flat appos flat punct compound nmod punct nmod case compound nmod punct nmod punct cop det compound root case amod nmod compound appos punct appos flat appos flat punct punct advmod acl case obl flat punct appos flat appos flat punct punct

text: Specializing in short stories , she was one of the first important writers to appear in the Meiji period ( 1868 - 1912 ) and Japan 's first prominent woman writer of modern times .
label: advcl case amod obl punct nsubj cop root case det amod amod nmod mark acl case det compound obl punct appos case nmod punct cc nmod case amod amod compound conj case amod nmod punct

text: She wrote relatively little as a result of living a brief life — she died at 24 — but her stories had a large impact on Japanese literature and she is still appreciated by the Japanese public today .
label: nsubj root advmod obj case det obl mark acl det amod obj punct nsubj parataxis case obl punct cc nmod nsubj conj det amod obj case amod nmod cc nsubj aux advmod conj case det amod obl obl punct

text: Efforts to become a writer
label: root mark acl det xcomp

text: She , her mother , and younger sister made ends meet by doing needlework , washing , and other jobs .
label: nsubj punct nmod conj punct cc amod conj root obj xcomp mark advcl obj punct conj punct cc amod conj punct

text: In 1892 , after seeing the success of a classmate , Kaho Tanabe , who wrote a novel , Higuchi decided to become a novelist to support her family .
label: case obl punct mark advcl det obj case det nmod punct appos flat punct nsubj acl det obj punct nsubj root mark xcomp det xcomp mark advcl nmod obj punct

text: Nevertheless , her initial efforts at writing fiction were in the form of a short story , a form to which she would remain true .
label: advmod punct nmod amod nsubj mark acl obj cop case det root case det amod nmod punct det appos case obl nsubj aux acl xcomp punct

text: In 1891 she met her future advisor who would help , she assumed , this poet - turned - fiction - writer and connect her with editors : Tosui Nakarai .
label: case obl nsubj root nmod amod obj nsubj aux acl punct nsubj parataxis punct det obj punct acl punct compound punct xcomp cc conj obj case obl punct appos flat punct

text: She fell in love with him right away , not knowing that , at 31 , he had a reputation as a womanizer .
label: nsubj root case obl case obl advmod advmod punct advmod advcl mark punct case obl punct nsubj ccomp det obj case det nmod punct

text: Nor did she realize that he wrote popular literature which aimed to please the general public and in no way wished to be associated with serious literature .
label: cc aux nsubj root mark nsubj ccomp amod obj nsubj acl mark xcomp det amod obj cc case det obl conj mark aux xcomp case amod obl punct

text: Her mentor did not return her passionate , if discreet , love for him , and instead treated her as a younger sister .
label: nmod nsubj aux advmod root nmod amod punct mark advcl punct obj case nmod punct cc advmod conj obj case det amod obl punct

text: This failed relationship would become a recurrent theme in Higuchi 's fiction .
label: det amod nsubj aux root det amod xcomp case nmod case nmod punct

text: Eventually , she got the break she was so eager for :
label: advmod punct nsubj root det obj nsubj cop advmod acl obl punct

text: her first stories were published in a minor newspaper under her pen name , Ichiyo Higuchi .
label: nmod amod nsubj aux root case det amod obl case nmod compound obl punct appos flat punct

text: The stories from this first period ( 1892 – 94 ) suffered from the excessive influence of Heian poetry .
label: det nsubj case det amod nmod punct appos case nmod punct root case det amod obl case compound nmod punct

text: Higuchi felt compelled to demonstrate her classical literary training .
label: nsubj root xcomp mark xcomp nmod amod amod obj punct

text: The plots were thin , there was little development of character and they were loaded down by excessive sentiment , especially when compared to what she was writing concurrently in her diary .
label: det nsubj cop root punct expl conj amod nsubj case nmod cc nsubj aux conj compound case amod obl punct advmod advmod advcl case obl nsubj aux acl advmod case nmod obl punct

text: But she was developing rapidly .
label: cc nsubj aux root advmod punct

text: Several of her trademark themes appear ; for example , the triangular relationship among a lonely , beautiful , young woman who has lost her parents , a handsome man who has abandoned her ( and remains in the background ) , and a lonely and desperate ragamuffin who falls in love with her .
label: nsubj case nmod compound obl root punct case nmod punct det amod parataxis case det amod punct amod punct amod nmod nsubj aux acl nmod obj punct det amod conj nsubj aux acl obj punct cc conj case det obl punct punct cc det amod cc conj conj nsubj acl case obl case nmod punct

text: Another theme Higuchi repeated was the ambition and cruelty of the Meiji middle class .
label: det nsubj nsubj acl cop det root cc conj case det compound amod nmod punct

text: The story " Umoregi " ( " In Obscurity " ) signaled Higuchi 's arrival as a professional writer .
label: det nsubj punct appos punct punct punct case appos punct punct root nmod case obj case det amod nmod punct

text: It was published in the prestigious journal Miyako no Hana in 1892 , only nine months after she had started writing in earnest .
label: nsubj aux root case det amod obl compound compound appos case obl punct advmod compound obl mark nsubj aux advcl xcomp case obl punct

text: Her work was noticed and she was recognized as a promising new author .
label: nmod nsubj aux root cc nsubj aux conj case det amod amod obl punct

text: Her last years
label: nmod amod root

text: In 1893 , Higuchi , her mother and her sister abandoned their middle class house and , with a grim determination to survive , moved to a poor neighborhood where they opened a stationery store that before long failed .
label: case obl punct nsubj punct nmod conj cc nmod conj root nmod amod compound obj cc punct case det amod obl mark acl punct conj case det amod obl advmod nsubj acl det compound obj nsubj case obl acl punct

text: Their new dwelling was a five - minute walk from Tokyo 's ill - famed red - light district , the Yoshiwara .
label: nmod amod nsubj cop det nummod punct compound root case nmod case amod punct amod amod punct compound nmod punct det appos punct

text: Her experience living in this neighborhood would provide material for several of her later stories , especially " Takekurabe " , ( literally , " Comparing heights " ; " Child 's Play " in the Robert Lyons Danly translation ; also called " Growing Up " in the Edward Seidensticker translation . )
label: nmod nsubj acl case det obl aux root obj case obl case nmod amod obl punct advmod punct appos punct punct punct advmod punct punct appos obj punct punct punct nmod case parataxis punct case det compound flat flat nmod punct advmod acl punct xcomp compound punct case det compound flat obl punct punct

text: The stories of her mature period ( 1894 – 96 ) were not only marked by her experience living near the red - light district and greater concern over the plight of women , but also by the influence of Ihara Saikaku , a 17th - century writer , whose stories she had recently discovered .
label: det nsubj case nmod amod nmod punct appos case nmod punct aux advmod advmod root case nmod obl acl case det amod punct compound obl cc amod conj case det nmod case nmod punct cc advmod case det conj case nmod flat punct det amod punct compound appos punct nmod obj nsubj aux advmod acl punct

text: His distinctiveness lay in great part in his acceptance of low - life characters as worthwhile literary subjects .
label: nmod nsubj root case amod obl case nmod obl case amod punct amod nmod case amod amod nmod punct

text: What Higuchi added was a special awareness of suffering and sensitivity .
label: nsubj nsubj acl cop det amod root case nmod cc conj punct

text: To this period belong " Ōtsugomori " ( " On the Last Day of the Year " ) , " Nigorie " ( " Troubled Waters " ) , " Wakare - Michi " ( " Separate Ways " ) , " Jūsan'ya " ( " The Thirteenth Night " ) and " Takekurabe " ( " Child 's Play " ) .
label: case det obl root punct nsubj punct punct punct case det amod appos case det nmod punct punct punct punct conj punct punct punct amod appos punct punct punct punct conj punct flat punct punct punct amod appos punct punct punct punct conj punct punct punct det amod appos punct punct cc punct conj punct punct punct nmod case appos punct punct punct

text: The last two are considered her best work .
label: det amod nsubj aux root nmod amod xcomp punct

text: With these last stories her fame spread throughout the Tokyo literary establishment .
label: case det amod obl nmod nsubj root case det compound amod obl punct

text: In her humble home she was visited by other writers , students of poetry , admirers , the curious , critics , and editors requesting her collaboration .
label: case nmod amod obl nsubj aux root case amod obl punct conj case nmod punct conj punct det conj punct conj punct cc conj acl nmod obj punct

text: But between constant interruptions and frequent headaches , Higuchi stopped writing .
label: cc case amod obl cc amod conj punct nsubj root xcomp punct

text: As her father and one of her brothers had before her , she had caught tuberculosis .
label: mark nmod nsubj cc conj case nmod nmod advcl case obl punct nsubj aux root obj punct

text: She died on November 23 , 1896 , at the age of twenty - four .
label: nsubj root case compound obl punct nmod punct case det obl case compound punct nmod punct

text: Higuchi 's likeness adorns the Japanese 5000 yen banknote as of fall 2004 , becoming the third woman to appear on a Japanese banknote , after Empress Jingū in 1881 and Murasaki Shikibu in 2000 .
label: nmod case nsubj root det amod compound compound obj case fixed obl nmod punct advcl det amod xcomp mark acl case det amod obl punct case nmod flat case nmod cc conj flat case nmod punct

text: Her best - known stories have been made into movies .
label: nmod advmod punct amod nsubj aux aux root case obl punct

text: Brock Wyatt Holt ( born June 11 , 1988 ) is an American professional baseball second baseman , shortstop and outfielder for the Boston Red Sox of Major League Baseball ( MLB ) .

text: Jerome

text: Jerome ( / dʒəˈroʊm / ; Latin : Eusebius Sophronius Hieronymus ; Greek : Εὐσέβιος Σωφρόνιος Ἱερώνυμος ; c. 347 – 30 September 420 ) was a Latin Catholic priest , confessor , theologian , and historian , commonly known as Saint Jerome .
label: nsubj punct punct appos punct punct nmod punct appos flat flat punct nmod punct appos flat flat punct advmod nmod case nmod compound nmod punct cop det amod amod root punct conj punct conj punct cc conj punct advmod acl case obl flat punct

text: He was born at Stridon , a village near Emona on the border of Dalmatia and Pannonia . [ 3 ] [ 4 ] [ 5 ]
label: nsubj aux root case obl punct det appos case nmod case det nmod case nmod cc conj punct punct dep punct punct dep punct punct dep punct

text: He is best known for his translation of most of the Bible into Latin ( the translation that became known as the Vulgate ) , and his commentaries on the Gospels .
label: nsubj aux advmod root case nmod obl case nmod case det obl case nmod punct det appos nsubj acl xcomp case det obl punct punct cc nmod conj case det nmod punct

text: His list of writings is extensive . [ 6 ]
label: nmod nsubj case nmod cop root punct punct dep punct

text: The protégé of Pope Damasus I , who died in December of 384 , Jerome was known for his teachings on Christian moral life , especially to those living in cosmopolitan centers such as Rome .

text: Moreau was born in Paris , the daughter of Katherine ( née Buckley ) , a dancer who performed at the Folies Bergère ( d. 1990 ) , and Anatole - Désiré Moreau , a restaurateur ( d. 1975 ) . [ 1 ] [ 2 ]

text: Career

text: In 1947 , Moreau made her theatrical debut at the Avignon Festival .
