text: She debuted at the Comédie - Française in Ivan Turgenev 's A Month in the Country [ 6 ] and , by her 20s , was already one of leading actresses in the theatre 's troupe . [ 2 ]
label: nsubj root case det obl punct flat case nmod flat case det obl case det nmod punct dep punct cc punct case nmod obl punct cop advmod conj case amod nmod case det nmod case nmod punct punct dep punct

text: After 1949 , she began appearing in films with small parts but continued primarily active in the theatre for several years — a year at the Théâtre National Populaire opposite among others Gérard Philipe and Robert Hirsch , then a breakout two years in dual roles in The Dazzling Hour by Anna Bonacci , then Jean Cocteau 's La Machine Infernale and others before another two - year run , this time in Shaw 's Pygmalion . [ 6 ]
label: case obl punct nsubj root xcomp case obl case amod obl cc conj advmod xcomp case det obl case amod obl punct det appos case det nmod flat flat acl case nmod obl flat cc conj flat punct advmod det amod nummod conj case amod nmod case det amod nmod case nmod flat punct advmod compound nmod case conj flat flat cc conj case det compound punct compound nmod punct det obl case nmod case nmod punct punct dep punct

text: From the late 1950s , after appearing in several successful films , she began to work with the emerging generation of French film - makers .

text: Elevator to the Gallows ( 1958 ) with first - time director Louis Malle was followed by Malle 's The Lovers ( Les Amants , 1959 ) . [ 7 ]

text: Moreau went on to work with many of the best known New Wave and avant - garde directors . [ 2 ]

text: François Truffaut 's New Wave film Jules et Jim ( 1962 ) , her biggest success internationally , is centered on her magnetic starring role . [ 2 ]

text: Eugene Nida
label: root flat

text: Eugene A. Nida ( November 11 , 1914 – August 25 , 2011 ) was a linguist who developed the dynamic - equivalence Bible - translation theory and one of the founders of the modern discipline of Translation Studies .
label: nsubj flat flat punct compound nmod punct nmod case compound nmod punct nmod punct cop det root nsubj acl det amod punct compound compound punct compound obj cc conj case det nmod case det amod nmod case compound nmod punct

text: Life
label: root

text: Nida was born in Oklahoma City , Oklahoma on November 11 , 1914 .
label: nsubj aux root case obl flat punct appos case compound obl punct nmod punct

text: He became a Christian at a young age , when he responded to the altar call at his church " to accept Christ as my Saviour . "
label: nsubj root det xcomp case det amod obl punct advmod nsubj advcl case det compound obl case nmod obl punct mark advcl obj case nmod nmod punct punct

text: He graduated summa cum laude from the University of California in 1936 .
label: nsubj root compound compound obj case det obl case nmod case obl punct

text: After graduating he attended Camp Wycliffe , where Bible translation theory was taught .
label: mark advcl nsubj root obj flat punct advmod compound compound nsubj aux acl punct

text: He ministered for a short time among the Tarahumara Indians in Chihuahua , Mexico , until health problems due to an inadequate diet and the high altitude forced him to leave .
label: nsubj root case det amod obl case det amod obl case obl punct appos punct mark compound nsubj case fixed det amod nmod cc det amod conj advcl obj mark xcomp punct

text: Sometime in this period , Nida became a founding charter member of Wycliffe Bible Translators , a related organization to the Summer Institute of Linguistics .
label: advmod case det obl punct nsubj root det amod compound xcomp case compound compound nmod punct det amod appos case det compound nmod case nmod punct

text: In 1937 , Nida undertook studies at the University of Southern California , where he obtained a master 's degree in New Testament Greek in 1939 .
label: case obl punct nsubj root obj case det obl case amod nmod punct advmod nsubj advcl det nmod case obj case amod compound nmod case obl punct

text: In that same year he became interim pastor of Calvary Church of Santa Ana , California following the resignation of its founding pastor .
label: case det amod obl nsubj root amod xcomp case compound nmod case compound nmod punct appos advcl det obj case nmod amod nmod punct

text: Despite his conservative background , in later years Nida became increasingly ecumenical and New Evangelical ( clarification needed ) in his approach .
label: case nmod amod obl punct case amod obl nsubj root advmod xcomp cc compound conj punct dep acl punct case nmod obl punct

text: In 1943 , Nida received his Ph.D. in Linguistics from the University of Michigan .
label: case obl punct nsubj root nmod obj case nmod case det obl case nmod punct

text: He was ordained as a Baptist minister .
label: nsubj aux root case det compound obl punct

text: He married Althea Lucille Sprague , who died in 1993 .
label: nsubj root obj flat flat punct nsubj acl case obl punct

text: In 1997 , he married María Elena Fernandez - Miranda , a lawyer and diplomatic attache .
label: case obl punct nsubj root obj flat flat punct flat punct det appos cc amod conj punct

text: Nida retired in the early 1980s , although he continued to give lectures in universities all around the world , and lived in Alpine , Arizona , USA ; Madrid , Spain and Brussels , Belgium .
label: nsubj root case det amod obl punct mark nsubj advcl mark xcomp obj case obl advmod case det nmod punct cc conj case obl punct appos punct appos punct conj punct appos cc conj punct appos punct

text: He died in Madrid on August 25 , 2011 aged 96 .
label: nsubj root case obl case compound obl punct nmod advcl obj punct

text: Theories
label: root

text: Nida has been a pioneer in the fields of translation theory and linguistics .
label: nsubj aux cop det root case det nmod case compound nmod cc conj punct

text: His Ph.D. dissertation , A Synopsis of English Syntax , was the first full - scale analysis of a major language according to the " immediate - constituent " theory .
label: nmod compound nsubj punct det appos case amod nmod punct cop det amod amod punct compound root case det amod nmod case fixed det punct amod punct compound punct nmod punct

text: His textbook Morphology : The Descriptive Analysis of Words was one of the major works of American Structuralism .
label: nmod nsubj appos punct det compound dep case nmod cop root case det amod nmod case amod nmod punct

text: It remained the only thorough introduction to the field for decades and is still valuable for its many examples and exercises .
label: nsubj root det amod amod xcomp case det nmod case obl cc cop advmod conj case nmod amod obl cc conj punct

text: His most notable contribution to translation theory is Dynamic Equivalence , also known as Functional Equivalence .
label: nmod advmod amod nsubj case compound nmod cop amod root punct advmod acl case amod obl punct

text: For more information , see " Dynamic and formal equivalence . "
label: case amod obl punct root punct amod cc conj obj punct punct

text: Nida also developed the componential analysis technique , which split words into their components to help determine equivalence in translation ( e.g. " bachelor " = male + unmarried ) .
label: nsubj advmod root det amod compound obj punct nsubj acl obj case nmod obl mark advcl xcomp obj case nmod punct advmod punct nsubj punct appos obj cc conj punct punct

text: This is , perhaps , not the best example of the technique , though it is the most well - known .
label: nsubj cop punct advmod punct advmod det amod root case det nmod punct mark nsubj cop det advmod advmod punct advcl punct

text: Nida 's dynamic - equivalence theory is often held in opposition to the views of philologists who maintain that an understanding of the source text ( ST ) can be achieved by assessing the inter-animation of words on the page , and that meaning is self - contained within the text ( i.e. much more focused on achieving semantic equivalence ) .
label: nmod case amod punct compound nsubj aux advmod root case obl case det nmod case nmod nsubj acl mark det nsubj case det compound nmod punct appos punct aux aux ccomp mark advcl det obj case nmod case det nmod punct cc mark nsubj cop compound punct conj case det obl punct advmod advmod advmod parataxis mark advcl amod obj punct punct

text: This theory , along with other theories of correspondence in translating , are elaborated in his essay Principles of Correspondence , where Nida begins by asserting that given that " no two languages are identical , either in the meanings given to corresponding symbols or in the ways in which symbols are arranged in phrases and sentences , it stands to reason that there can be no absolute correspondence between languages .
label: det nsubj punct advmod case amod obl case nmod mark acl punct aux root case nmod obl appos case nmod punct advmod nsubj acl mark advcl mark advcl mark punct det nummod nsubj cop ccomp punct cc case det obl acl case amod obl cc case det conj case obl nsubj aux acl case obl cc conj punct expl ccomp case obl mark expl aux cop det amod csubj case nmod punct

text: Hence , there can be no fully exact translations . "
label: advmod punct expl aux root det advmod amod nsubj punct punct

text: While the impact of a translation may be close to the original , there can be no identity in detail .
label: mark det nsubj case det nmod aux cop advcl case det obl punct expl aux root det nsubj case nmod punct

text: Nida then sets forth the differences in translation , as he would account for it , within three basic factors :
label: nsubj advmod root compound det obj case nmod punct mark nsubj aux advcl case obl punct case nummod amod obl punct

text: 1. The nature of the message : in some messages the content is of primary consideration , and in others the form must be given a higher priority .
label: dep det root case det nmod punct case det obl det nsubj cop case amod parataxis punct cc case obl det nsubj aux aux conj det amod obj punct

text: 2. The purpose of the author and of the translator : to give information on both form and content ; to aim at full intelligibility of the reader so he / she may understand the full implications of the message ; for imperative purposes that aim at not just understanding the translation but also at ensuring no misunderstanding of the translation .
label: dep det root case det nmod cc case det conj punct mark parataxis obj case cc obl cc conj punct mark conj case amod obl case det nmod mark nsubj cc conj aux advcl det amod obj case det nmod punct case amod conj nsubj acl mark advmod advmod advcl det obj cc advmod mark conj det obj case det nmod punct

text: 3. The type of audience : prospective audiences differ both in decoding ability and in potential interest .
label: dep det root case nmod punct amod nsubj parataxis cc case compound obl cc case amod conj punct

text: Nida brings in the reminder that while there are no such things as " identical equivalents " in translating , what one must in translating seek to do is find the " closest natural equivalent " .
label: nsubj root compound det obj mark mark expl advcl det amod nsubj case punct amod nmod punct mark acl punct nsubj nsubj aux mark advcl acl mark xcomp cop acl det punct amod amod obj punct punct

text: Here he identifies two basic orientations in translating based on two different types of equivalence :
label: advmod nsubj root nummod amod obj mark acl advcl case nummod amod obl case nmod punct

text: Formal Equivalence ( F - E ) and Dynamic Equivalence ( D - E ) .
label: amod root punct appos punct flat punct cc amod conj punct appos punct flat punct punct

text: F - E focuses attention on the message itself , in both form and content .
label: nsubj punct flat root obj case det obl nmod punct case cc obl cc conj punct

text: Such translations then would be concerned with such correspondences as poetry to poetry , sentence to sentence , and concept to concept .
label: amod nsubj advmod aux aux root case amod obl case nmod case nmod punct conj case nmod punct cc conj case nmod punct

text: Such a formal orientation that typifies this type of structural equivalence is called a " gloss translation " in which the translator aims at reproducing as literally and meaningfully as possible the form and content of the original .
label: det det amod nsubj nsubj acl det obj case amod nmod aux root det punct compound xcomp punct case obl det nsubj acl mark advcl advmod advmod cc conj mark advcl det obj cc conj case det nmod punct

text: The principles governing an F - E translation would then be : reproduction of grammatical units ; consistency in word usage ; and meanings in terms of the source context .
label: det nsubj acl det compound punct flat obj aux advmod cop punct root case amod nmod punct conj case compound nmod punct cc conj case nmod case det compound nmod punct

text: Theodorus of Tabennese
label: root case nmod

text: Theodorus of Tabennese ( c. 314 – 368 ) , also known as Abba Theodorus and Theodore the Sanctified was the spiritual successor to Pachomius and played a crucial role in preventing the first Christian cenobitic monastic federation from collapsing after the death of its founder .
label: nsubj case nmod punct advmod dep case nmod punct punct advmod acl case obl flat cc conj det appos cop det amod root case nmod cc conj det amod obj mark advcl det amod amod amod amod obj mark advcl case det obl case nmod nmod punct

text: Icon of St. Theodorus of Tabennese
label: root case nmod flat case nmod

text: Biography
label: root

text: According to hagiography , Theodorus was born into a wealthy Christian family and was well educated from a young age .
label: case fixed obl punct nsubj aux root case det amod amod obl cc aux advmod conj case det amod obl punct

text: Early in life he denied the excesses of his parents , and at the age of fourteen joined a monastery in the diocese of Sne , near the modern town of Esna , Egypt .
label: advmod case obl nsubj root det obj case nmod nmod punct cc case det obl case nmod conj det obj case det obl case nmod punct case det amod obl case nmod punct appos punct

text: A brother from Theodorus ’ monastery stayed with Pachomius in Tabennese while traveling and preached of the virtues of the Koinonia upon his return to Sne .
label: det nsubj case nmod case nmod root case obl case obl mark advcl cc conj case det obl case det nmod case nmod obl case nmod punct

text: Praying and weeping , Theodorus became determined that his destiny lay with Pachomius .
label: advcl cc conj punct nsubj root xcomp mark nmod nsubj ccomp case obl punct

text: Although initially denied passage to Tabennese by a Pachomian monk due to his wealthy background , Theodorus opted to follow the visiting monk , and his persistence ( and lack of obedience ) paid off .
label: mark advmod advcl obj case nmod case det amod obl case fixed nmod amod obl punct nsubj root mark xcomp det amod obj punct cc nmod nsubj punct cc conj case nmod punct conj compound punct

text: He was welcomed by Pachomius upon his arrival , and quickly integrated into the community at Tabennese around 328 .
label: nsubj aux root case obl case nmod obl punct cc advmod conj case det obl case nmod case obl punct

text: Quickly becoming a favorite of Pachomius , Theodorus lived an enviably ascetic life in the monastery , and took on the title of the " brothers ’ comforter " .
label: advmod advcl det xcomp case nmod punct nsubj root det advmod amod obj case det obl punct cc conj compound det obj case det punct nmod case nmod punct punct

text: Theodorus asserted his influence openly ( which resulted in reprimands from Pachomius ) and generally maintained himself as a prominent figure at Tabennese for several years , despite never being given a position of power in the monastic hierarchy .
label: nsubj root nmod obj advmod punct nsubj advcl case obl case nmod punct cc advmod conj obj case det amod obl case nmod case amod obl punct mark advmod aux advcl det obj case nmod case det amod nmod punct

text: Finally , Pachomius called on him to preach to the brothers despite his youth , and eventually appointed him steward of Tabennese after several new monasteries had been built .
label: advmod punct nsubj root case obl mark xcomp case det obl case nmod obl punct cc advmod conj obj xcomp case nmod mark amod amod nsubj aux aux advcl punct

text: Retiring to the monastery of Phbow , Pachomius gave Theodorus complete control over Tabennese , though recalled him from the position after witnessing several monks under Theodorus ’ watch violating the monastic rules without reprimand .
label: advcl case det obl case nmod punct nsubj root iobj amod obj case nmod punct advmod conj obj case det obl mark advcl amod obj case nmod case nmod xcomp det amod obj case obl punct

text: Having failed to prove his governing ability and once more in a position no higher than when he had entered the monastery , Theodorus became a personal assistant to Pachomius and remained relatively quiet for some years .
label: aux advcl mark xcomp nmod compound obj cc advmod advmod case det conj advmod amod case obl nsubj aux advcl det obj punct nsubj root det amod xcomp case nmod cc conj advmod xcomp case det obl punct

text: Despite his clear potential and popularity , Pachomius refused to grant Theodorus any kind of authority ; though the old man 's failing health soon changed things forever .
label: case nmod amod obl cc conj punct nsubj root mark xcomp iobj det obj case nmod punct mark det amod nmod case amod nsubj advmod parataxis obj advmod punct

text: After Theodorus had been assisting Pachomius at Tabennese for several years following his demotion , Pachomius became very ill and seemed to be on the verge of death .
label: mark nsubj aux aux advcl obj case obl case amod obl case nmod nmod punct nsubj root advmod xcomp cc conj mark cop case det xcomp case nmod punct

text: Pachomius had not named a successor , and several brothers pleaded with Theodorus to assert himself as head of the Koinonia when the sickly man died .
label: nsubj aux advmod root det obj punct cc amod nsubj conj case obl mark xcomp obj case obl case det nmod advmod det amod nsubj advcl punct

text: Despite the assertion that Theodorus apparently did not want the rank of a father or this world 's glory , he consented .
label: case det obl mark nsubj advmod aux advmod acl det obj case det nmod cc det nmod case conj punct nsubj root punct

text: Unfortunately for the would - be leader , Pachomius recovered , and upon hearing of Theodorus ’ decision , exiled the ambitious young man .
label: advmod case det aux punct acl obl punct nsubj root punct cc mark advcl case nmod case obl punct conj det amod amod obj punct

text: After living a life of constant weeping and prayer in solitude , Pachomius forgave Theodorus and allowed him to live among the brothers once more .

text: The Chemical Wedding by Christian Rosencreutz is the way I ’ve decided to present the title of this book .

text: Most versions in English are called The Chemical Wedding of Christian Rosencreutz , which suggests ( and most people who ’ve heard of it suppose ) that the wedding is Christian ’s .

text: I ’ll call it herein ( as everyone mostly does ) simply The Chemical Wedding .

text: All of a sudden a terrible wind blew up , so strong that I thought the hill my little house was built on would be blown apart – but I ’d seen the Devil do things as bad as this before ( the Devil had often tried to harm me ) , so I took heart and went on meditating .

label: det nsubj root advmod punct advmod amod cc conj punct case det compound punct amod obl punct det nsubj appos obl

text: Biologist Nick Bos tells Wikinews about ' self - medicating ' ants
label: nsubj flat flat root iobj case punct compound punct amod punct obl

text: Tuesday , September 1 , 2015
label: root punct compound appos punct nmod

text: Formica fusca , from file .
label: compound root punct case nmod punct

text: Image : Mathias Krumbholz .
label: root punct dep flat punct

text: Nick Bos , of the University of Helsinki , studies " the amazing adaptations social insects have evolved in order to fight the extreme parasite pressure they experience " .
label: nsubj flat punct case det nmod case nmod punct root punct det amod obj amod nsubj aux acl mark fixed mark advcl det amod compound obj nsubj acl punct punct

text: In a recently - accepted Evolution paper Bos and colleagues describe ants appearing to self - medicate .
label: case det advmod punct amod compound obl nsubj cc conj root obj acl mark compound punct xcomp punct

text: " I have no doubt that as time goes on , there will be more and more cases documented "
label: punct nsubj root det obj mark mark nsubj advcl compound punct expl aux acl amod cc conj nsubj acl punct

text: The team used Formica fusca , an ant species that can form thousand - strong colonies .
label: det nsubj root compound obj punct det compound appos nsubj aux acl compound punct amod obj punct

text: This common black ant eats other insects , and also aphid honeydew .
label: det amod amod nsubj root amod obj punct cc advmod compound conj punct

text: It often nests in tree stumps or under rocks and foraging workers can sometimes be spotted climbing trees .
label: nsubj advmod root case compound obl cc case conj cc amod nsubj aux advmod aux conj xcomp obj punct

text: Some ants were infected with Beauveria bassiana , a fungus .
label: det nsubj aux root case compound obl punct det appos punct

text: Infected ants chose food laced with toxic hydrogen peroxide , whereas healthy ants avoided it .
label: amod nsubj root obj acl case amod compound obl punct mark amod nsubj advcl obj punct

text: Hydrogen peroxide reduced infected ant fatalities by 15 % , and the ants varied their intake depending upon how high the peroxide concentration was .
label: compound nsubj root amod compound obj case nummod nmod punct cc det nsubj conj nmod obj case fixed advmod obl det compound nsubj advcl punct

text: In the wild , Formica fusca can encounter similar chemicals in aphids and dead ants .
label: case det obl punct compound nsubj aux root amod obj case nmod cc amod conj punct

text: The Independent reported self - medicating ants a first among insects .
label: det nsubj root compound punct amod nsubj det ccomp case obl punct

text: Bos obtained his doctorate from the University of Copenhagen .
label: nsubj root nmod obj case det obl case nmod punct

text: He began postdoctoral research at Helsinki in 2012 .
label: nsubj root amod obj case obl case obl punct

text: He also runs the AntyScience blog .
label: nsubj advmod root det compound obj punct

text: The blog aims to help address " a gap between scientists and ' the general public ' . "
label: det nsubj root mark xcomp xcomp punct det obj case nmod cc punct det amod conj punct punct punct

text: The name is a pun referencing ants , its primary topic , science , and " non-scientific " jargon - free communication .
label: det nsubj cop det root acl obj punct nmod amod appos punct conj punct cc punct amod punct compound punct amod conj punct

text: He now discusses his work with Wikinews .
label: nsubj advmod root nmod obj case obl punct

text: Beauveria bassiana on a cicada in Bolivia .
label: compound root case det nmod case nmod punct

text: Image : Danny Newman .
label: root punct dep flat punct

text: What first attracted you to researching ants ?
label: nsubj advmod root obj mark advcl obj punct

text: Me and a studymate were keeping a lot of animals during our studies , from beetles , to butterflies and mantids , to ants .
label: nsubj cc det conj aux root det obj case nmod case nmod obl punct case nmod punct case nmod cc conj punct case nmod punct

text: We had the ants in an observation nest , and I could just look at them for hours , watching them go about .
label: nsubj root det obj case det compound obl punct cc nsubj aux advmod conj case obl case obl punct advcl obj xcomp advmod punct

text: This was in my third year of Biology study I think .
label: nsubj cop case nmod amod ccomp case compound nmod nsubj root punct

text: After a while I needed to start thinking about an internship for my M.Sc. studies , and decided to write a couple of professors .
label: case det obl nsubj root mark xcomp xcomp case det obl case nmod compound nmod punct cc conj mark xcomp det iobj case nmod punct

text: I ended up going to the Centre for Social Evolution at the University of Copenhagen where I did a project on learning in Ants under supervision of Prof. Patrizia d'Ettorre .
label: nsubj root compound xcomp case det obl case amod nmod case det nmod case nmod advmod nsubj advcl det obj mark acl case obl case obl case nmod flat flat punct

text: I liked it so much there I ended up doing a PhD and I 've been working on social insects ever since .
label: nsubj root obj advmod advmod advmod nsubj advcl compound xcomp det obj cc nsubj aux aux conj case amod obl advmod advmod punct

text: What methods and equipment were used for this investigation ?
label: amod nsubj cc conj aux root case det obl punct

text: This is a fun one .
label: nsubj cop det amod root punct

text: I try to work on a very low budget , and like to build most of the experimental setups myself ( we actually have equipment in the lab nicknamed the ' Nickinator ' , ' i-Nick ' and the ' Nicktendo64 ' ) .
label: nsubj root mark xcomp case det advmod amod obl punct cc conj mark xcomp obj case det amod obl obl punct nsubj advmod parataxis obj case det obl acl det punct obj punct punct punct conj punct cc det punct conj punct punct punct

text: There 's not that much money in fundamental science at the moment , so I try to cut the costs wherever possible .
label: expl root advmod obl amod nsubj case amod obl case det obl punct advmod nsubj parataxis mark xcomp det obj advmod advcl punct

text: We collected wild colonies of Formica fusca by searching through old tree - trunks in old logging sites in southern Finland .
label: nsubj root amod obj case compound nmod mark advcl case amod compound punct obl case amod compound nmod case amod nmod punct

text: We then housed the ants in nests I made using Y - tong [ aerated concrete ] .
label: nsubj advmod root det obj case obl nsubj acl xcomp compound punct obj punct amod appos punct punct

text: It 's very soft stone that you can easily carve .
label: nsubj cop advmod amod root obj nsubj aux advmod acl punct

text: We carved out little squares for the ants to live in ( covered with old CD covers to prevent them escaping ! ) .
label: nsubj root compound amod obj case det nmod mark acl obl punct acl case amod compound obl mark advcl obj xcomp punct punct punct

text: We then drilled a tunnel to a pot ( the foraging arena ) , where the ants got the choice between the food with medicine and the food without .
label: nsubj advmod root det obj case det obl punct det compound appos punct punct advmod det nsubj acl det obj case det nmod case nmod cc det conj nmod punct

text: We infected the ants by preparing a solution of the fungus Beauveria bassiana .
label: nsubj root det obj mark advcl det obj case det nmod compound appos punct

text: Afterwards , each ant was dipped in the solution for a couple of seconds , dried on a cloth and put in the nest .
label: advmod punct det nsubj aux root case det obl case det obl case nmod punct conj case det obl cc conj case det obl punct

text: After exposing the ants to the fungus , we took pictures of each foraging arena three times per day , and counted how many ants were present on each food - source .
label: mark advcl det obj case det obl punct nsubj root obj case det compound nmod nummod obl case nmod punct cc conj advmod amod obj cop acl case det compound punct obl punct

text: Example of aerated concrete , which provided a home for the subjects .
label: root case amod nmod punct nsubj acl det obj case det nmod punct

text: Image : Marco Bernardini .
label: root punct dep flat punct

text: This gave us the data that ants choose more medicine after they have been infected .
label: nsubj root iobj det obj mark nsubj acl amod obj mark nsubj aux aux advcl punct

text: The result that healthy ants die sooner when ingesting ROS [ Reactive Oxygen Species , the group of chemicals that includes hydrogen peroxide ] but infected ants die less was obtained in another way ( as you have to ' force feed ' the ROS , as healthy ants , when given the choice , ignore that food - source . )
label: det nsubj mark amod nsubj acl advmod advmod advcl obj punct amod compound appos punct det appos case nmod nsubj acl compound obj punct cc amod nsubj conj advmod aux root case det obl punct mark nsubj advcl mark punct advmod xcomp punct det obj punct mark amod nsubj punct advmod advcl det obj punct advcl det compound punct obj punct punct

text: For this we basically put colonies on a diet of either food with medicine or without for a while .
label: case obl nsubj advmod root obj case det obl case cc nmod case nmod cc conj case det obl punct

text: And afterwards either infected them or not .
label: cc advmod cc root obj cc conj punct

text: Then for about two weeks we count every day how many ants died .
label: advmod case advmod nummod obl nsubj root det obl advmod amod obj acl punct

text: This gives us the data to do a so - called survival analysis .
label: nsubj root iobj det obj mark acl det advmod punct amod compound obj punct

text: We measured the ROS - concentration in the bodies of ants after they ingested the food with the medicine using a spectrophotometer .
label: nsubj root det compound punct obj case det nmod case nmod mark nsubj advcl det obj case det nmod advcl det obj punct

text: By adding certain chemicals , the ROS can be measured using the emission of light of a certain wave - length .
label: mark advcl amod obj punct det nsubj aux aux root xcomp det obj case nmod case det amod compound punct nmod punct

text: The detrimental effect of ROS on spores was easy to measure .
label: det amod nsubj case nmod case nmod cop root mark xcomp punct

text: We mixed different concentrations of ROS with the spores , plated them out on petri dishes with an agar - solution where fungus can grow on .
label: nsubj root amod obj case nmod case det obl punct conj obj compound case compound obl case det compound punct nmod obl nsubj aux acl case punct

text: A day after , we counted how many spores were still alive .
label: det obl advmod punct nsubj root advmod amod obj aux advmod acl punct

text: How reliable do you consider your results to be ?
label: advmod xcomp aux nsubj root nmod obj mark cop punct

text: The results we got are very reliable .
label: det nsubj nsubj acl cop advmod root punct

text: We had a lot of colonies containing a lot of ants , and wherever possible we conducted the experiment blind .
label: nsubj root det obj case nmod acl det obj case nmod punct cc advmod advcl nsubj conj det obj advcl punct

text: This means the experimenter does n't know which ants belong to which treatment , so it 's impossible to influence the results with ' observer bias ' .
label: nsubj root det nsubj aux advmod ccomp det nsubj ccomp case det obl punct advmod expl cop parataxis mark csubj det obj case punct compound obl punct punct

text: However , of course this is proof in just one species .
label: advmod punct advmod fixed nsubj cop root case advmod nummod nmod punct

text: It is hard to extrapolate to other ants , as different species lead very different lives .
label: expl cop root mark csubj case amod obl punct mark amod nsubj advcl advmod amod obj punct

text: Over 50 years .

text: I am 61 now so I really started when I was about 10 years old even though I had seen and worked with some basic tricks a few years earlier .
label: nsubj cop root advmod mark nsubj advmod advcl advmod nsubj cop advmod nummod obl advcl advmod mark nsubj aux advcl cc conj case det amod obl det amod obl advmod punct

text: I remember going into Hollywood Magic and wanting that big red box with the dragons on it and I did n't even know what it did .

text: The magician behind the counter was wise enough not to sell it to me , but instead sold me two books which I still own today - " Scarne on Card Tricks " and " Scarne on Magic Tricks " .

label: aux det nsubj root cc conj obj punct

text: Both .
label: root punct

text: I think it has helped draw younger people to magic as a hobby , but I think it has hurt the ability of young magicians to think because so many rely on the internet for everything and they are n't reading the books .

text: Moreover , seeing someone perform on the internet takes away the use of our senses , originality and imagination that reading and thinking about magic can produce .

text: Political activist and philosopher Noam Chomsky

text: On NATO
label: case root

text: I just wanted to know if you had any thoughts on recent NATO actions and the protests coming up at the 60th NATO conference , I know you ’re speaking at the counter-conference .
label: nsubj advmod root mark xcomp mark nsubj ccomp det obj case amod compound nmod cc det conj acl compound case det amod compound obl punct nsubj parataxis nsubj aux ccomp case det obl punct

text: Could be I give so many talks I ca n’t remember .
label: aux root nsubj parataxis advmod amod obj nsubj aux advmod advcl punct

text: On the NATO conference , well I mean the obvious question is why should NATO exist ?
label: case det compound nmod punct discourse nsubj parataxis det amod nsubj cop advmod aux nsubj root punct

text: In fact you can ask questions about why it should ever have existed , but now why should it exist .
label: case obl nsubj aux root obj case obl nsubj aux advmod aux advcl punct cc advmod advmod aux nsubj conj punct

text: I mean the theory was , whether you believe it or not , that it would be a defensive alliance against potential Soviet aggression , that ’s the basic doctrine .
label: nsubj parataxis det nsubj cop punct mark nsubj advcl obj cc conj punct mark nsubj aux cop det amod root case amod amod nmod punct nsubj cop det amod parataxis punct

text: Well there ’s no defense against Soviet aggression , so whether you believe that doctrine or not that ’s gone .
label: discourse expl root det nsubj case amod nmod punct advmod mark nsubj advcl det obj cc conj nsubj cop parataxis punct

text: When the Soviet Union collapsed there had been an agreement , a recent agreement , between Gorbachev and the U.S government and the first Bush administration .
label: advmod det compound nsubj advcl expl aux root det nsubj punct det amod appos punct case nmod cc det compound conj cc det amod compound conj punct

text: The agreement was that Gorbachev agreed to a quite remarkable concession : he agreed to let a united Germany join the NATO military alliance .
label: det nsubj cop mark nsubj root case det advmod amod obl punct nsubj parataxis mark xcomp det amod obj xcomp det compound amod obj punct

text: Now it is remarkable in the light of history , the history of the past century , Germany alone had virtually destroyed Russia , twice , and Germany backed by a hostile military alliance , centered in the most phenomenal military power in history , that ’s a real threat .
label: discourse nsubj cop root case det obl case nmod punct det appos case det amod nmod punct nsubj advmod aux advmod parataxis obj punct advmod punct cc dislocated acl case det amod amod obl punct acl case det advmod amod amod obl case nmod punct nsubj cop det amod conj punct

text: Nevertheless he agreed , but there was a quid pro quo , namely that NATO should not expand to the east , so Russia would at least have a kind of security zone .
label: advmod nsubj root punct cc expl conj det nsubj case nmod punct advmod mark nsubj aux advmod acl case det obl punct mark nsubj aux advmod fixed parataxis det obj case compound nmod punct

text: And George Bush and James Baker , secretary of state , agreed that NATO would not expand one inch to the east .
label: cc nsubj flat cc conj flat punct appos case nmod punct root mark nsubj aux advmod ccomp nummod obj case det obl punct

text: Gorbachev also proposed a nuclear free weapons zone in the region , but the U.S would n’t consider that .
label: nsubj advmod root det compound amod compound obj case det nmod punct cc det nsubj aux advmod conj obj punct

text: Okay , so that was the basis on which then shortly after the Soviet Union collapsed .
label: discourse punct advmod nsubj cop det root case obl advmod advmod obl det compound nsubj acl punct

text: Well , Clinton came into office what did he do ?
label: discourse punct nsubj root case obl obj aux nsubj parataxis punct

text: Well one of the first things he did was to back down on the promise of not expanding NATO to the east .
label: discourse nsubj case det amod nmod nsubj acl cop mark root compound case det obl mark advmod acl obj case det obl punct

text: Well that ’s a significant threat to the Soviet Union , to Russia now that there was no longer any Soviet Union , it was a significant threat to Russia and not surprisingly they responded by beefing up their offensive capacity , not much but some .
label: discourse nsubj cop det amod root case det compound nmod punct case nmod advmod mark expl advcl advmod advmod det compound nsubj punct nsubj cop det amod parataxis case nmod cc advmod advmod nsubj conj mark advcl compound nmod amod obj punct advmod advmod cc conj punct

text: So they rescinded their pledge not to use nuclear weapons on first strike , NATO had never rescinded it , but they had and started some remilitarization .
label: advmod nsubj root nmod obj advmod mark acl amod obj case amod obl punct nsubj aux advmod parataxis obj punct cc nsubj conj cc conj det obj punct

text: With Bush , the aggressive militarism of the Bush administration , as predicted , induced Russia to extend further its offensive military capacity ; it ’s still going on right now .
label: case obl punct det amod nsubj case det compound nmod punct mark advcl punct root obj mark xcomp advmod nmod amod amod obj punct nsubj aux advmod parataxis compound advmod advmod punct

text: When Bush proposed the missile defense systems in Eastern Europe , Poland and Czechoslovakia , it was a real provocation to the Soviet Union .
label: advmod nsubj advcl det compound compound obj case amod nmod punct conj cc conj punct nsubj cop det amod root case det compound nmod punct

text: I mean that was discussed in U.S arms control journals , that they would have to regard as a potential threat to their strategic deterrent , meaning as a first strike weapon .
label: nsubj parataxis nsubj aux root case compound compound compound obl punct mark nsubj aux dislocated mark xcomp case det amod obl case nmod amod nmod punct advcl case det amod compound obl punct

text: And the claim was that it had to do with Iranian missiles , but forget about that .
label: cc det nsubj cop mark nsubj root mark xcomp case amod obl punct cc conj case obl punct

text: Take say on Obama , Obama ’s national security advisor James Jones former Marine commandant is on record of favoring expansion of NATO to the south and the east , further expansion of NATO , and also making it an intervention force .
label: root discourse case obl punct nmod case amod compound nsubj appos flat amod compound appos cop case parataxis mark acl obj case nmod case det nmod cc det conj punct amod appos case nmod punct cc advmod conj obj det compound xcomp punct

text: And the head of NATO , Hoop Scheffer , he has explained that NATO must take on responsibility for ensuring the security of pipelines and sea lanes , that is NATO must be a guarantor of energy supplies for the West .
label: cc det dep case nmod punct appos flat punct nsubj aux root mark nsubj aux ccomp compound obj mark acl det obj case nmod cc compound conj punct advmod fixed nsubj aux cop det parataxis case compound nmod case det nmod punct

text: Well that ’s kind of an unending war , so do we want NATO to exist , do we want there to be a Western military alliance that carries out these activities , with no pretense of defense ?
label: discourse nsubj cop advmod fixed det amod root punct advmod aux nsubj parataxis obj mark xcomp punct aux nsubj parataxis expl mark xcomp det amod amod nsubj nsubj acl compound det obj punct case det obl case nmod punct

text: Well I think that ’s a pretty good question ; I do n’t see why it should , I mean there happens to be no other military alliance remotely comparable — if there happened to be one I ’d be opposed to that too .
label: discourse nsubj root nsubj cop det advmod amod ccomp punct nsubj aux advmod parataxis obj nsubj advcl punct nsubj parataxis expl parataxis mark xcomp det amod amod nsubj advmod amod punct mark expl advcl mark xcomp nsubj nsubj aux aux parataxis case obl advmod punct

text: So I think the first question is , what is this all about , why should we even be debating NATO , is there any reason why it should exist ?
label: advmod nsubj root det amod nsubj cop punct ccomp cop nsubj advmod case punct advmod aux nsubj advmod aux parataxis obj punct parataxis expl det nsubj advmod nsubj aux acl punct

text: Labor actions as a revival of the Left
label: compound root case det nmod case det nmod

text: We ’ve seen mass strikes all around the world , in countries that we would n’t expect it .
label: nsubj aux root amod obj advmod case det nmod punct case nmod mark nsubj aux advmod acl obj punct

text: Do you think this is a revival of the Left in the West ?
label: aux nsubj root nsubj cop det ccomp case det nmod case det nmod punct

text: Or do you think it ’s nothing ?
label: cc aux nsubj root nsubj cop ccomp punct

text: It ’s really hard to tell .

text: I mean there ’s certainly signs of it , and in the United States too , in fact we had a sit down strike in the United States not long ago , which is a very militant labor action .
label: nsubj parataxis expl root advmod nsubj case nmod punct cc case det amod conj advmod punct case obl nsubj parataxis det compound compound obj case det amod obl advmod advmod advmod punct nsubj cop det advmod amod compound acl punct

text: Sit down strikes which began at a significant level in the 1930’s were very threatening to management and ownership , because the sit down strike is one step before workers taking over the factory and running it and kicking out the management , and probably doing a better job .
label: compound compound nsubj nsubj acl case det amod obl case det obl cop advmod root case obl cc conj punct mark det compound compound nsubj cop nummod advcl mark nsubj acl compound det obj cc conj obj cc conj compound det obj punct cc advmod conj det amod obj punct

text: So that ’s a frightening idea , and police were called in and so on .
label: advmod nsubj cop det amod root punct cc nsubj aux conj compound cc advmod conj punct

text: Well we just had one in the United States at the Republic Windows and Doors Factory , it ’s hard to know , I mean these things are just hard to predict , they may take off , and they may take on a broader scope , they may fizzle away or be diverted .
label: discourse nsubj advmod root obj case det amod obl case det compound compound cc conj obl punct nsubj cop parataxis mark acl punct nsubj parataxis det nsubj cop advmod parataxis mark acl punct nsubj aux parataxis compound punct cc nsubj aux conj compound det amod obj punct nsubj aux parataxis advmod cc aux conj punct

text: What inspired you to create a cocktail after the santorum neologism ?

text: The technology that Frank and his colleagues are using to explore the ice is so important because , given our lack of data , we have no reasonable expectation of what it should be like , or what it should n't be like .

text: Although I am sure that being there would enhance my understanding of the animals and the system in which they live , and would help me formulate more and better questions about the anemones , ship time is expensive , especially in Antarctica , and if there are biologists whose contribution is predicated on being there , they should have priority to be there .

text: What we could do , however , was to study anatomy and figure out what it is , so that when we have samples preserved for studying e.g. , the genome , transcriptome , or metabolome , or conduct tests of the fluid in the burrows or in the animals themselves , we can make precise comparisons , and figure out what these animals have or do ( metabolically or chemically ) that lets them live where they live .

text: Just knowing a whole lot about a single species is n't very useful , even if that animal is as special as these clearly are - we need to know what about them is different and thus related to living in this strange way .

text: wikiHow is a wiki - based site which aims to " build the world 's largest , highest quality how - to manual . "
label: nsubj cop det compound punct amod root nsubj acl mark punct xcomp det nmod case amod punct amod compound compound punct acl obj punct punct

text: It recently published its 50,000th article , and to discuss what the site has achieved since its creation , Wikinews interviewed the site 's founder , Jack Herrick .
label: nsubj advmod root nmod amod obj punct cc mark advcl obj det nsubj aux acl case nmod obl punct nsubj conj det nmod case obj punct appos flat punct

text: In the interview , Herrick explains what wikiHow is , why he decided to create it , how he grew it in size , and why he chose to use a Creative Commons license ( HyperLink ) for his site .

text: Interview
label: root

text: For our readers who are unaware of your site , could you briefly explain what wikiHow is ?
label: case nmod obl nsubj cop acl case nmod obl punct aux nsubj advmod root obj nsubj acl punct

text: Sure .
label: root punct

text: wikiHow is a collaborative effort to build the world 's largest , highest quality how - to manual .
label: nsubj cop det amod root mark acl det nmod case amod punct amod compound compound punct acl obj punct

text: Our long term goal is to produce practical instructions on almost every topic in every language .
label: nmod amod compound nsubj cop mark root amod obj case advmod det nmod case det nmod punct

text: We 're quite far from our goals currently , but we take comfort in the fact that every month wikiHow gets noticeably better and larger
label: nsubj cop advmod root case nmod obl advmod punct cc nsubj conj obj case det obl mark det obl nsubj acl advmod xcomp cc conj

text: We currently have just under 50000 articles and over 1000 featured articles .
label: nsubj advmod root advmod advmod nummod obj cc advmod nummod amod conj punct

text: We hope that in time , we will have millions of articles with many of them having featured status .
label: nsubj root mark case obl punct nsubj aux ccomp obj case nmod mark nsubj case obl advcl amod obj punct

text: That said , we are realistic enough to realize that this goal will take decades to achieve .
label: nsubj advcl punct nsubj cop root advmod mark advcl mark det nsubj aux ccomp obj mark xcomp punct

text: However , in terms of readership , we are probably the most popular single subject wiki after Wikipedia .
label: advmod punct case nmod case nmod punct nsubj cop advmod det advmod amod amod compound root case obl punct

text: We get over 14 million unique visitors per month ( source : Google Analytics ) , which makes us the 135th most popular site according to Quantcast .
label: nsubj root advmod compound nummod amod obj case obl punct parataxis punct compound dep punct punct nsubj advcl obj det advmod advmod amod xcomp case fixed obl punct

text: [ Note : The interview took place just before the 50000 milestone was met ]
label: punct root punct det nsubj parataxis obj advmod mark det nummod nsubj aux advcl punct

text: Like Wikipedia , wikiHow is a wiki that runs on Mediawiki software .
label: case obl punct nsubj cop det root nsubj acl case compound obl punct

text: Our community is full of volunteers from all over the world .
label: nmod nsubj cop root case obl case advmod case det nmod punct

text: That said , we are quite different from Wikipedia in several respects :
label: nsubj advcl punct nsubj cop advmod root case obl case amod obl punct

text: We are much smaller .
label: nsubj cop advmod root punct

text: The English wikiHow has only 60 admins , compared to the 1000 + on English Wikipedia .
label: det compound nsubj root advmod nummod obj punct advcl case det obl advmod case compound nmod punct

text: As a result , wikiHow is still at the size that every editor eventually gets to know other editors .
label: case det nmod punct nsubj cop advmod case det root mark det nsubj advmod acl mark xcomp amod obj punct

text: We are run as a Hybrid Organization - a for-profit company focused on achieving a social good .
label: nsubj aux root case det amod obl punct det amod appos acl mark advcl det amod obj punct

text: This has several advantages and disadvantages when compared to the non-profit structure at the Wikimedia Foundation .
label: nsubj root amod obj cc conj advmod advcl case det amod obl case det compound nmod punct

text: We show opt - out advertising to anonymous visitors rather than ask for donations .
label: nsubj root compound punct compound obj case amod obl cc fixed conj case obl punct

text: Our advertising revenue funds community meetups and has even allowed us to donate over $ 60,000 to charities such as the Wikimedia Foundation and Creative Commons .
label: nmod compound nsubj root compound obj cc aux advmod conj iobj mark xcomp advmod obj nummod case obl case fixed det compound nmod cc amod conj punct

text: ( http://www.wikihow.com/wikiHow:Contributions-to-Charity ) .

text: In addition , we 've used our revenue on things like buying carbon offsets to become carbon neutral .

text: ( http://www.wikihow.com/wikiHow:Carbon-Neutral )

text: Our community culture is focused on wikiLove and civility .
label: nmod compound nsubj aux root case obl cc conj punct

text: As a result some folks believe wikiHow is a more humane and enjoyable place to work than other places online .
label: case det obl det nsubj root nsubj cop det advmod amod cc conj ccomp mark acl case amod obl advmod punct

text: Why did you decide to create wikiHow ?
label: advmod aux nsubj root mark xcomp obj punct

text: I think that providing people with a practical education is one of the most empowering things you can offer a person .
label: nsubj root mark csubj obj case det amod obl cop ccomp case det advmod amod nmod nsubj aux acl det iobj punct

text: Imagine having detailed step - by - step instructions on how to do any activity you could imagine .
label: root xcomp amod compound punct case punct nmod obj case nmod mark acl det obj nsubj aux acl punct

text: How much more could you accomplish as an individual if you could learn any activity ?
label: advmod advmod obj aux nsubj root case det obl mark nsubj aux advcl det obj punct

text: I think that building a universal how - to manual would be a tremendous gift for the world .
label: nsubj root mark csubj det amod compound punct acl obj aux cop det amod ccomp case det nmod punct

text: Knowledge is power and wikiHow has the potential to make all of us a bit more powerful .
label: nsubj cop root cc nsubj conj det obj mark acl obj case nmod det obl advmod xcomp punct

text: I 've been interested in building a comprehensive how - to manual long before I first envisioned wikiHow .
label: nsubj aux cop root mark advcl det amod compound punct acl obj advmod mark nsubj advmod advcl obj punct

text: My first attempt at building this resource was a website I used to run called eHow .
label: nmod amod nsubj mark acl det obj cop det root nsubj acl mark xcomp acl xcomp punct

text: eHow was and continues to be the largest and how to website in the world .
label: nsubj root cc conj mark cop det amod reparandum compound acl xcomp case det nmod punct

text: eHow contains copyrighted content run on proprietary software .
label: nsubj root amod obj acl case amod obl punct

text: When I ran eHow , the content was professionally produced and edited .
label: advmod nsubj advcl obj punct det nsubj aux advmod root cc conj punct

text: This business model worked for producing content on topics that appeal to advertisers in languages like English that have large advertising markets .
label: det compound nsubj root mark advcl obj case nmod nsubj acl case obl case nmod case nmod nsubj acl amod compound obj punct

text: However , paying people to write and edit articles ultimately means that you have to make one of two sacrifices .
label: advmod punct csubj iobj mark xcomp cc conj obj advmod root mark nsubj ccomp mark xcomp obj case nummod nmod punct

text: You either 1) sacrifice on breadth and do n't produce the topics that wo n't interest advertisers , or 2) you sacrifice on quality and produce content that does n't cost much to write .
label: nsubj cc dep root case obl cc aux advmod conj det obj nsubj aux advmod acl obj punct cc dep nsubj conj case obl cc conj obj nsubj aux advmod acl obj mark advcl punct

text: I was n't interested in making either of these sacrifices , as I think the world 's how to manual needs to be high quality AND comprehensive .
label: nsubj cop advmod root mark advcl obj case det nmod punct mark nsubj advcl det nmod case compound acl nsubj ccomp mark cop amod xcomp cc conj punct

text: So ultimately I decided that eHow 's model would not build the resource I envisioned .
label: advmod advmod nsubj root mark nmod case nsubj aux advmod ccomp det obj nsubj acl punct

text: When I discovered Wikipedia , I recognized that the wiki model had the potential to build the how - to resource the world really needs .
label: advmod nsubj advcl obj punct nsubj root mark det compound nsubj ccomp det obj mark acl det compound punct acl obj det nsubj advmod acl punct

text: So I decided to sell eHow and use the proceeds to build wikiHow .
label: advmod nsubj root mark xcomp obj cc conj det obj mark advcl obj punct

text: Why did you decide to use a Creative Commons license ?
label: advmod aux nsubj root mark xcomp det amod compound obj punct

text: We use a Creative Commons license to give our community the right to fork ( http://www.wikihow.com/wikiHow:Right-to-Fork ) .
label: nsubj root det amod compound obj mark advcl nmod iobj det obj mark acl punct parataxis punct punct

text: In my opinion , people should be hesitant to contribute to websites where you only have the " right to leave . "
label: case nmod obl punct nsubj aux cop root mark xcomp case obl advmod nsubj advmod acl det punct obj mark acl punct punct

text: If wikiHow volunteers think our site is going in the wrong direction , they can take all the content and all the software and move the project elsewhere .
label: mark compound nsubj advcl nmod nsubj aux ccomp case det amod obl punct nsubj aux root det det obj cc det det conj cc conj det obj xcomp punct

text: This is possible because we release all of our software under the Open Source GPL license and release our content under a Creative Commons license .
label: nsubj cop root mark nsubj advcl obj case nmod nmod case det amod compound compound obl cc conj nmod obj case det amod compound obl punct

text: This right to fork guarantees that wikiHow , the company , will always serve the goal of the mission and our volunteer community .
label: det nsubj mark acl root mark nsubj punct det appos punct aux advmod ccomp det obj case det nmod cc nmod compound conj punct

text: I believe that offering this right to fork has been a key element of our success thus far .
label: nsubj root mark csubj det obj mark acl aux cop det amod ccomp case nmod nmod advmod advmod punct

text: My hope is that over time , internet users will demand this of any site where they invest their time in a way that creates value for others .
label: nmod nsubj cop mark case obl punct compound nsubj aux root obj case det obl advmod nsubj acl nmod obj case det obl nsubj acl obj case obl punct

text: That said , when we started out I did n't know the difference between the GNU Free Document License and my California Driver 's license .
label: nsubj advcl punct advmod nsubj advcl compound nsubj aux advmod root det obj case det compound amod compound nmod cc nmod compound nmod case conj punct

text: As a result , we made some mistakes along the path .
label: case det obl punct nsubj root det obj case det obl punct

text: In retrospect , I think we probably should have selected the CC BY - SA license instead of CC - BY - SA - NC .
label: case obl punct nsubj root nsubj advmod aux aux ccomp det compound flat punct flat obj case fixed nmod punct flat punct flat punct flat punct

text: At a minimum this would provide a helpful compatibility with other wikis and free culture projects .
label: case det obl nsubj aux root det amod obj case amod nmod cc amod compound conj punct

text: wikiHow now has millions of visitors per month .
label: nsubj advmod root obj case nmod case obl punct

text: How did you grow the site to the size it is today ?
label: advmod aux nsubj root det obj case det obl nsubj acl obl punct

text: In December 2008 , wikiHow had over 14 million unique visitors according to Google Analytics ( Full data : http://www.wikihow.com/wikiHow:Statistics ) .
label: case obl nmod punct nsubj root advmod compound nummod amod obj case fixed compound obl punct amod parataxis punct dep punct punct

text: Quantcast ranks wikiHow as the 135th most popular site in the US .
label: nsubj root obj case det advmod advmod amod obl case det nmod punct

text: ( http://www.quantcast.com/wikihow.com ) .
label: punct root punct punct

text: wikiHow achieved this popularity for a few reasons .
label: nsubj root det obj case det amod obl punct

text: First , people around the world are desperate for high quality how - to information .
label: advmod punct nsubj case det nmod cop root case amod compound compound punct acl obl punct

text: People want to learn more practical skills , and for the most part the internet does n't provide enough quality information yet .
label: nsubj root mark xcomp advmod amod obj punct cc case det amod obl det nsubj aux advmod conj amod compound obj advmod punct

text: Second , we attracted millions of readers via the virtuous circle of wiki editing : We had some articles of mixed quality , and editors joined to improve those articles , which in turn attracted more readers .
label: advmod punct nsubj root obj case nmod case det amod obl case compound nmod punct nsubj parataxis det obj case amod nmod punct cc nsubj conj mark advcl det obj punct nsubj case obl advcl amod obj punct

text: We continue to depend on this same virtuous cycle : More readers , means more editors , which creates better instructions , leading again to more readers .
label: nsubj root mark xcomp case det amod amod obl punct amod nsubj punct parataxis amod obj punct nsubj acl amod obj punct advcl advmod case amod obl punct

text: It is the same virtuous circle that Wikipedia has enjoyed .
label: nsubj cop det amod amod root obj nsubj aux acl punct

text: Wikinews interviews academic Simon Ličen about attitudes towards US Paralympics
label: nsubj root amod obj flat case nmod case compound nmod

text: Saturday , November 16 , 2013
label: root punct compound appos punct nmod

text: A Russian stamp for Paralympic Games in Sochi in 2014
label: det amod root case amod nmod case nmod case nmod

text: On Thursday , with 110 days until the start of the 2014 Winter Paralympics in Sochi , Russia , Wikinews interviewed Assistant Professor in Educational Leadership , Sport Studies and Educational / Counseling Psychology at Washington State University Simon Ličen about attitudes in United States towards the Paralympics .
label: case obl punct case nummod obl case det nmod case det compound compound nmod case nmod punct compound punct nsubj root amod obj case amod nmod punct compound conj cc amod dep compound conj case compound compound nmod compound appos case obl case amod nmod case det nmod punct

text: Ličen has recently joined the Sport Management Program at Washington State University to develop its sport media and communication research and teaching contents .
label: nsubj aux advmod root det compound compound obj case compound compound nmod mark advcl nmod compound compound cc conj obj cc compound conj punct

text: Originally from Slovenia , he served as the Director of Media and Communications of a WTA Tour event and was a member of the UNESCO Slovenian National Commission .
label: advmod case acl punct nsubj root case det obl case nmod cc conj case det compound compound nmod cc cop det conj case det compound amod amod nmod punct

text: He was also the Team Manager of the Slovenian wheelchair basketball national team .
label: nsubj cop advmod det root flat case det amod compound compound amod nmod punct

text: Why do you think the Paralympic movement has so little visibility in the US compared to other countries like Australia , the United Kingdom and even Canada ?
label: advmod aux nsubj root det amod nsubj ccomp advmod amod obj case det nmod advcl case amod obl case nmod punct det amod conj cc advmod conj punct

text: Sports in the United States largely reaffirm existing relations of power in society .
label: nsubj case det amod nmod advmod root amod obj case nmod case nmod punct

text: It emphasizes consumerism , the belief that success always goes to people who merit it due to their abilities , dedication and qualifications , and reinforces , rather than changes , existing ideas related to gender , ethnicity and nationality .
label: nsubj root obj punct det appos mark nsubj advmod acl case obl nsubj acl obj case fixed nmod obl punct conj cc conj punct cc conj punct cc fixed conj punct amod obj acl case obl punct conj cc conj punct

text: Paralympic sport brings attention to athletes who are typically overlooked in American society because the majority of the population does not want to identify with people who are disabled .
label: amod nsubj root obj case obl nsubj aux advmod acl case amod obl mark det nsubj case det nmod aux advmod advcl mark xcomp case obl nsubj aux acl punct

text: Although disability is not contagious , interest in disabled sports might put into question the masculinity of the males following it .
label: mark nsubj cop advmod advcl punct nsubj case amod nmod aux root case obl det obj case det nmod acl obj punct

text: Disabled athletes also challenge existing relations of power by displaying dedication , hard work and perseverance in different contexts than those most sports fans are accustomed to .
label: amod nsubj advmod root amod obj case nmod mark advcl obj punct amod conj cc conj case amod obl case obl amod compound nsubj aux acl obl punct

text: Other countries , including the ones you mention , have stronger social orientations in all aspects of society .
label: amod nsubj punct case det nmod nsubj acl punct root amod amod obj case det obl case nmod punct

text: Even though legislative support may be less strong than the one provided by the Americans with Disabilities Act , many social institutions including the media are more receptive to this form of diversity .
label: advmod mark amod nsubj aux cop advmod advcl case det obl acl case det compound case nmod obl punct amod amod nsubj case det nmod cop advmod root case det obl case nmod punct

text: What do you think the impact will be for the Paralympic movement will be with the Games being televised live in the United States for first time ?
label: ccomp aux nsubj root det nsubj aux reparandum case det amod nmod aux cop mark det nsubj aux advcl advmod case det amod obl case amod obl punct

text: The impact depends on a number of aspects .
label: det nsubj root case det obl case nmod punct

text: One of them is the channels that NBC as the broadcasting rights owner for the United States will use to air the Paralympic Games on .
label: nsubj case nmod cop det root obj nsubj case det compound compound nmod case det amod nmod aux acl mark advcl det amod obj obl punct

text: Will they be shown nationally or regionally , on NBC or on any of the company ’s multiple cable networks ?
label: aux nsubj aux root advmod cc conj punct case obl cc case conj case det nmod case amod compound nmod punct

text: A second aspect is the parts or hours of the day the Paralympics will be shown .
label: det amod nsubj cop det root cc conj case det nmod det nsubj aux aux acl punct

text: Remember that there is a nine - hour difference between Sochi and New York , and a 12 - hour difference between Sochi and the US West Coast .
label: root mark expl ccomp det nummod punct compound nsubj case nmod cc amod conj punct cc det nummod punct compound conj case nmod cc det compound compound conj punct

text: So daytime events will be shown live in the United States in the middle of the night , and evening prime - time events will be shown — indeed live — in the morning U.S. time .
label: advmod compound nsubj aux aux root advmod case det amod obl case det obl case det nmod punct cc compound amod punct compound nsubj aux aux conj punct advmod advmod punct case det obl compound nmod punct

text: So showing the Paralympics live on United States television might turn out to be less glamorous than it appears .
label: advmod csubj det obj advmod case amod compound obl aux root compound mark cop advmod xcomp mark nsubj advcl punct

text: A third important factor is the way the event will be mediated : will NBC have its best sports broadcasters following the event after having worked the Winter Olympics ?
label: det amod amod nsubj cop det root det nsubj aux aux acl punct aux nsubj parataxis nmod amod compound obj acl det obj mark aux advcl det compound obj punct

text: Will they treat and announce the competitions as they do all others — for better and worse ?
label: aux nsubj root cc conj det obj mark nsubj advcl det obj punct case obl cc conj punct

text: Will they take it as an opportunity to educate viewers about disability and diversity while showing superb athletic performances without engaging in a discourse of pity ?
label: aux nsubj root obj case det obl mark acl obj case nmod cc conj mark advcl amod amod obj mark advcl case det obl case nmod punct

text: All in all , I think this is a terrific opportunity to improve sports coverage in a multitude of aspects ; but we will have to wait until after the event to assess to what extent the broadcasters will meet these expectations .
label: obl fixed fixed punct nsubj root nsubj cop det amod ccomp mark acl compound obj case det obl case nmod punct cc nsubj aux conj mark xcomp case case det advcl mark advcl case det obl det nsubj aux acl det obj punct

text: Interview with LibriVox founder Hugh McGuire
label: root case compound nmod flat flat

text: Sunday , May 28 , 2006
label: root punct compound appos punct nmod

text: The LibriVox website features a catalog of about a hundred completed books , including books in other languages like German , Hebrew , and Japanese .
label: det compound nsubj root det obj case advmod det nummod amod nmod punct case nmod case amod nmod case nmod punct conj punct cc conj punct

text: Why did you decide to take the acoustic fate of public domain works into your own hands , and how did you go about it ?
label: advmod aux nsubj root mark xcomp det amod obj case amod compound nmod case nmod amod obl punct cc advmod aux nsubj conj case obl punct

text: I think that a vibrant public domain is very important to a healthy world , and so I thought : here 's a way to help the cause .
label: nsubj root mark det amod amod nsubj cop advmod ccomp case det amod obl punct cc advmod nsubj conj punct nsubj cop det ccomp mark acl det obj punct

text: I launched LibriVox , emailed some friends and some podcasters who where doing literary stuff , and invited them to record a chapter of Joseph Conrad 's Secret Agent .
label: nsubj root obj punct conj det iobj cc det conj nsubj aux acl amod obj punct cc conj obj mark xcomp det obj case nmod flat case amod nmod punct

text: Things have grown steadily since .
label: nsubj aux root advmod obl punct

text: By the way , AKMA was the first guy I know of to do something like this , with Lawrence Lessig 's Free Culture .
label: case det nmod punct nsubj cop det amod root nsubj acl obl mark acl obj case nmod punct case nmod flat case amod obl punct

text: That , I think , started my thinking about this , but it took a while for the idea to crystallize .
label: nsubj punct nsubj advcl punct root nmod obj case nmod punct cc expl conj det obj case det nmod mark csubj punct

text: Hugh McGuire with some books that have not yet been acoustically liberated .
label: root flat case det nmod nsubj aux advmod advmod aux advmod acl punct

text: Do you personally record audiobooks , and did you already do so before LibriVox ?
label: aux nsubj advmod root obj punct cc aux nsubj advmod conj advmod case obl punct

text: LibriVox was my first experience recording audiobooks .
label: nsubj cop nmod amod root acl obj punct

text: I still do the odd chapter , but i am a bit delinquent in finishing some of them these days !
label: nsubj advmod root det amod obj punct cc nsubj cop det obl conj mark advcl obj case nmod det obl punct

text: Is there a particular LibriVox book which you think stands out because of the quality , the overall effort involved , its popularity , or for some other reason ?
label: root expl det amod compound nsubj nsubj nsubj acl ccomp compound case fixed det obl punct det amod conj acl punct nmod conj punct cc case det amod conj punct

text: My personal favourite is Notes from the Underground ( Dostoyevsky ) .
label: nmod amod nsubj cop root case det nmod punct dep punct punct

text: Other random good ones :
label: amod amod amod root punct

text: Austen , Jane .
label: root punct compound punct

text: Pride and Prejudice
label: root cc conj

text: Christie , Agatha .
label: root punct compound punct

text: The Mysterious Affair at Styles
label: det amod root case nmod

text: London , Jack .
label: root punct compound punct

text: White Fang
label: amod root

text: Macaulay , Thomas Babington .
label: root punct compound compound punct

text: History of England ( Volume 1 , Chapter 1 )
label: root case nmod punct dep dep punct dep dep punct

text: Marx , Karl and Engels , Friedrich .
label: root punct compound cc conj punct compound punct

text: The Communist Manifesto ( solo )
label: det amod root punct dep punct

text: Twain , Mark .
label: root punct compound punct

text: A Connecticut Yankee in King Arthur 's Court ( solo )
label: det compound root case compound nmod case nmod punct dep punct

text: Ed. : See the LibriVox catalog for a full index .
label: dep punct root det compound obj case det amod obl punct

text: Browsing the catalog , I find that the quality of the spoken audio varies greatly from text to text or even from chapter to chapter .
label: advcl det obj punct nsubj root mark det nsubj case det amod nmod ccomp advmod case obl case obl cc orphan case conj case orphan punct

text: If someone wanted to re-record a chapter because they did n't like the speaker , would you then offer two versions ?
label: mark nsubj advcl mark xcomp det obj mark nsubj aux advmod advcl det obj punct aux nsubj advmod root nummod obj punct

text: Yes .
label: root punct

text: We take the Wikipedia approach : if you think it should be better , please help it be so .
label: nsubj root det compound obj punct mark nsubj advcl nsubj aux cop ccomp punct discourse parataxis obj cop xcomp punct

text: You 'll note we offer a couple of versions of some books .
label: nsubj aux root nsubj ccomp det obj case nmod case det nmod punct

text: Indeed our weekly poetry project celebrates this diversity of voice : each week a new short poem is chosen and as many readers as wish to record a version , so you get 20 + versions of the same poem , a very interesting audio experience .
label: advmod nmod amod compound nsubj root det obj case nmod punct det obl det amod amod nsubj aux parataxis cc advmod amod nsubj mark acl xcomp conj det obj punct advmod nsubj parataxis nummod advmod obj case det amod nmod punct det advmod amod amod appos punct

text: Besides works whose copyright has expired , there is an increasing number of modern books available under Creative Commons and similar licenses .
label: case obl nmod nsubj aux acl punct expl root det amod nsubj case amod nmod amod case compound obl cc amod conj punct

text: You mentioned Larry Lessig 's Free Culture , but it also includes some out of print titles by publishers who are open to the concept , such as O'Reilly .
label: nsubj root nmod flat case amod obj punct cc nsubj advmod conj det compound case obl obj case nmod nsubj cop acl case det obl punct case fixed nmod punct

text: Do you want to limit the scope of LibriVox strictly to old public domain works , or do you have plans to include recent works under reasonably permissive licenses as well ?
label: aux nsubj root mark xcomp det obj case nmod advmod case amod amod compound obl punct cc aux nsubj conj obj mark acl amod obj case advmod amod obl advmod fixed punct

text: We are only doing public domain works , for a number of reasons , partly to keep simplicity in our copyright situation -- public domain means it s as simple as can be .
label: nsubj aux advmod root amod compound obj punct case det obl case nmod punct advmod mark advcl obj case nmod compound obl punct amod nsubj parataxis nsubj cop advmod ccomp mark aux advcl punct

text: CC makes things more complex .
label: nsubj root obj advmod xcomp punct

text: Also , there are other sites , notably podiobooks.com , which are better suited to CC works than LibriVox .
label: advmod punct expl root amod nsubj punct advmod appos punct nsubj aux advmod acl case compound obl case obl punct

text: we find it makes things clear and easy to say : published works , public domain , and leave it at that .
label: nsubj root expl ccomp obj xcomp cc conj mark csubj punct amod ccomp punct amod conj punct cc conj obj case obl punct

text: As far as I can tell , podiobooks.com features " free as in beer " content — material which you can download , but which is n't under a free content license .
label: advmod advmod mark nsubj aux advcl punct nsubj root punct amod case fixed obl punct obj punct appos obj nsubj aux acl punct cc nsubj cop advmod case det amod compound conj punct

text: Instead of " public domain " , would n't " free content " work just as well , using something like the Free Content Definition to limit the scope ?
label: case fixed punct amod obl punct punct aux advmod punct amod nsubj punct root advmod advmod advmod punct advcl obj case det amod compound nmod mark advcl det obj punct

text: This needs more discussion obviously : we chose public domain because the texts we use are public domain and we did n't want to add new restrictions , especially not non-commercial , since already our recordings are being used for a number of commercialish projects ( I ca n't recall any specific project names , but some pay - education sites use LV stuff ) .
label: nsubj root amod obj advmod punct nsubj parataxis amod obj mark det nsubj nsubj acl cop amod advcl cc nsubj aux advmod conj mark xcomp amod obj punct advmod advmod appos punct mark advmod nmod nsubj aux aux advcl case det obl case amod nmod punct nsubj aux advmod parataxis det amod compound obj punct cc det compound punct compound nsubj conj compound obj punct punct

text: That 's good and well and fine with us .
label: nsubj cop root cc conj cc conj case obl punct

text: We do n't want to have to give anyone permission to use our recordings , we want anyone to use them for whatever they want .
label: nsubj aux advmod root mark xcomp mark xcomp iobj obj mark acl nmod obj punct nsubj parataxis obj mark xcomp obj case obl nsubj acl punct

text: Also , for the thing to work you need to have many dedicated volunteers willing to do the management ( onerous ) and many willing to do the reading .
label: advmod punct mark det nsubj mark advcl nsubj root mark xcomp amod amod obj amod mark xcomp det obj punct parataxis punct cc conj amod mark xcomp det obj punct

text: While Pride and Prejudice will attract many readers , I do n't know about O'Reilly 's latest tome on XML ... though I might be wrong .
label: mark nsubj cc conj aux advcl amod obj punct nsubj aux advmod root case nmod case amod obl case nmod punct mark nsubj aux cop advcl punct

text: Friday , January 3 , 2014

text: On Saturday , Wikinews interviewed Tina McKenzie , a former member of the Australia women 's national wheelchair basketball team , known as the Gliders .
label: case obl punct nsubj root obj flat punct det amod appos case det compound nmod case amod compound compound nmod punct acl case det obl punct

text: McKenzie , a silver and bronze Paralympic medalist in wheelchair basketball , retired from the game after the 2012 Summer Paralympics in London .
label: nsubj punct det compound cc conj amod appos case compound nmod punct root case det obl case det compound compound obl case nmod punct

text: Wikinews caught up with her in a cafe in the leafy Melbourne suburb of Preston .
label: nsubj root compound case obl case det obl case det amod compound nmod case nmod punct

text: [ The Spitfire Tournament in Canada ] was a really good tournament actually .
label: punct det compound nsubj case nmod punct cop det advmod amod root advmod punct

text: It was a tournament that I wish we 'd actually gone back to more often .
label: nsubj cop det root obl nsubj acl nsubj aux advmod ccomp advmod case advmod advmod punct

text: Who plays in that one ?
label: nsubj root case det obl punct

text: It 's quite a large Canadian tournament , and so we went as the Gliders team .
label: nsubj cop det det amod amod root punct cc advmod nsubj conj case det compound obl punct

text: So we were trying to get as many international games as possible .
label: advmod nsubj aux root mark xcomp advmod amod amod obj mark acl punct

text: Cause that 's one of our problems really , to compete .
label: mark nsubj cop root case nmod nmod advmod punct mark dislocated punct

text: It costs us so much money to for us to travel overseas and to compete internationally .
label: expl root iobj advmod amod obj reparandum mark nsubj mark csubj advmod cc mark conj advmod punct

text: And so we can compete against each other all the time within Australia but we really need to be able to ...

text: It 's not the same .

text: No , it 's really not , so it 's really important to be able to get as a many international trips throughout the year to continue our improvement .

text: Also see where all the other teams are at as well .

text: But yes , Spitfire was good .

text: We took quite a few new girls over there back then in 2005 , leading into the World Cup in the Netherlands .

text: Was that the one where you were the captain of the team , in 2005 ?
label: cop nsubj det root advmod nsubj cop det acl case det nmod punct case nmod punct

label: advmod fixed nsubj parataxis punct nsubj cop det compound root acl case det compound punct cc punct conj obl case amod nmod case nmod

text: As one that 's battled hard through many a broken dream Let me say , " in order to rise to the occasion you must be willing to go down with the ship " ,
