text: The Onion : An interview with ' America 's Finest News Source '
label: det root punct det appos case punct nmod case amod compound nmod punct

text: Sunday , November 25 , 2007
label: root punct compound appos punct nmod

text: How The Onion writes an issue
label: root det nsubj advcl det obj

text: This exclusive interview features first - hand journalism by a Wikinews reporter .
label: det amod nsubj root amod punct compound obj case det compound nmod punct

text: See the collaboration page for more details .
label: root det compound obj case amod obl punct

text: How do you decide on the stories ?
label: advmod aux nsubj root case det obl punct

text: We do everything backwards here .
label: nsubj root obj advmod advmod punct

text: We start with the headline and then flesh out the story , as opposed to The New York Times , which writes the issue and then has a headline editor to make it snappy .
label: nsubj root case det obl cc advmod conj compound det obj punct case fixed fixed det amod compound obl punct nsubj acl det obj cc advmod conj det compound obj mark acl obj xcomp punct

text: We start with a joke .
label: nsubj root case det obl punct

text: We read about six hundred to eight hundred headline ideas on a Monday coming from our staff and a small group of writers outside — a contributing core .
label: nsubj root advmod nummod nummod case nummod nmod compound obj case det obl acl case nmod obl cc det amod conj case nmod advmod punct det amod appos punct

text: We whittle that down on a Monday to about a hundred , come in Tuesday and pick an issue and brainstorm with the whole editorial staff ; all fifteen of us .
label: nsubj root obj compound case det obl case advmod det obl punct conj compound obl cc conj det obj cc conj case det amod amod obl punct det appos case nmod punct

text: Then we assign a headline to a specific writer to execute .
label: advmod nsubj root det obj case det amod obl mark advcl punct

text: We go through a number of drafts and then have the editors pick it up and assign the photojournalism aspect of it to our graphic design team , who adds the visual aspect to it .
label: nsubj root case det obl case nmod cc advmod conj det obj xcomp obj compound cc conj det compound obj case nmod case nmod amod compound obl punct nsubj acl det amod obj case obl punct

text: The editors punch it up over the last couple of days and then it goes out over the Internet and into the print edition .
label: det nsubj root obj compound case det amod obl case nmod cc advmod nsubj conj compound case det obl cc case det compound conj punct

text: So you do n’t have writers coming up with a story and headline , but you will instead have a team of writers choosing the best headlines and then assign it to a particular writer who was not necessarily involved ?
label: advmod nsubj aux advmod root obj acl compound case det obl cc conj punct cc nsubj aux advmod conj det obj case nmod acl det amod obj cc advmod conj obj case det amod obl nsubj aux advmod advmod acl punct

text: Writers will occasionally write their own headlines , but we come up with a list of 15 or 20 headline ideas , what we think will make a good story and then we assign it based upon what people ’s writing strengths are .
label: nsubj aux advmod root nmod amod obj punct cc nsubj conj compound case det obl case nummod cc conj compound nmod punct appos nsubj acl aux ccomp det amod xcomp cc advmod nsubj conj obj advcl case obl nmod case compound nsubj acl punct

text: We have some people who are great at politics ; some people we give all the war stuff to ; someone who is in charge of the Britney Spears story of the week — the entertainment stories .
label: nsubj root det obj nsubj cop acl case obl punct det conj nsubj acl det det compound obj obl punct conj nsubj cop case acl case det compound flat nmod case det nmod punct det compound parataxis punct

text: The headlines
label: det root

text: Editorial Manager Chet Clem and President Sean Mills .
label: amod root flat flat cc conj flat flat punct

text: Image : David Shankbone
label: root punct dep flat

text: It seems like some publications , like AM New York , always have a Britney Spears story ;
label: expl root mark det nsubj punct case compound amod nmod punct advmod advcl det compound flat obj punct

text: is there anything similar with The Onion where they continually revisit a topic or person ?
label: root expl nsubj amod case det nmod advmod nsubj advmod acl det obj cc conj punct

text: No , not necessarily .
label: discourse punct advmod root punct

text: We are a little less reactionary .
label: nsubj cop det obl advmod root punct

text: We tend to target the zeitgeist more than anything .
label: nsubj root mark xcomp det obj advmod case obl punct

text: We ’ll hit the mainstream media ’s portrayal of the entertainment world as much as we ’ll hit characters in the entertainment world .
label: nsubj aux root det amod nmod case obj case det compound nmod advmod advmod mark nsubj aux advcl obj case det compound obl punct

text: We ’ll attack People Magazine ’s coverage of Britney as much as Britney .
label: nsubj aux root compound nmod case obj case nmod advmod advmod case obl punct

text: In an interview with Terry Gross , Stephen Colbert said of his time at Second City that they had decided on not doing political humor and , in particular , hackneyed political humor such as Ted Kennedy drinking jokes .
label: case det obl case nmod flat punct nsubj flat root case nmod obl case amod nmod mark nsubj aux ccomp mark advmod advcl amod obj cc punct case nmod punct amod amod conj case fixed compound flat compound nmod punct

text: They felt it was overdone , mean - spirited and not funny .
label: nsubj root nsubj aux ccomp punct amod punct xcomp cc advmod conj punct

text: Do your writers have similar rules of thumb ?
label: aux nmod nsubj root amod obj case nmod punct

text: We do n’t have any rules or known lines we wo n’t cross .
label: nsubj aux advmod root det obj cc amod conj nsubj aux advmod acl punct

text: We have an understanding based upon having the same writers in the back room for years , and those writers training the new writers as they come in .
label: nsubj root det obj acl mark advcl det amod obj case det amod nmod case nmod punct cc det conj acl det amod obj mark nsubj advcl compound punct

text: There is an understanding in the room .
label: expl root det nsubj case det nmod punct

text: If it makes the room laugh , it probably ends up in the paper .
label: mark nsubj advcl det obj xcomp punct nsubj advmod root compound case det obl punct

text: One example is we ran an article a couple of years back that was , " No Jennifer Lopez News Today " .
label: nummod nsubj cop nsubj root det obj det obl case nmod advmod nsubj cop punct punct det compound flat acl obl punct punct

text: That was our reaction to all of the J - Lo stuff .
label: nsubj cop nmod root case nmod case det compound punct flat nmod punct

text: We were n’t going to touch on her dress , or who she was dating .
label: nsubj aux advmod root mark xcomp case nmod obl punct cc obj nsubj aux conj punct

text: Just the fact that those were the lead stories for so many days , in everything from US Weekly to Time Magazine .
label: advmod det root mark nsubj cop det amod acl case advmod amod nmod punct case nmod case compound nmod case compound nmod punct

text: I think it ’s important we have an original take on those things .
label: nsubj root expl cop ccomp nsubj csubj det amod obj case det nmod punct

text: I think it ’s similar to what Colbert said to Terry Gross .
label: nsubj root nsubj cop ccomp case obl nsubj acl case obl flat punct

text: We do n’t want to just traffic in the same 24 hour news cycle .
label: nsubj root advmod ccomp case amod obl case det amod nummod compound compound nmod punct

text: There ’s a 24 hour comedy news cycle that exists on all the late night talk shows .
label: expl root det nummod compound compound compound nsubj nsubj acl case det det amod compound compound obl punct

text: The Onion has a different creative process where we are not trying to hit everything in the 24 hours and on the same notes .
label: det nsubj root det amod amod obj advmod nsubj aux advmod acl mark xcomp obj case det nummod obl cc case det amod conj punct

text: We want an original take .
label: nsubj root det amod obj punct

text: If we choose to do something on J - Lo , it ’s going to be something like that , something less obvious .
label: mark nsubj advcl mark xcomp obj case nmod punct flat punct nsubj aux root mark cop xcomp case nmod punct appos advmod amod punct

text: When you are going through the headlines , is it just you guys sitting around trying to crack each other up ?
label: advmod nsubj aux advcl case det obl punct cop nsubj advmod dep root advcl advmod advcl mark xcomp obj fixed compound punct

text: It ’s the least amount of fun possible .
label: nsubj cop det amod root case nmod acl punct

text: Nah , I ’m kidding .
label: discourse punct nsubj aux root punct

text: It ’s actually more businesslike than you ’d imagine .
label: nsubj cop advmod advmod root mark nsubj aux advcl punct

text: It ’s very much like you are trying to make the room laugh , but the room has been a sort of captive audience for many many years now , so it takes a lot to make the room laugh .
label: nsubj cop advmod advmod mark nsubj aux root mark xcomp det obj xcomp punct cc det nsubj aux cop det conj case amod nmod case amod amod obl advmod punct advmod expl parataxis det obj mark csubj det obj xcomp punct

text: The best analogy I ’ve heard is when Rob Siegel , former editor - in - chief , likened it to wine tasting .
label: det amod nsubj nsubj aux acl cop root nsubj flat punct amod appos punct case punct nmod punct advcl obj case compound obl punct

text: It ’s this quiet experience where you are trying to soak in what the joke is , have we done anything like this , is it a unique take , what are other people doing .
label: nsubj cop det amod root advmod nsubj aux acl mark xcomp compound obj det nsubj acl punct aux nsubj conj obj case obl punct cop nsubj det amod conj punct obj cop amod nsubj conj punct

text: It ’s sort of like , " Hmmm ... that ’s hilarious . That ’s really really funny " rather than people falling off their chairs .
label: nsubj cop obl fixed case punct punct discourse punct nsubj cop root punct nsubj cop advmod advmod parataxis punct cc fixed nsubj conj case nmod obl punct

text: It ’s more subdued than I think what most people would expect .
label: nsubj cop advmod root mark nsubj parataxis obl amod nsubj aux acl punct

text: It ’s more analytical and clinical ?
label: nsubj cop advmod root cc conj punct

text: Not all the time , but it ca n’t be a laugh a minute .
label: advmod det det root punct cc nsubj aux advmod cop det conj det obl punct

text: Yeah , what you see on Studio 60 and 30 Rock , those are scripted writers rooms .
label: discourse punct dislocated nsubj acl case obl flat cc conj flat punct nsubj cop amod compound root punct

text: Everything is funny there .
label: nsubj cop root advmod punct

text: There 's a lot of unfunny jokes that are told in a back room , that 's why they stay and die in that back room and do n’t go out in The Onion .
label: expl root det obj case amod nmod nsubj aux acl case det amod obl punct nsubj cop parataxis nsubj advcl cc conj case det amod obl cc aux advmod conj compound case det obl punct

text: It can be a real mess on Broadway .

text: Aner Shalev is an Israeli mathematician and writer born in 1958 in Kibbutz Kinneret , Tiberias .

text: Interview
label: root

text: Aner Shalev
label: root flat

text: What are you going to talk about here in Levico ?
label: obl aux nsubj root mark xcomp case obl case obl punct

text: I called it Character , walks and words .
label: nsubj root obj xcomp punct conj cc conj punct

text: There is a whole topic which is called asymptotic groups theory .
label: expl root det amod nsubj nsubj aux acl amod compound xcomp punct

text: There are groups which express the symmetry of some structures .
label: expl root nsubj nsubj acl det obj case det nmod punct

text: Studying groups is a bit like studying symmetry .
label: csubj obj cop det obl mark root obj punct

text: It 's very beautiful I think .
label: nsubj cop advmod ccomp nsubj root punct

text: And then when you do it in an asymptotic way is like you do n't look at the small details .
label: cc advmod advmod nsubj advcl obj case det amod obl cop mark nsubj aux advmod root case det amod obl punct

text: It 's like from the sky .
label: nsubj cop case case det root punct

text: You look at the general patterns .
label: nsubj root case det amod obl punct

text: And there is another topic which is very important in mathematics which is called representation theory .
label: cc expl root det nsubj nsubj cop advmod acl case obl nsubj aux acl compound xcomp punct

text: So I will mainly talk about how to use a representation theory to solve all kind of problems and conjectures in asymptotic groups theory .

text: Why did you choose to study mathematics ?
label: advmod aux nsubj root mark xcomp obj punct

text: First of all because it was beautiful .
label: obl case obl mark nsubj cop root punct

text: When I was ten my father already showed me some stuff in mathematics and the beauty and the imagination was quite apparent .
label: advmod nsubj cop advcl nmod nsubj advmod root iobj det obj case nmod cc det nsubj cc det conj cop advmod conj punct

text: I also like the freedom in mathematics .
label: nsubj advmod root det obj case nmod punct

text: If you study physics or chemistry then you should describe the real world .
label: mark nsubj advcl obj cc conj advmod nsubj aux root det amod obj punct

text: But in mathematics you can build your own structures .
label: cc case obl nsubj aux root nmod amod obj punct

text: You can walk in worlds created by the imagination of people .
label: nsubj aux root case obl acl case det obl case nmod punct

text: You 're not committed to the real world .
label: nsubj aux advmod root case det amod obl punct

text: It 's almost like God to some extent .
label: nsubj cop advmod case root case det nmod punct

text: You can create worlds , you can study them .
label: nsubj aux parataxis obj punct nsubj aux root obj punct

text: I think it 's a combination of the beauty , of the imagination , of the freedom .
label: nsubj root nsubj cop det ccomp case det nmod punct case det conj punct case det conj punct

text: Many people , and many students , dislike math .
label: amod nsubj punct cc amod conj punct root obj punct

text: Why do you think it is so ?

text: First of all I think maybe they have bad teachers , which is a problem .
label: advmod case obl nsubj root advmod nsubj ccomp amod obj punct nsubj cop det advcl punct

text: You have to have very good teachers in mathematics if you really want to enjoy and to succeed in it .
label: nsubj root mark xcomp advmod amod obj case nmod mark nsubj advmod advcl mark xcomp cc mark conj case obl punct

text: Probably some people mainly think about the scientific part of it – you have to be accurate - and they see less these elements of the freedom , and the imagination , and creation .
label: advmod det nsubj advmod root case det amod obl case nmod punct nsubj parataxis mark cop xcomp punct cc nsubj conj dep det dep case det nmod punct cc det conj punct cc conj punct

text: Maybe they do n't like the precise nature of mathematics .
label: advmod nsubj aux advmod root det amod obj case nmod punct

text: Also when I talk mathematics I notice the language is very important in mathematics and I actually notice that many times people fail in mathematics because they do n't know how to write a composition .

text: They have ideas but they can not formulate them in the right way .
label: nsubj root obj cc nsubj aux advmod conj obj case det amod obl punct

text: Actually I find many connections between mathematics and literature because almost all the thing I told about mathematics are also seen in literature and in writing because when you write you can describe the real world , but you can also create worlds of fiction .
label: advmod nsubj root amod obj case nmod cc conj mark advmod det det nsubj nsubj acl case obl aux advmod advcl case obl cc case conj mark advmod nsubj advcl nsubj aux advcl det amod obj punct cc nsubj aux advmod conj obj case nmod punct

text: So you have imagination , you have total freedom , you can invent characters , you can invent all kind of development and surprises and this kind of end of story or another .
label: advmod nsubj root obj punct nsubj parataxis amod obj punct nsubj aux parataxis obj punct nsubj aux parataxis det obj case nmod cc conj cc det conj case nmod case nmod cc conj punct

text: Also the language is important in writing and in literature .
label: advmod det nsubj cop root case obl cc case conj punct

text: So in a way people often do n't know how to combine the two fields .
label: advmod case det obl nsubj advmod aux advmod root obj mark acl det nummod obj punct

text: It could look like almost the opposite : literature is kind of arts and mathematics is science but they also see a lot in common and there where mathematician who were writers .

text: For example the most famous is Lewis Carrol , author of Alice in Wonderland .
label: case nmod det advmod nsubj cop root flat punct appos case nmod case nmod punct

text: You 're not only a mathematician .
label: nsubj cop advmod advmod det root punct

text: You also wrote two collections of short stories and a novel .
label: nsubj advmod root nummod obj case amod nmod cc det conj punct

text: Why did you begin to write ?

text: When I was quite young I was interested in psychoanalysis and in dreams .
label: advmod nsubj cop advmod advcl nsubj cop root case obl cc case conj punct

text: I was trying to interpret my dreams .
label: nsubj aux root mark xcomp nmod obj punct

text: I started to write down my dreams .
label: nsubj root mark xcomp compound nmod obj punct

text: And then I noticed that I cheat a little bit when I write them down .
label: cc advmod nsubj root mark nsubj ccomp det amod obl advmod nsubj advcl obj compound punct

text: Sometimes I make them more pretty then they were actually .
label: advmod nsubj dep obj advmod xcomp advmod nsubj root advmod punct

text: So instead of documenting the dreams it gradually became also like adding creational elements , and I think that somehow through writing my dreams I gradually came to writing , also poems , but mainly stories .
label: advmod mark fixed advcl det obj nsubj advmod root advmod mark advcl amod obj punct cc nsubj conj mark advmod mark advcl nmod obj nsubj advmod ccomp case obl punct advmod appos punct cc advmod conj punct

text: I 'm a little bit inspired by dreams but when eventually I started to write more seriously I was more interested in structure which also .. a bit like mathematics in a way .. for example my first book is called Opus 1 .. a collection of four long stories with musical structures .
label: nsubj aux det amod obl root case obl cc advmod advmod nsubj advcl mark xcomp advmod advmod nsubj cop advmod conj case obl nsubj acl punct det nmod case parataxis case det obl punct case obl nmod amod nsubj aux parataxis xcomp nummod punct det parataxis case nummod amod nmod case amod nmod punct

text: The first part is called Legato and the second part was called Staccato .
label: det amod nsubj aux root xcomp cc det amod nsubj aux conj xcomp punct

text: In the legato part the sentences are very long and without breaks almost like stream of consciousness .
label: case det amod obl det nsubj cop advmod root cc case conj advmod case obl case nmod punct

text: In the staccato part it 's like a music : a lot of break , very very short sentences .

text: It was a bit experimenting connections between the language and the music and the psychology of people .
label: nsubj cop det root acl obj case det nmod cc det conj cc det conj case nmod punct

text: In the second book I made another experiment .
label: case det amod obl nsubj root det obj punct

text: It 's a book of opening , Overtures I called it , and there is no end to the stories .

text: There are seventy beginning of stories without ends .

text: In the novel Dark Matters I think what interested me in the structure was two thing : simple narrative and email .

text: ... love story and romance and surprises and tragedies and all this but also this structure interested me a lot .

text: Why did you choose this particular structure ?

text: When I tell stories I do n't like that everything will be clear from the beginning .
label: advmod nsubj advcl obj nsubj aux advmod root mark nsubj aux cop ccomp case det obl punct

text: I like that something will be a bit of secret , or even unreliable narrator : someone tells something and first you trust him but then you read more and you become thrilled by everything .

text: So ...

text: We 're right now using an automated microscope that we developed several years ago for nuclear astrophysics work to scan the collector in the Cosmic Dust Lab in Building 31 at Johnson Space Center .

text: This is the ARES group that handles returned samples ( Moon Rocks , Genesis chips , Meteorites , and Interplanetary Dust Particles collected by U2 in the stratosphere ) .

text: The microscope collects stacks of digital images of the aerogel collectors in the array .

text: Stardust @ home is a highly distributed project using a " Virtual Microscope " that is written in html and javascript and runs on most browsers — no downloads are required .

label: advmod amod obj aux nsubj root aux xcomp case det obl case det nmod punct

text: Great question .
label: amod root punct

text: The short answer is that we do n't know .
label: det amod nsubj cop mark nsubj aux advmod root punct

text: The long answer is a bit more complicated .
label: det amod nsubj cop det obl advmod root punct

text: Here 's what we know .
label: root cop nsubj nsubj acl punct

text: The Galileo and Ulysses spacecraft carried dust detectors onboard that Eberhard Gruen and his colleagues used to first detect and them measure the flux of interstellar dust particles streaming into the solar system .
label: det compound cc conj nsubj root compound obj advmod obj nsubj flat cc nmod conj acl mark advmod advcl cc advmod conj det obj case amod compound nmod acl case det amod obl punct

text: ( This is a kind of " wind " of interstellar dust , caused by the fact that our solar system is moving with respect to the local interstellar medium . )
label: punct nsubj cop det root case punct nmod punct case amod nmod punct acl case det obl mark nmod amod nsubj aux acl case obl case det amod amod nmod punct punct

text: Markus Landgraf has estimated the number of interstellar dust particles that should have been captured by Stardust during two periods of the " cruise " phase of the interplanetary orbit in which the spacecraft was moving with this wind .
label: nsubj flat aux root det obj case amod compound nmod nsubj aux aux aux acl case obl case nummod obl case det punct compound punct nmod case det amod nmod case obl det nsubj aux acl case det obl punct

text: He estimated that there should be around 45 particles , but this number is very uncertain — I would n't be surprised if it is quite different from that .
label: nsubj root mark expl aux ccomp advmod nummod nsubj punct cc det nsubj cop advmod conj punct nsubj aux advmod aux parataxis mark nsubj cop advmod advcl case obl punct

text: That was the long answer !
label: nsubj cop det amod root punct

text: One thing that I should say ... is that like all research , the outcome of what we are doing is highly uncertain .
label: nummod nsubj obj nsubj aux acl punct cop mark case det obl punct det nsubj case nmod nsubj aux acl cop advmod root punct

text: There is a wonderful quote attributed to Einstein — " If we knew what we were doing , it would n't be called " research " , would it ? "

label: nsubj root mark det nsubj aux cop case ccomp det nmod case nmod punct

text: ( A millionth of a meter . )
label: punct det root case det nmod punct punct

text: When people are searching using the virtual microscope , they will be looking not for the particles , but for the tracks that the particles make , which are much larger — several microns in diameter .
label: advmod nsubj aux advcl advcl det amod obj punct nsubj aux aux root advmod case det obl punct cc case det conj obj det nsubj acl punct nsubj cop advmod acl punct amod appos case nmod punct

text: After visa snags , all - girl Afghan team honored for ' courageous achievement ' at international robotics competition

text: Friday , July 21 , 2017
label: root punct compound appos punct nmod

text: A group of Afghan teenagers was awarded a silver medal for " courageous achievement " on Tuesday in the FIRST Global Challenge Robot Olympics in the Daughters of the American Revolution Constitution Hall in Washington D.C.
label: det nsubj case amod nmod aux root det amod obj case punct amod obl punct case obl case det compound amod compound compound obl case det compound case det amod nmod compound obl case nmod flat

text: The six - member Afghan team , which consists entirely of girls , had been denied visas to enter the United States until last week , drawing notice from critics of U.S. President Donald Trump 's policies regarding Muslims traveling to the U.S.
label: det nummod punct compound amod nsubj punct nsubj acl advmod case obl punct aux aux root obj mark acl det amod obj case amod obl punct advcl obj case nmod case compound nmod flat flat case nmod case nmod acl case det obl

text: According to Afghan Ambassador to the United States Hamdullah Mohib , the participation of this team in this science competition shows progress in Afghanistan 's response to nearly two decades of military conflict .

text: Teams from different countries were arranged in groups of three , and groups faced off in pairs .

text: The group whose three robots collectively earned the most points won that match .
label: det nsubj nmod nummod nsubj advmod acl det amod obj root det obj punct

text: According to the Afghan team 's coach , Alireza Mehraban , in their first matchup , the Afghan team 's robot , named " Better Idea of Afghan Girls , " scored one or two points for the three - nation alliance with the Gabonese and Estonian teams .
label: case fixed det amod nmod case obl punct appos flat punct case nmod amod obl punct det amod nmod case nsubj punct acl punct amod xcomp case amod nmod punct punct root nummod cc conj obj case det nummod punct compound obl case det amod cc conj nmod punct

text: " We are so interested because we find a big chance to show the talent and ability of Afghans , " team member Rodaba Noori told the press , " to show that Afghan women can make robots too and we can improve in this section — [ the ] robotics section .
label: punct nsubj cop advmod root mark nsubj advcl det amod obj mark acl det obj cc conj case nmod punct punct compound nsubj flat flat parataxis det iobj punct punct mark parataxis mark amod nsubj aux ccomp obj advmod cc nsubj aux conj case det obl punct punct det punct compound appos punct

label: nsubj cop advmod root mark nsubj advcl advmod advmod cc amod obj mark acl xcomp case obl cc nsubj conj case amod obl cc advmod nsubj cop conj case fixed compound obl punct punct

text: The team arrived in Washington D.C. after many difficulties .

label: nsubj flat flat advmod root det amod compound amod compound obj mark advcl det obj xcomp det obj punct

text: The President has drawn both praise for helping the girls enter the U.S. and criticism for his travel ban , which does not cover Afghanistan , and for the atmosphere of hostility toward Muslims that critics blame for denying them entry in the first place .

text: There were also two Syrian teams scheduled to compete , one national and one made up of refugees .

text: Syria and all refugees are covered by the ban .

label: det amod compound nsubj root nmod obj case punct obl punct case det obl case nmod nmod cc conj nmod obj punct xcomp punct punct

label: nsubj flat root mark xcomp nmod obj advmod mark det nsubj advcl case obl punct

text: " They represent our aspirations and resilience despite having been brought up in a perpetual conflict .

text: " Had it happened five hours earlier or four hours earlier , I think the death toll would have been more than a thousand . "

text: The crane accident comes just ten days before the beginning of the Hajj , the annual pilgrimage to Mecca , Islam 's holiest site .

text: Scientology defector arrested after attempting to leave organization
label: compound nsubj root mark advcl mark xcomp obj

text: Saturday , October 9 , 2010
label: root punct compound appos punct nmod

text: Recent reports have revealed that a defector from the elite group within Scientology called the Sea Org was first persuaded to travel back to a management building for the organization in California , where he was interrogated by an attorney for Scientology and then arrested .
label: amod nsubj aux root mark det nsubj case det amod nmod case nmod acl det compound xcomp aux advmod ccomp mark xcomp advmod case det compound obl case det nmod case nmod punct advmod nsubj aux acl case det obl case nmod cc advmod conj punct

text: Daniel Montalvo in September 2010 , after having left the elite group within Scientology called the Sea Org .
label: root flat case nmod nmod punct mark aux acl det amod obj case nmod acl det compound xcomp punct

text: Montalvo is holding a copy of the book Blown for Good critical of Scientology , written by Marc Headley .
label: nsubj aux root det obj case det nmod appos case nmod amod case obl punct acl case obl flat punct

text: Image : Mark Rathbun .
label: root punct dep flat punct

text: Daniel Montalvo , 19 , a member of Scientology all his life , was arrested after leaving its elite group the Sea Org .
label: nsubj flat punct appos punct det appos case nmod det nmod nmod punct aux root mark advcl nmod amod obj det compound appos punct

text: He was released on US$ 20,000 bail on Thursday .
label: nsubj aux root case compound compound obl case obl punct

text: Montalvo was charged with taking hard drives and a zip drive from the Scientology organization after leaving the Sea Org group .
label: nsubj aux root mark advcl amod obj cc det compound conj case det compound obl mark advcl det compound compound obj punct

text: The Sea Org requires members to sign a billion - year - contract , agreeing to work for the organization founded by science fiction writer L. Ron Hubbard for multiple lifetimes .
label: det compound nsubj root obj mark xcomp det nummod punct compound punct obj punct acl mark xcomp case det obl acl case compound compound obl flat flat flat case amod nmod punct

text: Members of the Sea Org live a strict lifestyle – with little income , small diet provided and significant time invested in work per day .
label: nsubj case det compound nmod root det amod obj punct case amod nmod punct amod conj acl cc amod conj acl case obl case obl punct

text: Montalvo had read an article in the Scientology propaganda publication Freedom Magazine , which attacked high - ranking defectors from the organization including Tom Devocht and Mark Rathbun .
label: nsubj aux root det obj case det compound compound obl compound appos punct nsubj acl amod punct amod obj case det nmod case nmod flat cc conj flat punct

text: Montalvo had known Devocht personally , and came to the conclusion that the claims made about him in the Freedom article were lies .
label: nsubj aux root obj advmod punct cc conj case det obl mark det nsubj acl case obl case det compound obl cop acl punct

text: Montalvo was subsequently motivated to seek out information about Scientology on the Internet , and came upon a blog written by Rathbun .
label: nsubj aux advmod root mark xcomp compound obj case nmod case det obl punct cc conj case det obl acl case obl punct

text: Montalvo contacted former members of Scientology , who helped him leave the organization and get in touch with Devocht .
label: nsubj root amod obj case nmod punct nsubj acl obj xcomp det obj cc conj case obl case obl punct

text: He traveled to Florida to meet with Devocht , who had told Montalvo he would assist him with future employment and housing .
label: nsubj root case obl mark advcl case obl punct nsubj aux acl iobj nsubj aux ccomp obj case amod obl cc conj punct

text: According to Rathbun the Scientology property in question was returned by mail to the organization by Montalvo shortly after he left the Sea Org .
label: case fixed obl det compound nsubj case nmod aux root case obl case det obl case obl advmod mark nsubj advcl det compound obj punct

text: Scientology officials have stated they have not received the materials .
label: compound nsubj aux root nsubj aux advmod ccomp det obj punct

text: After calling the Scientology organization by phone to attempt to speak with his mother , Montalvo was instead put through to a Scientology attorney , Kendrick Moxon .
label: mark advcl det compound obj case obl mark advcl mark xcomp case nmod obl punct nsubj aux advmod root compound case det compound obl punct appos flat punct

text: Rathbun wrote , " Moxon proceeded to lie to Daniel that the hard drives were never returned , and made a convincing case ( not difficult to do with a 19 year old who does not even know the three branches of government ) that Daniel would be put behind iron bars for a good long time , UNLESS of course , he returned and cooperated with Moxon and routed out properly . "
label: nsubj root punct punct nsubj ccomp mark xcomp case obl mark det amod nsubj aux advmod ccomp punct cc conj det amod obj punct advmod parataxis mark xcomp case det nummod obl obl nsubj aux advmod advmod acl det nummod obj case nmod punct mark nsubj aux aux acl case compound obl case det amod amod obl punct mark advmod fixed punct nsubj advcl cc conj case obl cc conj compound advmod punct punct

text: To " route out " in Scientology jargon refers to the member who wishes to leave proceeding through a set of interrogative exit interviews while attached to the Scientology device called the E-meter .
label: mark punct csubj compound punct case compound obl root mark det nsubj nsubj acl mark xcomp advcl case det obl case amod compound nmod mark advcl case det compound obl acl det xcomp punct

text: According to Rathbun , a detective for the Los Angeles Sheriff 's office was provided with material from Scientology to build a case against Montalvo .
label: case fixed obl punct det nsubj case det compound flat nmod case nmod aux root case obl case nmod mark advcl det obj case nmod punct

text: Rathbun stated ,
label: nsubj root punct

text: " Daniel was picked up by an investigator in a black car with blacked out windows .
label: punct nsubj aux root compound case det obl case det amod nmod case amod compound nmod punct

text: Instead of being taken to a hotel , where he could route out as promised , he was taken to the Century City Towers .
label: mark fixed aux advcl case det obl punct advmod nsubj aux acl compound mark advcl punct nsubj aux root case det compound compound obl punct

text: He was deposited in an office on the 33rd floor where a pricy church lawyer interrogated him for two hours . "
label: nsubj aux root case det obl case det amod nmod advmod det amod compound nsubj advcl obj case nummod obl punct punct

text: Rathbun asserted that Scientology officials , " ... plied the Sheriff 's detective with a grand conspiracy theory , characterizing me as the ' anti-christ ' of the church of Scientology . ... The next thing Daniel knows he 's in a cell where he sat for the next 30 hours . "
label: nsubj root mark compound nsubj punct punct punct ccomp det nmod case obj case det amod compound obl punct acl obj case det punct nmod punct case det nmod case nmod punct punct det amod obl nsubj acl nsubj cop case det parataxis advmod nsubj acl case det amod nummod obl punct punct

text: Steve Whitmore , a representative for the LA Sheriff 's office , told LA Weekly in a statement that the case involving Montalvo was being dealt with as charges relating to grand theft .
label: nsubj flat punct det appos case det nmod flat case nmod punct root compound iobj case det obl mark det nsubj acl obj aux aux ccomp obl case obl acl case amod obl punct

text: Whitmore stated Montalvo left Scientology - related employment in Los Angeles on September 24 .
label: nsubj root nsubj ccomp compound punct amod obj case nmod flat case compound obl punct

text: On September 29 , Scientology officials went to the East Los Angeles sheriff 's station where they claimed Montalvo allegedly left the organization with computer hard drives .
label: case compound obl punct compound nsubj root case det compound compound flat nmod case obl advmod nsubj advcl nsubj advmod ccomp det obj case compound amod obl punct

text: Whitmore told LA Weekly that on October 6 after traveling back from Florida , Montalvo " walked into lobby of the East L.A. station and turned himself in " , and told the police , " everything he did " .
label: nsubj root compound iobj mark case compound obl mark advcl advmod case obl punct nsubj punct ccomp case obl case det compound compound nmod cc conj obj compound punct punct cc conj det iobj punct punct obj nsubj acl punct punct

text: Whitmore stated to LA Weekly that the alleged crime involved five hard drives each of $ 200 in value .
label: nsubj root case compound obl mark det amod nsubj ccomp nummod amod obj nsubj case acl nummod case nmod punct

text: Montalvo has been assisted by former members of Scientology , including musician Tiziano Lugli and actor Jason Beghe .
label: nsubj aux aux root case amod obl case nmod punct case nmod flat flat cc conj flat flat punct

text: Rathbun requested donations via a statement made on his blog , in order to help Montalvo with his legal defense financing .
label: nsubj root obj case det obl acl case nmod obl punct mark fixed mark advcl obj case nmod amod compound obl punct

text: He described Montalvo as an individual , " facing the penitentiary in thanks for the following sins : a) Leaving a lifehood of slavery to get a taste of freedom and the world . b) Refusing - despite every provocation and incentive and threat - to frame three guys who went out of their ways ( and dipped into their pockets ) to help the kid achieve that freedom . "
label: nsubj root obj case det obl punct punct acl det obj case obl case det amod nmod punct dep appos det obj case nmod mark advcl det obj case nmod cc det conj punct dep conj punct case det obl cc conj cc conj punct mark xcomp nummod obj nsubj acl case fixed nmod obl punct cc conj case nmod obl punct mark advcl det obj xcomp det obj punct punct

text: Pop culture celebrated at Fan Expo Canada 2016 in Toronto
label: amod nsubj root case compound obl nmod nmod case nmod

text: Wednesday , September 7 , 2016
label: root punct compound appos punct nmod

text: The 22nd Fan Expo Canada took place at the Metro Toronto Convention Centre this weekend , attracting thousands to the event , one of the most popular in North America .
label: det amod compound nsubj nmod root obj case det compound compound compound obl det obl punct advcl obj case det obl punct appos case det advmod nmod case compound obl punct

text: Crossing between the genres of science fiction , horror , anime , fantasy and comics , the event sprawled throughout all corners of the facility .

text: Hundreds of vendors offered products new and old , joined by celebrity guests like Stan Lee , Mark Hamill , and Margaret Atwood .

text: Various local fan organizations were there in a charitable capacity , and thousands of fans donned costumes , many of which they themselves created .

text: Atwood , a Booker Prize - winner , was there to launch her graphic novel Angel Catbird , with illustrator Johnnie Christmas .

text: Lee was making his final Canadian convention appearance , part of a larger farewell tour .

text: Hamill 's schedule included a panel with Kevin Conroy , the voice of Batman in Batman : The Animated Series , in which the Star Wars lead played the Joker .

text: Ubisoft , Microsoft , and PlayStation VR all had large areas set up for attendees to try their latest games .

text: From there , the demonstration took players to investigate the murder of Nightwing .

label: det amod compound compound nsubj root case det obl punct advcl compound obj case compound nmod case det amod obl punct

text: Even in early rounds , the event was well attended , with the stands full of gamers , watching the matches with live colour commentary .

text: Both unbeaten teams going in , the Brazillian team won the championship and $ 50,000 .

text: New Zealand begins process to consider changing national flag design
label: nsubj flat root obj mark acl xcomp amod compound obj

text: Thursday , May 7 , 2015
label: root punct compound appos punct nmod

text: On Tuesday , the New Zealand government announced the start of a public process to suggest designs for a new national flag , and determine whether their citizens would prefer a different national flag over the current one .
label: case obl punct det compound flat nsubj root det obj case det amod nmod mark acl obj case det amod amod nmod punct cc conj mark nmod nsubj aux ccomp det amod amod obj case det amod obl punct

text: The current flag of New Zealand .

text: The current New Zealand flag is partially based on the United Kingdom 's flag ;
label: det amod compound flat nsubj aux advmod root case det amod nmod case obl punct

text: the new one would be unique to New Zealand .
label: det amod nsubj aux cop root case obl flat punct

text: The government 's Flag Consideration Project has planned a number of conferences and roadshows as part of this process , with the first meeting set to take place in Christchurch on May 16 .
label: det nmod case compound compound nsubj aux root det obj case nmod cc conj case obl case det nmod punct case det amod obl acl mark xcomp obj case obl case compound obl punct

text: According to the New Zealand Herald , Emeritus Professor John Burrows , the chairman of the project 's panel of twelve , said New Zealand 's flag has never before been open to public choice .
label: case fixed det compound flat obl punct nsubj flat flat flat punct det appos case det nmod case nmod case nmod punct root nmod flat case nsubj aux advmod advmod cop ccomp case amod obl punct

text: Professor Burrows also said resources and kits would be accessible for schools and communities , " For example , schools can run their own flag discussions and referendums to mirror the formal process as part of their own learning exercise " .
label: nsubj flat advmod root nsubj cc conj aux cop ccomp case obl cc conj punct punct case obl punct nsubj aux parataxis nmod amod compound obj cc conj mark advcl det amod obj case obl case nmod amod compound nmod punct punct

text: People were encouraged to submit their designs online at www.flag.govt.nz and suggest what the flag should mean on www.standfor.co.nz .
label: nsubj aux root mark xcomp nmod obj advmod case obl cc conj obj det nsubj aux acl case obl punct

text: Names of participants would be engraved , at their option , on a flag pole monument to be built in the nation 's capital , Wellington .
label: nsubj case nmod aux aux root punct case nmod obl punct case det compound compound obl mark aux acl case det nmod case obl punct appos punct

text: New Zealand 's Prime Minister John Key said he believes redesigning the flag now has a " strong rationale " .
label: nmod flat case compound nsubj flat flat root nsubj ccomp xcomp det nsubj advmod ccomp det punct amod obj punct punct

text: Mr Key promoted the campaign for a unique New Zealand flag on Waitangi Day - February 6 - this year .
label: nsubj flat root det obj case det amod compound flat nmod case compound nmod punct compound appos punct det obl punct

text: Of the public process , he said , " In the end I 'll have one vote in each referendum just like every other New Zealander on the electoral roll " .
label: case det amod obl punct nsubj root punct punct case det obl nsubj aux ccomp nummod obj case det nmod advmod case det amod compound obl case det amod nmod punct punct

text: The New Zealand government intends to hold two referendums to reach a verdict on the flag , at an estimated cost of NZ $ 26 million , although a recent poll found only a quarter of citizens favoured changing the flag .

text: This is a decrease from the year before , when it was forty percent .
label: nsubj cop det root case det nmod advmod punct advmod nsubj cop nummod acl punct

text: The first referendum is to be held from November 20 to December 11 , selecting a single new flag design out of about four finalists .
label: det amod nsubj aux mark aux root case compound obl case compound obl punct advcl det amod amod compound obj advmod case advmod nummod obl punct

text: Voters would then choose between the new flag and their current flag early in 2016 .

text: He characterized the conflict between the Church of Scientology and anonymous posters of the Cruise video as " another small skirmish in a war that Scientology has been waging for almost 15 years , since the early days of newsgroups such as alt.religion.scientology , which posted internal church documents in 1994 .

text: There s [ sic ] something in the hilarious anarchy of the net that produces these ' events ' every now and again . "

text: The poster wrote that " Prompted I think by the Tom Cruise video , a new obsession is taking hold on the internet . An insurgency against The Church of Scientology . "
label: det nsubj root mark punct advcl nsubj parataxis case det compound flat obl punct det amod nsubj aux ccomp obj case det obl punct det parataxis case det nmod case nmod punct punct

text: " Someone emailed me earlier today talking about a tool a group ’s been using to attack the scientology website .
label: punct nsubj root iobj advmod obl advcl case det obl det nsubj aux aux acl mark advcl det compound obj punct

text: It ’s an interesting tool , created to overload / create malformed strings and crash a website ’s database , " said the post by an unknown author on pigmy .

label: root punct compound appos punct nmod

text: With development of Microsoft 's Internet Explorer 9 ( IE9 ) browser almost complete , Microsoft announced on Friday that it is time for IE6 users to move away from the antiquated 10 - year - old browser .

text: PC World 's recent analysis of its own web traffic statistics concluded , " Usually , Internet Explorer is the # 2 browser after Firefox , but over the past 30 days it 's been # 3 , a couple of points behind Safari - and nearly tied with Chrome .

text: I was basically hauled in and told that my mum had attacked the church and that I needed to disconnect from her because she was suppressive .

text: Its round shape symbolizes wealth and good fortune and is believed to bring good luck .
label: nmod amod nsubj root obj cc amod conj cc aux conj mark xcomp amod obj punct

text: Started in 1990 , the Taipei lantern festival continues a 2000 year old tradition of light related festivals marking the end of the Chinese New Year celebrations .
label: advcl case obl punct det compound compound nsubj root det nummod obl amod obj case compound amod nmod acl det obj case det amod amod compound nmod punct

text: This particular event grows in popularity every year .
label: det amod nsubj root case obl det obl punct

text: Last Year over 4 million visitors attended the event and this year the city expects about 6 million visitors according to the event website .
label: amod obl advmod compound nummod nsubj root det obj cc det obl det nsubj conj advmod compound nummod obj case fixed det compound obl punct

text: Colorful lantern scenes not only fill the central square but also the surrounding 2 km circumference of the memorial .
label: amod compound nsubj advmod advmod root det amod obj cc advmod det amod nummod compound conj case det nmod punct

text: Each section has a theme .
label: det nsubj root det obj punct

text: One side of the memorial is scenes made by student groups while other areas represent the counties of Taiwan .
label: nummod nsubj case det nmod cop root acl case compound obl mark amod nsubj advcl det obj case nmod punct

text: There is even a section of lanterns sponsored by foreign countries .
label: expl root advmod det nsubj case nmod acl case amod obl punct

text: The Malaysia Tourism board was quite prominent at the main entrance to the grounds .
label: det compound compound nsubj cop advmod root case det amod obl case det nmod punct

text: As with all new year celebrations in Taiwan , the lantern festival is crowded .
label: mark case det amod compound advcl case nmod punct det compound nsubj aux root punct

text: People flock to see the lantern scenes and enjoy the festival atmosphere as they carry lanterns , given away by the city and bought from street vendors at the event .
label: nsubj root mark advcl det compound obj cc conj det compound obj mark nsubj advcl obj punct acl advmod case det obl cc conj case compound obl case det obl punct

text: The many light toys such a swords , devil ears , and lanterns turn the milling crowd into a unique light show that can be observed by climbing the steps of the 70 meter memorial hall on the grounds .
label: det amod compound nsubj case fixed nmod punct compound conj punct cc conj root det amod obj case det amod compound obl nsubj aux aux acl mark advcl det obj case det nummod compound compound nmod case det nmod punct

text: Local public transportation hubs are often swamped by the event .
label: amod amod compound nsubj aux advmod root case det obl punct

text: The station staff at Chiang Kai Shek Memorial Hall Station do an excellent job of crowd control but lines for the subway can still be hours long and very exhausting .
label: det compound nsubj case compound flat flat compound compound nmod root det amod obj case compound nmod cc nsubj case det nmod aux advmod cop obl conj cc advmod conj punct

text: A sudden rain storm on Sunday night ( March 4 ) caused a mass exodus of people to head for the station prompting lines that backed up into the street .
label: det amod compound nsubj case compound nmod punct compound appos punct root det amod iobj case nmod mark xcomp case det obl advcl obj nsubj acl compound case det obl punct

text: The commuting crowds can be avoided however by walking from NTU Hospital Station or Shandao Station .
label: det amod nsubj aux aux root advmod mark advcl case compound compound obl cc compound conj punct

text: Both of these stops are only about a 20 minute walk from the event and have no crowds at all .
label: nsubj case det nmod cop advmod advmod det compound compound root case det nmod cc conj det obj case obl punct

text: If you really want to avoid the crowds , definitely avoid the weekends .
label: mark nsubj advmod advcl mark xcomp det obj punct advmod root det obj punct

text: Wait until the fourth or fifth day of the festival when the crowds will have dwindled .
label: root case det amod cc conj obl case det nmod advmod det nsubj aux aux advcl punct

text: I visited the festival on Saturday night , the opening night , and there was a sea of people in the square .
label: nsubj root det obj case compound obl punct det compound appos punct cc expl conj det nsubj case nmod case det obl punct

text: I went back the next Tuesday night and there was almost no one there , just a few stray photographers taking advantage of the unimpeded views of the lanterns .
label: nsubj root advmod det amod compound obl cc expl conj advmod det nsubj advmod punct advmod det amod amod nsubj parataxis obj case det amod obl case det nmod punct

text: The festival runs through March 11 this year .
label: det nsubj root case compound obl det obl punct
