text: Hundreds dead in Hajj stampede
label: root dep case compound obl

text: Thursday , January 12 , 2006
label: root punct compound appos punct nmod

text: The Plains of Arafat on the day of Hajj
label: det root case nmod case det nmod case nmod

text: According to the Saudi Interior Ministry over 345 Muslim pilgrims have been killed in a stampede during the annual Hajj pilgrimage near Mecca , Saudi Arabia .
label: case fixed det amod amod obl advmod nummod compound nsubj aux aux root case det obl case det amod compound obl case nmod punct amod appos punct

text: The stampede at Islam 's most holy site happened at Jamarat Bridge , during an event where pebbles are thrown at a pillar to represent the stoning of Satan as part of the final rites of the Hajj .
label: det nsubj case nmod case advmod amod nmod root case compound obl punct case det obl advmod nsubj aux acl case det obl mark advcl det obj case obl case nmod case det amod nmod case det nmod punct

text: The stampede began when luggage from a bus tripped pilgrims at the eastern end of the wall , causing a bottleneck .
label: det nsubj root advmod nsubj case det nmod advcl obj case det amod nmod case det nmod punct advcl det obj punct

text: Those who were tripped were then crushed by the wave of people behind them .
label: nsubj nsubj aux acl aux advmod root case det obl case nmod case nmod punct

text: Muslims are required to make a pilgrimage to Mecca during their lifetimes , if physically or financially possible , as it is one of the five pillars of the Islamic faith .
label: nsubj aux root mark xcomp det obj case nmod case nmod nmod punct mark advmod cc conj advcl punct mark nsubj cop advcl case det nummod nmod case det amod nmod punct

text: Saudi officials had already provided safeguards by installing an oval wall with padded edges to protect pilgrams from a crush , installed security cameras and placed over 60,000 security personnel in the area .
label: amod nsubj aux advmod root obj mark advcl det amod obj case amod nmod mark advcl obj case det obl punct conj compound obj cc conj advmod nummod compound obj case det obl punct

text: This is not the first time deadly stampedes have taken place during the Hajj , with the deadliest stampede during the 1991 Hajj , in which 1,426 pilgrims were trampled .
label: nsubj cop advmod det amod root amod nsubj aux acl obj case det obl punct case det amod nmod case det compound nmod punct case obl nummod nsubj aux acl punct

text: Last week , at least 76 people were killed when the Al - Ghaza Hotel near the Masjid Al - Haram ( Grand Mosque ) collasped , the cause of which is unknown .
label: amod obl punct advmod fixed nummod nsubj aux root advmod det compound punct flat nsubj case det compound nmod punct flat punct amod appos punct advcl punct det nsubj case nmod cop advcl punct

text: Local municipalities in Italy ask taxes from religious schools
label: amod nsubj case nmod root obj case amod obl

text: Sunday , August 2 , 2015
label: root punct compound appos punct nmod

text: In the past few days in Italy , several municipalities have started asking religious schools to pay taxes for property and local services , despite the resistance of the Catholic Church .
label: case det amod amod obl case nmod punct amod nsubj aux root xcomp amod iobj mark xcomp obj case nmod cc amod conj punct case det obl case det compound nmod punct

text: Instituto Gonzaga , a catholic school in Milan . Image : Friedrichstrasse .
label: root compound punct det amod appos case nmod punct parataxis punct dep punct

text: The request of the municipalities results from the sentence of the Italian Supreme Court of Cassation on July 8 , recognising as legitimate the request of the Municipality of Livorno asking religious schools to pay property taxes .
label: det nsubj case det nmod root case det obl case det amod amod nmod case nmod case compound nmod punct acl case obl det obj case det nmod case nmod acl amod iobj mark xcomp compound obj punct

text: Requests have come from the Municipality of Bogliasco , next to Genova , and from the deputies of Movimento 5 Stelle ( M5S ) of the regional counsel of Lombardy .
label: nsubj aux root case det obl case nmod punct advmod case obl punct cc case det conj case nmod flat flat punct appos punct case det amod nmod case nmod punct

text: The first case is of the mayor Luca Pastorino that in last years received several refusals of his requests for payment because of the religious nursery school and retirement home .
label: det amod nsubj cop case det root appos flat nsubj case amod obl acl amod obj case nmod nmod case nmod case fixed det amod compound obl cc compound conj punct

text: In the second case , the M5S party asks to the regional government to assure the local administrations of the region regularly apply the sentence of the Supreme Court .
label: case det amod obl punct det compound nsubj root case det amod obl mark xcomp det amod nsubj case det nmod advmod ccomp det obj case det compound nmod punct

text: The case on which the Court has ruled was of the religious schools Santo Spirito and Immacolata in Livorno , Tuscany , to pay over 422,000 euros in arrears for the period from 2004 to 2009 .
label: det nsubj case obl det nsubj aux acl cop case det amod root appos flat cc conj case nmod punct appos punct mark parataxis advmod nummod obj case obl case det obl case nmod case nmod punct

text: The request was advanced by the Municipality of Livorno in 2010 .
label: det nsubj aux root case det obl case nmod case obl punct

text: The city reasoned , " because the users of the private schools pay a frequency fee , this kind of activity is considered as a commercial one " ( ( it ) ) .
label: det nsubj root punct punct mark det nsubj case det amod nmod advcl det compound obj punct det nsubj case nmod aux ccomp case det amod obl punct punct punct dep punct punct punct

text: In 2014 the Italian municipal tax discipline has changed from the ICI system to the IMU system by the Monti government .
label: case obl det amod amod compound nsubj aux root case det compound obl case det compound obl case det compound nmod punct

text: A mean cost per student criterion is used to tax only the schools that receive a fee higher than the mean cost per student fixed by the State .
label: det amod compound case nmod nsubj aux root mark advcl advmod det obj nsubj acl det obj amod case det amod obl case nmod acl case det obl punct

text: The new law is not retroactive , so the taxes requested in arrears from 2006 to 2009 are under the ICI system .
label: det amod nsubj cop advmod root punct advmod det nsubj acl case obl case nmod case nmod cop case det compound parataxis punct

text: Minister of Education Stefania Giannini said a " more general reflection " ( ( it ) ) is needed .
label: nsubj case nmod flat flat root det punct advmod amod nsubj punct punct punct dep punct punct aux ccomp punct

text: Claudio De Vincenti , undersecretary to the prime minister , said " a discussion table will be opened with the non-profit associations , religious association included " ( ( it ) ) .
label: nsubj flat flat punct appos case det amod nmod punct root punct det compound nsubj aux aux ccomp case det amod obl punct amod nsubj acl punct punct punct dep punct punct punct

text: Undersecretary for Education Mr. Toccafondi says " many schools will increase their fees or they will quit . Then the State will have to find new resources to build new structures and manage them " ( ( it ) ) .
label: nsubj case nmod appos flat root punct amod nsubj aux ccomp nmod obj cc nsubj aux conj punct advmod det nsubj aux parataxis mark xcomp amod obj mark advcl amod obj cc conj obj punct punct punct dep punct punct punct

text: Also the president of the Lombardy region , Roberto Maroni , has reacted by proposing some regional counter-measures to finance private schools .
label: advmod det nsubj case det compound nmod punct appos flat punct aux root mark advcl det amod obj mark advcl amod obj punct

text: The secretary general of CEI ( Italian Episcopal Conference ) , Nunzio Galantino , has called the sentence " dangerous " ( ( it ) ) and " ideological " ( ( it ) ) :
label: det compound nsubj case nmod punct compound compound appos punct punct appos flat punct aux root det obj punct xcomp punct punct punct dep punct punct cc punct conj punct punct punct dep punct punct punct

text: " We face a dangerous sentence .
label: punct nsubj root det amod obj punct

text: Who takes the decisions , do it with less ideology .
label: vocative acl det obj punct root obj case amod obl punct

text: Because I have the clear sensation that with this way of thinking , they wait the praise of some ideologized supporters .
label: mark nsubj root det amod obj mark case det obl mark acl punct nsubj acl det obj case det amod nmod punct

text: Indeed , they do n't understand what kind of good service private schools held " ( ( it ) ) .
label: advmod punct nsubj aux advmod root det obj case amod nmod amod nsubj ccomp punct punct punct dep punct punct punct

text: Italian secularist associations are concerned the Government will modify the law in order to maintain an exception for religious schools .
label: amod compound nsubj aux root det nsubj aux ccomp det obj mark fixed mark advcl det obj case amod nmod punct

text: The secularist magazine MicroMega describe the court 's judgement as historic .
label: det compound nsubj appos root det nmod case obj case obl punct

text: The Union of Rationalist Atheists and Agnostics ( UAAR ) has launched a petition which now has more than 11,000 signatures , asking the government to respect and execute the sentence of the Supreme Court .
label: det nsubj case nmod flat cc conj punct appos punct aux root det obj nsubj advmod acl advmod fixed nummod obj punct acl det iobj mark xcomp cc conj det obj case det amod nmod punct

text: It is also encouraging citizens to ask for application of the law in their local municipalities .
label: nsubj aux advmod root obj mark xcomp case obl case det nmod case nmod amod nmod punct

text: Warhol 's photo legacy spread by university exhibits
label: nmod case compound root acl case compound obl

text: Tuesday , January 28 , 2014
label: root punct compound appos punct nmod

text: Portrait shot of Dennis Hopper , famous for his role in the 1969 film Easy Rider , amongst the Warhol Polaroids donated to USI by the Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts .
label: compound root case nmod flat punct amod case nmod obl case det compound nmod amod appos punct case det compound nmod acl case obl case det compound flat obl case det amod nmod punct

text: Image : Andy Warhol .
label: root punct dep flat punct

text: Opening night , January 23 , 2014 , of the Andy Warhol exhibit of Polaroids and screen prints at the University of Southern Indiana .
label: amod root punct compound appos punct nmod punct case det compound flat nmod case nmod cc compound conj case det nmod case amod nmod punct

text: Video : Miharris & Acphillips .
label: root punct dep cc conj punct

text: Evansville , Indiana , United States -
label: root punct appos punct amod appos punct

text: This past week marked the opening night of an Andy Warhol exhibit at the University of Southern Indiana .
label: det amod nsubj root det amod obj case det compound flat nmod case det nmod case amod nmod punct

text: USI 's art gallery , like 189 other educational galleries and museums around the country , is a recipient of a major Warhol donor program , and this program is cultivating new interest in Warhol 's photographic legacy .
label: nmod case compound nsubj punct case nummod amod amod nmod cc conj case det nmod punct cop det root case det amod compound compound nmod punct cc det nsubj aux conj amod obj case nmod case amod obl punct

text: Wikinews reporters attended the opening and spoke to donors , exhibit organizers and patrons .
label: compound nsubj root det obj cc conj case obl punct compound conj cc conj punct

text: The USI art gallery celebrated the Thursday opening with its display of Warhol 's Polaroids , gelatin silver prints and several colored screen prints .
label: det compound compound nsubj root det compound obj case nmod obl case nmod case nmod punct compound compound conj cc amod amod compound conj punct

text: USI 's exhibit , which is located in Evansville , Indiana , is to run from January 23 through March 9 .
label: nmod case nsubj punct nsubj aux acl case obl punct appos punct aux mark root case compound obl case compound obl punct

text: Full interview with Kristin Wilkins , curator of the exhibition at the University of Southern Indiana .
label: amod root case nmod flat punct appos case det nmod case det nmod case amod nmod punct

text: Audio : Jkthom .
label: root punct dep punct

text: The McCutchan Art Center / Pace Galleries at USI bases its exhibit around roughly 100 Polaroids selected from its collection .
label: det compound compound nsubj cc compound conj case nmod root nmod obj case advmod nummod obl acl case nmod obl punct

text: The Polaroids were all donated by the Andy Warhol Photographic Legacy Program , according to Kristen Wilkins , assistant professor of photography and curator of the exhibit .
label: det nsubj aux advmod root case det compound flat amod compound obl punct case fixed obl flat punct amod appos case nmod cc conj case det nmod punct

text: The Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts made two donations to USI Art Collections , in 2007 and a second recently .
label: det compound flat nsubj case det amod nmod root nummod obj case compound compound nmod punct case nmod cc det conj advmod punct

text: Kathryn Waters , director of the gallery , expressed interest in further donations from the foundation in the future .
label: nsubj flat punct appos case det nmod punct root obj case amod obl case det nmod case det nmod punct

text: Since 2007 the Andy Warhol Photographic Legacy Program has seeded university art galleries throughout the United States with over 28,000 Andy Warhol photographs and other artifacts .
label: case obl det compound flat amod compound nsubj aux root compound compound obj case det amod obl case advmod nummod compound flat nmod cc amod conj punct

text: The program takes a decentralized approach to Warhol 's photography collection and encourages university art galleries to regularly disseminate and educate audiences about Warhol 's artistic vision , especially in the area of photography .
label: det nsubj root det amod obj case nmod case compound nmod cc conj compound compound obj mark advmod xcomp cc conj obj case nmod case amod nmod punct advmod case det obl case nmod punct

text: University exhibits
label: compound root

text: Kristen Wilkins , curator of " Andy Warhol : Photographs and Prints from the University Collection " at the University of Southern Indiana , January 23 - March 9 2014 .
label: root flat punct appos case punct nmod flat punct dep cc conj case det compound nmod punct case det nmod case amod nmod punct compound nmod case compound nmod nmod punct

text: Image : Snbehnke .
label: root punct dep punct

text: Wikinews provides additional video , audio and photographs so our readers may learn more .
label: nsubj root amod obj punct conj cc conj mark nmod nsubj aux advcl obj punct

text: Wilkins observed that the 2007 starting date of the donation program , which is part of the Andy Warhol Foundation for the Visual Arts , coincided with the 20th anniversary of Andy Warhol 's death in 1987 .
label: nsubj root mark det compound amod nsubj case det compound nmod punct nsubj cop acl case det compound flat nmod case det amod nmod punct ccomp case det amod obl case nmod flat case nmod case nmod punct

text: USI was not alone in receiving a donation .
label: nsubj cop advmod root mark advcl det obj punct

text: K.C. Maurer , chief financial officer and treasurer at the Andy Warhol Foundation , said 500 institutions received the initial invitation and currently 190 universities have accepted one or more donations .
label: nsubj flat punct amod amod appos cc conj case det compound flat nmod punct root nummod nsubj ccomp det amod obj cc advmod nummod nsubj aux conj nummod cc conj obj punct

text: Institutional recipients , said Mauer , are required to exhibit their donated Warhol photographs every ten years as one stipulation .
label: amod nsubj punct discourse nsubj punct aux root mark xcomp nmod amod compound obj det nummod obl case nummod obl punct

text: While USI is holding its exhibit , there are also Warhol Polaroid exhibits at the Tang Teaching Museum and Art Gallery at Skidmore College in Saratoga Springs , New York and an Edward Steichen and Andy Warhol exhibit at the Mary & Leigh Block Museum of Art at Northwestern University in Evanston , Illinois .
label: mark nsubj aux advcl nmod obj punct expl root advmod compound compound nsubj case det compound compound nmod cc compound conj case compound nmod case compound nmod punct amod appos cc det compound compound cc conj flat conj case det compound cc conj compound nmod case nmod case compound nmod case nmod punct appos punct

text: All have received Polaroids from the foundation .
label: nsubj aux root obj case det obl punct

text: University exhibits can reach out and attract large audiences .
label: compound nsubj aux root compound cc conj amod obj punct

text: For example , the Weatherspoon Art Museum at the University of North Carolina at Greensboro saw attendance levels reach 11,000 visitors when it exhibited its Warhol collection in 2010 , according to curator Elaine Gustafon .
label: case obl punct det compound compound nsubj case det nmod case compound nmod case nmod root compound nsubj ccomp nummod obj advmod nsubj advcl nmod compound obj case obl punct case fixed obl flat flat punct

text: That exhibit was part of a collaboration combining the collections from Duke University , located in Durham , North Carolina , and University of North Carolina at Chapel Hill , which also were recipients of donated items from the Andy Warhol Photographic Legacy Program .
label: det nsubj cop root case det nmod acl det obj case compound nmod punct acl case obl punct compound appos punct cc conj case compound nmod case compound nmod punct nsubj advmod cop acl case amod nmod case det compound flat amod compound nmod punct

text: Superstars
label: root

text: Each collection donated by the Andy Warhol Photographic Legacy Program holds Polaroids of well - known celebrities .
label: det nsubj acl case det compound flat amod compound obl root obj case advmod punct amod nmod punct

text: The successful UNC Greensboro exhibit included Polaroids of author Truman Capote and singer - songwriter Carly Simon .
label: det amod compound nmod nsubj root obj case nmod flat flat cc compound punct conj flat flat punct

text: " I think America 's obsession with celebrity culture is as strong today as it was when Warhol was living " , said Gustafon .
label: punct nsubj ccomp nmod case nsubj case compound nmod cop advmod ccomp obl mark nsubj advcl advmod nsubj aux advcl punct punct root nsubj punct

text: " People are still intrigued by how stars live , dress and socialize , since it is so different from most people 's every day lives . "
label: punct nsubj aux advmod root case obl nsubj advcl punct conj cc conj punct mark nsubj cop advmod advcl case amod nmod case det compound obl punct punct

text: Wilkins explained Warhol 's obsession with celebrities began when he first collected head shots as a kid and continued as a passion throughout his life .
label: nsubj root nmod case nsubj case nmod ccomp advmod nsubj advmod advcl compound obj case det obl cc conj case det obl case nmod obl punct

text: " He 's hanging out with the celebrities , and has kind of become the same sort of celebrity he was interested in documenting earlier in his career " , Wilkins said .
label: punct nsubj aux ccomp compound case det obl punct cc aux advmod fixed conj det amod xcomp case nmod nsubj cop acl mark advcl advmod case nmod obl punct punct nsubj root punct

text: The exhibit at USI includes Polaroids of actor Dennis Hopper ; musician Nick Rhodes of Duran Duran ; publishers Jann Wenner of Rolling Stone Magazine and Carlo De Benedetti of Italy 's la Repubblica ; disco club owner Steve Rubell of Studio 54 ; photographers Nat Finkelstein , Christopher Makos and Felice Quinto ; and athletes Vitas Gerulaitis ( tennis ) and Jack Nicklaus ( golf ) .
label: det nsubj case nmod root obj case nmod flat flat punct conj flat flat case nmod flat punct conj flat flat case amod compound nmod cc conj flat flat case nmod case nmod flat punct compound compound conj flat flat case nmod nummod punct conj flat flat punct conj flat cc conj flat punct cc conj flat flat punct dep punct cc conj flat punct dep punct punct

text: Wikinews observed the USI exhibit identifies and features Polaroids of fashion designer Halston , a former resident of Evansville .
label: nsubj root det compound nsubj ccomp cc conj obj case compound compound nmod punct det amod appos case nmod punct

text: University collections across the United States also include Polaroids of " unknowns " who have not yet had their fifteen minutes of fame .
label: compound nsubj case det amod nmod advmod root obj case punct nmod punct nsubj aux advmod advmod acl nmod nummod obj case nmod punct

text: Cynthia Thompson , curator and director of exhibits at the University of Arkansas , Fayetteville , said , " These images serve as documentation of people in his every day life and art - one which many of us enjoy a glimpse into . "
label: nsubj flat punct appos cc conj case nmod case det nmod case nmod punct appos punct root punct punct det nsubj ccomp case obl case nmod case nmod det compound nmod cc conj punct appos nmod nsubj case obl acl det obj case punct punct

text: Warhol 's photographic legacy
label: nmod case amod root

text: Warhol was close to important touchstones of the 1960s , including art , music , consumer culture , fashion , and celebrity worship , which were all buzzwords and images Wikinews observed at USI 's opening exhibit .
label: nsubj cop root case amod obl case det nmod punct case nmod punct conj punct compound conj punct conj punct cc compound conj punct nsubj cop advmod acl cc conj nsubj acl case nmod case amod obl punct

text: He was also an influential figure in the pop art movement .
label: nsubj cop advmod det amod root case det compound compound nmod punct

text: " Pop art was about what popular American culture really thought was important " , Kathryn Waters said .
label: punct compound nsubj cop case ccomp amod amod nsubj advmod acl cop ccomp punct punct nsubj flat root punct

text: " That 's why he did the Campbell Soup cans or the Marilyn pictures , these iconic products of American culture whether they be in film , video or actually products we consumed .
label: punct nsubj cop root nsubj advcl det compound compound obj cc det compound conj punct det amod appos case amod nmod mark nsubj cop case advcl punct conj cc advmod conj nsubj acl punct

text: So even back in the sixties , he was very aware of this part of our culture .
label: advmod advmod advmod case det obl punct nsubj cop advmod root case det obl case nmod nmod punct

text: Which as we all know in 2014 , has only increased probably a thousand fold . "
label: nsubj mark nsubj det advcl case obl punct aux advmod root advmod det compound obj punct punct

text: " I think everybody knows Andy Warhol 's name , even non-art people , that 's a name they might know because he was such a personality " , Water said .
label: punct nsubj ccomp nsubj ccomp nmod flat case obj punct advmod compound appos punct nsubj cop det conj nsubj aux acl mark nsubj cop det det advcl punct punct nsubj root punct

text: Hilary Braysmith , USI associate professor of art history , said , " I think his photography is equally influential as his graphic works , his more famous pictures of Marilyn .
label: nsubj flat punct compound compound appos case compound nmod punct root punct punct nsubj ccomp nmod nsubj cop advmod ccomp case nmod amod obl punct nmod advmod amod appos case nmod punct

text: In terms of the evolution of photography and experimentation , like painting on them or the celebrity fascination , I think he was really ground - breaking in that regard . "
label: case obl case det nmod case nmod cc conj punct mark acl case obl cc det compound conj punct nsubj root nsubj cop advmod compound punct ccomp case det obl punct punct

text: The Polaroid format is not what made Warhol famous , however , he is in the company of other well - known photographers who used the camera , such as Ansel Adams , Chuck Close , Walker Evans , Robert Mapplethorpe , and Helmut Newton .
label: det compound nsubj cop advmod root acl obj xcomp punct advmod punct nsubj cop case det parataxis case amod advmod punct amod nmod nsubj acl det obj punct case fixed nmod flat punct conj flat punct conj flat punct conj flat punct cc conj flat punct

text: Wilkins said , " [ Warhol ] liked the way photo booths and the Polaroid 's front flash looked " .
label: nsubj root punct punct punct nsubj punct ccomp det obj compound nsubj cc det nmod case amod conj acl punct punct

text: She explained how Warhol 's adoption of the Polaroid camera revealed his process .
label: nsubj root obj nmod case nsubj case det compound nmod advcl nmod obj punct

text: According to Wilkins , Warhol was able to reproduce the Polaroid photograph and create an enlargement of it , which he then could use to commit the image to the silk screen medium by applying paint or manipulating them further .
label: case fixed obl punct nsubj cop root mark xcomp det compound obj cc conj det obj case nmod punct obj nsubj advmod aux acl mark advcl det obj case det compound compound obl mark advcl obj cc conj obj advmod punct

text: One of the silk screens exhibited at USI this time was the Annie Oakley screen print called " Cowboys and Indians " from 1987 .
label: nsubj case det compound nmod acl case obl det obl cop det compound flat compound root acl punct obj cc conj punct case nmod punct

text: Wilkins also said Warhol was both an artist and a businessperson .
label: nsubj advmod root nsubj cop cc det ccomp cc det conj punct

text: " As a way to commercialize his work , he would make a blue Marilyn and a pink Marilyn and a yellow Marilyn , and then you could pick your favorite color and buy that .
label: punct case det obl mark acl nmod obj punct nsubj aux root det amod obj cc det amod conj cc det amod conj punct cc advmod nsubj aux conj nmod amod obj cc conj obj punct

text: It was a very practical salesman approach to his work .
label: nsubj cop det advmod amod compound root case nmod nmod punct

text: He was very prolific but very business minded about that . "
label: nsubj cop advmod root cc advmod compound conj case obl punct punct

text: " He wanted to be rich and famous and he made lots of choices to go that way " , Wilkins said .
label: punct nsubj ccomp mark cop xcomp cc conj cc nsubj conj obj case nmod mark advcl det obj punct punct nsubj root punct

text: USI exhibit
label: compound root

text: Kiara Perkins , a second year USI art major , admitted she was willing to skip class Thursday night to attend the opening exhibit but then circumstances allowed for her to attend the exhibit .
label: nsubj flat punct det amod compound compound compound appos punct root nsubj cop ccomp mark xcomp obj compound obl mark advcl det amod obj cc advmod nsubj conj mark nsubj mark advcl det obj punct

text: Why did she so badly want to attend ?
label: advmod aux nsubj advmod advmod root mark xcomp punct

text: " It 's Warhol .
label: punct nsubj cop root punct

text: He is a legend . "
label: nsubj cop det root punct punct

text: For Kevin Allton , a USI instructor in English , Warhol was also a legend .
label: case nmod flat punct det compound appos case nmod punct nsubj cop advmod det root punct

text: He said , " Andy Warhol was the center of the Zeitgeist for the 20th century and everything since .
label: nsubj root punct punct nsubj flat cop det ccomp case det nmod case det amod nmod cc conj advmod punct

text: He is a post-modern diety . "
label: nsubj cop det amod root punct punct

text: Allton said he had only seen the Silver Clouds installation before in film .
label: nsubj root nsubj aux advmod ccomp det amod compound obj advmod case obl punct

text: The Silver Clouds installation were silver balloons blown up with helium , and those balloons filled one of the smaller rooms in the gallery .
label: det amod compound nsubj cop amod root acl compound case obl punct cc det nsubj conj obj case det amod nmod case det nmod punct

text: " I thought that in real life it was really kind of magical , " Allton said .
label: punct nsubj ccomp mark case amod obl nsubj cop advmod advmod fixed ccomp punct punct nsubj root punct

text: " I smacked them around . "
label: punct nsubj root obj advmod punct punct

text: Elements of the Zeitgeist were also playfully recreated on USI 's opening night .
label: nsubj case det nmod aux advmod advmod root case nmod case amod obl punct

text: In her opening remarks for attendees , Waters pointed out those features to attendees , noting the touches of the Warhol Factory , or the studio where he worked , that were present around them .
label: case nmod amod obl case nmod punct nsubj root compound det obj case obl punct advcl det obj case det compound nmod punct cc det conj advmod nsubj acl punct nsubj cop acl case obl punct

text: She pointed to the refreshment table with Campbell 's Soup served with " electric " Kool Aid and tables adorned with colorful gumball " pills " .
label: nsubj root case det compound obl mark nmod case nsubj acl case punct amod punct compound obl cc nsubj conj case amod compound punct obl punct punct

text: The music in the background was from such bands as The Velvet Underground .
label: det nsubj case det nmod cop case amod root case det compound nmod punct

text: The big hit of the evening , Wikinews observed from the long line , was the Polaroid - room where attendees could wear a Warhol - like wig or don crazy glasses and have their own Polaroid taken .
label: det amod nsubj case det nmod punct nsubj discourse case det amod obl punct cop det compound punct root advmod nsubj aux acl det compound punct amod obj cc conj amod obj cc conj nmod amod obj xcomp punct

text: The Polaroids were ready in an instant and immediately displayed at the entry of the exhibit .
label: det nsubj cop root case det obl cc advmod conj case det obl case det nmod punct

text: Exhibit goers then became part of the very exhibit they had wanted to attend .

text: In fact , many people Wikinews observed took out their mobiles as they left for the evening and used their own phone cameras to make one further record of the moment - a photo of a photo .
label: case obl punct amod nsubj nsubj acl root compound nmod obj mark nsubj advcl case det obl cc conj nmod amod compound obj mark advcl nummod amod obj case det nmod punct det appos case det nmod punct

text: Perhaps they had learned an important lesson from the Warhol exhibit that cultural events like these were ripe for use and reuse .

text: Scientists analyse effects of global warming , atmospheric ozone on crops
label: nsubj root obj case amod nmod punct amod conj case nmod

text: Monday , July 28 , 2014
label: root punct compound appos punct nmod

text: A research team from the Massachusetts Institute of Technology and Colorado State University of the US and the University of Sheffield of the UK has analysed effects of global warming and ozone pollution over 2000 - 2050 on the worldwide production of wheat , rice , maize and soybean .
label: det compound nsubj case det compound nmod case nmod cc compound compound conj case det nmod cc det conj case nmod case det nmod aux root obj case amod nmod cc compound conj case nmod case nmod case det amod nmod case nmod punct conj punct conj cc conj punct

text: The study was published in journal Nature Climate Change yesterday .
label: det nsubj aux root case obl compound compound appos obl punct

text: The scientists found reduction of crop yields by 2050 exceeded 10 % of 2000 levels , substantially decreasing food security , in all cases examined .
label: det nsubj root nsubj case compound nmod case nmod ccomp nummod obj case compound nmod punct advmod advcl compound obj punct case det obl acl punct

text: Several scenarios were considered because of uncertainty of future levels of ozone pollution .
label: amod nsubj aux root case fixed obl case amod nmod case compound nmod punct

text: They estimated by 2050 , increasing population and changing diet would increase world food needs by 50 percent .
label: nsubj root case obl punct amod nsubj cc amod conj aux ccomp compound compound obj case nummod obl punct

text: As coauthor Colette Heald told The Huffington Post , " The climate projections are quite consistent [...]
label: mark nsubj compound appos advcl det compound iobj punct punct det compound nsubj cop advmod root punct

text: the future of ozone pollution is very different [...] leading to either offsetting or reinforcing effects [ of climate change ] on crops " .
label: det nsubj case compound nmod cop advmod root punct advcl case cc amod cc conj obl punct case compound nmod punct case nmod punct punct

text: By 2050 , undernourishment would increase by either 49 percent or by 27 percent , depending on the scenario .
label: case obl punct nsubj aux root case cc nummod obl cc case nummod conj punct case fixed det obl punct

text: The study focuses on ozone - temperature covariation : ground - level ozone increases with temperatures .
label: det nsubj root case compound punct compound obl punct compound punct compound nsubj parataxis case obl punct

text: Heald said although temperature and ozone are separately known to impact crop yields , " nobody has looked at these together " .
label: nsubj root mark nsubj cc conj aux advmod advcl mark xcomp compound obj punct punct nsubj aux ccomp case obl advmod punct punct

text: Depending on region and crops , the yields may be primarily sensitive to ozone - in the case of wheat - or heat - in the case of maize - alone , providing a local estimation of relative benefits of climate change adaptation versus ozone regulation .
label: case fixed obl cc conj punct det nsubj aux cop advmod root case obl punct case det nmod case nmod punct cc conj punct case det nmod case nmod punct advmod punct advcl det amod obj case amod nmod case compound compound nmod case compound nmod punct

text: The U.S. Department of Agriculture notes , " Ground - level ozone causes more damage to plants than all other air pollutants combined " , highlighting the importance of air quality for agriculture .
label: det compound nsubj case nmod root punct punct compound punct compound nsubj dep amod obj case obl case det amod compound nmod acl punct punct xcomp det obj case compound nmod case nmod punct

text: Results of NCLAN studies , published in a paper by AS Heagle in 1989 , show dicot species , such as soybean , cotton , and peanut , lose more yield from ozone than do monocot species such as sorghum , field corn , and winter wheat .
label: nsubj case compound nmod punct acl case det obl case nmod flat case obl punct root compound nsubj punct case fixed nmod punct conj punct cc conj punct ccomp amod obj case obl mark acl compound nsubj case fixed nmod punct compound conj punct cc compound conj punct

text: The researchers found that ozone pollution caused 46 percent of previously heat - attributed damage to soybean crops .
label: det nsubj root mark compound nsubj ccomp nummod obj case advmod compound punct amod nmod case compound nmod punct

text: The model does not include the effect of rising carbon dioxide concentration , which has complex and potentially offsetting impacts on global food supply .
label: det nsubj aux advmod root det obj case amod compound compound nmod punct nsubj acl amod cc conj amod obj case amod compound nmod punct

text: The U.S. Environmental Protection Agency says some crops may have higher yields with increased levels of carbon dioxide .
label: det compound compound compound nsubj root det nsubj aux ccomp amod obj case amod obl case compound nmod punct

text: However , global warming also increases probability of extreme crops - damaging weather events such as floods , droughts , and extreme temperatures .
label: advmod punct amod nsubj advmod root obj case amod compound punct amod compound nmod case fixed nmod punct conj punct cc amod conj punct

text: Climate change affects distribution of weeds , pests , and diseases .
label: compound nsubj root obj case nmod punct conj punct cc conj punct

text: Heald noted the findings show pollution reduction is also important .
label: nsubj root det nsubj ccomp compound nsubj cop advmod ccomp punct

text: " An air - quality cleanup would improve crop yields [...]
label: punct det compound punct compound nsubj aux root compound obj punct

text: Ozone is something that we understand the causes of , and the steps that need to be taken to improve air quality . "
label: nsubj cop root nmod nsubj acl det obj case punct cc det conj nsubj acl mark aux xcomp mark advcl compound obj punct punct

text: As Heald told The Huffington Post , US surface ozone has dropped partly due to the Clean Air Act .
label: mark nsubj advcl det compound iobj punct compound compound nsubj aux root advmod xcomp case det compound compound obl punct

text: " Despite an increase in vehicle miles driven and energy consumption , surface ozone has declined by 25 percent on average across the U.S. from 1980 to 2012 [...]
label: punct case det obl case compound nmod acl cc compound conj punct compound nsubj aux root case nummod obl case nmod case det obl case obl case obl punct

text: However , the future of ozone air quality in the U.S. and around the world will depend on local emissions , the use of pollution control technology , regulations , and air quality policy . "
label: advmod punct det nsubj case compound compound nmod case det nmod cc case det conj aux root case amod obl punct det conj case compound compound nmod punct conj punct cc compound compound conj punct punct

text: The study was supported by the Croucher Foundation , US National Science Foundation , and US National Park Service .
label: det nsubj aux root case det compound obl punct compound compound compound conj punct cc compound compound compound conj punct

text: Greek court rules worship of ancient Greek deities is legal
label: amod nsubj root nsubj case amod amod nmod cop ccomp

text: Monday , March 27 , 2006
label: root punct compound appos punct nmod

text: Greek court has ruled that worshippers of the ancient Greek religion may now formally associate and worship at archeological sites .
label: amod nsubj aux root mark nsubj case det amod amod nmod aux advmod advmod ccomp cc conj case amod obl punct

text: Prior to the ruling , the religion was banned from conducting public worship at archeological sites by the Greek Ministry of Culture .
label: case fixed det obl punct det nsubj aux root mark advcl amod obj case amod obl case det amod obl case nmod punct

text: Due to that , the religion was relatively secretive .
label: case fixed obl punct det nsubj cop advmod root punct

text: The Greek Orthodox Church , a Christian denomination , is extremely critical of worshippers of the ancient deities .
label: det amod amod nsubj punct det amod appos punct cop advmod root case obl case det amod nmod punct

text: Today , about 100,000 Greeks worship the ancient gods , such as Zeus , Hera , Poseidon , Aphrodite , and Athena .
label: obl punct advmod nummod nsubj root det amod obj punct case fixed nmod punct conj punct conj punct conj punct cc conj punct

text: The Greek Orthodox Church estimates that number is closer to 40,000 .
label: det amod amod nsubj root det nsubj cop ccomp case obl punct

text: Many neo - pagan religions , such as Wicca , use aspects of ancient Greek religions in their practice ; Hellenic polytheism instead focuses exclusively on the ancient religions , as far as the fragmentary nature of the surviving source material allows .
label: amod compound punct amod nsubj punct case fixed nmod punct root obj case amod amod nmod case nmod obl punct amod nsubj advmod parataxis advmod case det amod obl punct advmod advmod mark det amod nsubj case det amod compound nmod advcl punct

text: It is my special pleasure to address the fifty - ninth session of the General Assembly of the United Nations .
label: expl cop nmod amod root mark csubj det amod punct appos obj case det amod nmod case det amod nmod punct

text: This universal forum has enabled the peoples of the world to coordinate and harmonize their efforts in preserving peace and security , in achieving prosperity and upholding the values of human civilization .
label: det amod nsubj aux root det obj case det nmod mark xcomp cc conj nmod obj mark acl obj cc conj punct mark conj obj cc conj det obj case amod nmod punct

text: I would like to congratulate you , Mr. President , on being elected to preside over this august body and to express my confidence in your successful leadership .
label: nsubj aux root mark xcomp obj punct vocative flat punct mark aux advcl mark xcomp case det amod obl cc mark conj nmod obj case nmod amod nmod punct

text: I would also like , on behalf of Albania , to convey to the Secretary - General our highest appreciation for his leading contribution to the fulfilment of the historical mission of the United Nations and to the aspirations of our peoples for a better world in which only peace , democracy and economic prosperity reign .
label: nsubj aux advmod root punct case obl case nmod punct mark xcomp case det obl punct flat nmod amod obj case nmod amod nmod case det nmod case det amod nmod case det amod nmod cc case det conj case nmod nmod case det amod nmod case obl advmod nsubj punct conj cc amod conj acl punct

text: This session of the General Assembly takes place in a milestone year for Europe .
label: det nsubj case det amod nmod root obj case det compound obl case nmod punct

text: Only a few months ago , a historic event vitalized the dream of a more united and stronger Europe .
label: advmod det amod obl advmod punct det amod nsubj root det obj case det advmod amod cc conj nmod punct

text: Ten European countries , sharing a common aspiration for integration , were admitted into the European Union .
label: nummod amod nsubj punct acl det amod obj case nmod punct aux root case det amod obl punct

text: The Albanian Government and society are engaged in an all - round European integration process , and they are carrying out necessary reforms with the necessary political will and drive .
label: det amod nsubj cc conj aux root case det det punct compound amod compound obl punct cc nsubj aux conj compound amod obj case det amod amod obl cc conj punct

text: Albania is working to strengthen the democratic institutions and capacities of its central and local government with a view to bringing its legislation and conditions into line with European Union standards , progressively achieving concrete and measurable results , as previously defined .
label: nsubj aux root mark xcomp det amod obj cc conj case nmod amod cc conj nmod case det obl mark acl nmod obj cc conj case obl case amod compound nmod punct advmod advcl amod cc conj obj punct mark advmod advcl punct

text: Determined to make our contribution to regional and global security , the Albanian Government considers the country 's integration into NATO to be one of its major objectives .
label: advcl mark xcomp nmod obj case amod cc conj nmod punct det amod nsubj root det nmod case obj case nmod mark cop xcomp case nmod amod nmod punct

text: The NATO Istanbul Summit last June commended the progress made by my country in this regard and encouraged the deepening of reforms .
label: det compound compound nsubj amod nmod root det obj acl case nmod obl case det obl cc conj det obj case nmod punct

text: It welcomed Albania 's contribution to regional stability and cooperation and committed to assess our further progress at the next NATO summit , which would hopefully mark the start of negotiations for our full membership in the alliance .
label: nsubj root nmod case obj case amod nmod cc conj cc conj mark xcomp nmod amod obj case det amod compound obl punct nsubj aux advmod acl det obj case nmod case nmod amod nmod case det nmod punct

text: We believe that the commitments set up in the framework of the Adriatic Charter are also contributing to meet NATO standards , to the benefit of regional stability and security .
label: nsubj root mark det nsubj acl compound case det obl case det amod nmod aux advmod ccomp mark xcomp compound obj punct case det obl case amod nmod cc conj punct

text: We remain truly convinced that the respect and protection of human rights and freedoms are the main pillars of a pluralist democratic society .
label: nsubj root advmod xcomp mark det nsubj cc conj case amod nmod cc conj cop det amod ccomp case det amod amod nmod punct

text: The Government of the Republic of Albania will continue to constantly demonstrate its commitment to a full implementation of the standards enshrined in the United Nations and Council of Europe conventions , as well as the relevant documents of regional organizations , such as the Organization for Security and Cooperation in Europe , in which we are playing a very active role .
label: det nsubj case det nmod case nmod aux root mark advmod xcomp nmod obj case det amod nmod case det nmod acl case det amod compound cc conj case nmod obl punct cc fixed fixed det amod conj case amod nmod punct case fixed det nmod case nmod cc conj case nmod punct case obl nsubj aux acl det advmod amod obj punct

text: We will continue to do so in the future as well .
label: nsubj aux root mark xcomp advmod case det obl advmod fixed punct

text: By adopting contemporary legislation and by becoming a party to other recently adopted international instruments on human rights , Albania has associated itself with countries that are enforcing a number of national strategies and programmes focusing on specific population groups , especially women , children , persons in need and minorities , among others .
label: mark advcl amod obj cc mark conj det xcomp case amod advmod amod amod nmod case amod nmod punct nsubj aux root obj case obl nsubj aux acl det obj case amod nmod cc conj acl case amod compound obl punct advmod appos punct conj punct conj case nmod cc conj punct case nmod punct

text: In recent years , the Albanian Government has started to periodically submit reports to the committees of the six main United Nations human rights treaties and is taking their recommendations into serious consideration .
label: case amod obl punct det amod nsubj aux root mark advmod xcomp obj case det obl case det nummod amod amod compound amod compound nmod cc aux conj nmod obj case amod obl punct

text: It is our belief that these international mechanisms play a significant and important role as guardians of the common human values we have together adopted .
label: expl cop nmod root mark det amod nsubj csubj det amod cc conj obj case nmod case det amod amod nmod nsubj aux advmod acl punct

text: Albania , as one of the 191 signatory countries of the Millennium Declaration , remains fully committed to implementation of the Millennium Development Goals , which have been properly reflected in a national strategy for social and economic development .
label: nsubj punct case nmod case det nummod compound nmod case det compound nmod punct root advmod xcomp case obl case det compound compound nmod punct nsubj aux aux advmod acl case det amod obl case amod cc conj nmod punct

text: The pattern of our sustained economic growth , which is at 6 to 7 per cent for the seventh consecutive year , is a good support base for the whole society to maintain higher standards of respect for human rights and to fight poverty and crime .
label: det nsubj case nmod amod amod nmod punct nsubj cop case nummod case nmod acl goeswith case det amod amod obl punct cop det amod compound root mark det amod nsubj mark advcl amod obj case nmod case amod nmod cc mark conj obj cc conj punct

label: nsubj aux root mark xcomp det obj mark acl det amod compound amod obj case nmod amod obl case nmod case det nmod case det nmod advmod cc case det amod cc conj conj punct

text: The Albanian Government is pleased to note that an ever - healthier climate of confidence and relations of bilateral and multilateral cooperation are prevailing in the South - Eastern European region .
label: det amod nsubj cop root mark xcomp mark det advmod punct amod nsubj case nmod cc conj case amod cc conj nmod aux ccomp case det compound punct amod amod obl punct

text: The countries of the region are fully engaged in a process that will lead us clearly toward Euro - Atlantic integration and at the same time continually remove us from the extremist tendencies that caused a number of conflicts in the last decade .
label: det nsubj case det nmod aux advmod root case det obl nsubj aux acl obj advmod case compound punct amod obl cc case det amod obl advmod conj obj case det amod obl nsubj acl det obj case nmod case det amod obl punct

text: The regional policy of my Government is guided by the motto : ' the more integrated in the region , the more integrated in Europe . '
label: det amod nsubj case nmod nmod aux root case det obl punct punct det advcl advcl case det obl punct det appos advcl case obl punct punct

text: In implementing this policy , Albania is cooperating as never before with all the countries of the region by making borders less relevant , opening up to one regional market the implementation of free trade agreements and free movement corridors , and stimulating foreign direct investment .
label: mark advcl det obj punct nsubj aux root mark advmod advcl case det det obl case det nmod mark advcl obj advmod xcomp punct conj compound case nummod amod obl det obj case amod compound nmod cc amod compound conj punct cc conj amod amod obj punct

text: We are especially cooperating with the common fight against organized crime and all kinds of illegal trafficking .
label: nsubj aux advmod root case det amod obl case amod nmod cc det conj case amod nmod punct

text: In the meantime , Albania is reinforcing its border management and control , guided by the European Union and NATO standards .
label: case det obl punct nsubj aux root nmod compound obj cc conj punct advcl case det amod compound cc conj obl punct

text: My country will hold general parliamentary elections by the middle of next year .
label: nmod nsubj aux root amod amod obj case det obl case amod nmod punct

text: We are committed to doing all that is required to ensure that the election process is fully compatible with international standards for free and fair elections .
label: nsubj aux root mark advcl obj nsubj aux acl mark advcl mark det compound nsubj cop advmod ccomp case amod obl case amod cc conj nmod punct

text: To that end , we are committed to continuing to work with relevant specialized institutions on elections by fully implementing especially OSCE / Office for Democratic Institutions and Human Rights ( ODIHR ) recommendations .
label: case det obl punct nsubj aux root mark xcomp mark xcomp case amod amod obl case obl mark advmod advcl advmod compound cc conj case amod nmod cc compound conj punct appos punct obj punct

text: For us , the process and standards are more important than the results of the elections .
label: case obl punct det nsubj cc conj cop advmod root case det obl case det nmod punct

text: In the context of strengthening regional cooperation , my country is committed to a more enhanced partnership with all regional organizations and initiatives that serve the promotion of good neighbourly relations ; the strengthening of regional peace , security and stability ; ensuring political support for integration into Euro - Atlantic structures , and attracting financing for national and regional projects in priority fields such as energy , transportation and telecommunications .
label: case det obl mark acl amod obj punct nmod nsubj aux root case det advmod amod obl case det amod nmod cc conj nsubj acl det obj case amod amod nmod punct det conj case amod nmod punct conj cc conj punct conj amod obj case nmod case compound punct amod nmod punct cc conj obj case amod cc conj nmod case compound nmod case fixed nmod punct conj cc conj punct

text: On its path towards European integration , the South - East European region is still facing pending challenges , such as the future of Kosovo .
label: case nmod obl case amod nmod punct det compound punct compound amod nsubj aux advmod root amod obj punct case fixed det nmod case nmod punct

text: Albania greatly appreciates the recent democratic and integration developments in Kosovo , thanks to the efforts of the respective peoples and the partnership of its self - governing institutions with the United Nations Interim Administration Mission in Kosovo ( UNMIK ) .
label: nsubj advmod root det amod amod cc conj obj case nmod punct nmod case det nmod case det amod nmod cc det conj case nmod compound punct amod nmod case det amod compound compound compound nmod case nmod punct appos punct punct

text: Allow me at this point to congratulate Mr. Soren Jessen - Petersen , Special Representative for Kosovo of the United Nations Secretary - General , in assuming this very important duty .
label: root iobj case det obl mark xcomp obj flat flat punct flat punct compound appos case nmod case det amod compound nmod punct flat punct mark advcl det advmod amod obj punct

text: When I tour around Taiwan , of course , I also find people taking action without even waiting for the ministries to take action .
label: advmod nsubj advcl case obl punct advmod fixed punct nsubj advmod root obj xcomp obj mark advmod advcl mark det nsubj mark advcl obj punct

text: This is another of the g0v projects the environmental agency .
label: nsubj cop root case det compound nmod det amod appos punct

text: If you change the O to a zero , you get into them , considering environmental agency .
label: mark nsubj advcl det obj case det obl punct nsubj root case obl punct advcl amod obj punct

text: This is what people care about , the air quality , PM 2.5 in Taiwan .
label: nsubj cop root nsubj acl obl punct det compound parataxis punct appos nummod case nmod punct

text: More than 2,000 people , actually , installed these in their balconies , in their schools and so on , to get a real - time sensor of their IoT devices but not just IoT .
label: advmod fixed nummod nsubj punct advmod punct root obj case nmod obl punct case nmod conj cc advmod conj punct mark advcl det amod punct compound obj case nmod compound nmod cc advmod advmod conj punct

text: They also upload it to the public cloud , which then uploads it to a distributed ledger to make sure that nobody can modify those numbers after the fact .
label: nsubj advmod root obj case det amod obl punct nsubj advmod acl obj case det amod obl mark advcl xcomp mark nsubj aux ccomp det obj case det obl punct

text: After that , we see this kind of innovation is very rare in Asia .
label: case obl punct nsubj root det nsubj case nmod cop advmod ccomp case obl punct

text: When I talk to all the UN - related bodies , many other Asian countries tell me that they wo n't let this network grow to be 2,000 nodes strong .
label: advmod nsubj advcl case det det compound punct amod obl punct amod amod amod nsubj root iobj mark nsubj aux advmod ccomp det obj xcomp mark cop nummod obl xcomp punct

text: If it 's 200 nodes strong , they will try to poach the leader to the government .
label: mark nsubj cop nummod obl advcl punct nsubj aux root mark xcomp det obj case det obl punct

text: If they refuse , then maybe , they get disappeared because they really challenge the legitimacy of the environmental agency .
label: mark nsubj advcl punct advmod advmod punct nsubj aux root mark nsubj advmod advcl det obj case det amod nmod punct

text: If the environmental agency group reports one number and your neighbors report another number , of course , you 're going to trust the one that you participated yourself , even though it 's a lower quality sensor .
label: mark det amod compound nsubj advcl nummod obj cc nmod nsubj conj det obj punct advmod fixed punct nsubj aux root mark xcomp det iobj obj nsubj acl obl punct advmod mark nsubj cop det amod compound advcl punct

text: Because of that , it 's very rare in Taiwan because we have an expanding civic space .
label: case fixed obl punct nsubj cop advmod root case obl mark nsubj advcl det amod amod obj punct

text: The government takes the approach of , " we ca n't beat them , let 's join them " .
label: det nsubj root det obj mark punct punct nsubj aux advmod acl obj punct parataxis obj xcomp obj punct punct

text: We manufacture low - cost , high - precision sensors for them , but we also see this as a map of digital gap in Taiwan , a digital divide .
label: nsubj root amod punct compound punct amod punct compound obj case obl punct cc nsubj advmod conj obj case det obl case amod nmod case nmod punct det amod appos punct

text: We set up points when the people do n't have the resource to go to , indigenous places , places in the mountains .
label: nsubj root compound obj advmod det nsubj aux advmod advcl det obj mark acl case punct amod obl punct conj case det nmod punct

text: We also talk to the citizen scientists and they say they really want a point here to tell the air pollution from outside Taiwan or from inside Taiwan , domestically .

text: There 's no way the citizen scientists can install an AirBox there , even if they 're very good at drones and so on .

text: We can install those sensor networks as part of the complementary action .

text: The beauty is this , it 's all open hardware .

text: You just download , put it onto Raspberry Pi , and then , you can do it yourself , as people have done over the world .
label: nsubj advmod root punct conj obj case obl flat punct cc advmod punct nsubj aux conj obj obl punct mark nsubj aux advcl case det obl punct

text: If you do n't change the source code , it uploads to the Taiwan network by default , so we kind of have the numbers of all the atmosphere and meteorological data .
label: mark nsubj aux advmod advcl det compound obj punct nsubj root case det compound obl case obl punct advmod nsubj advmod fixed parataxis det obj case det det compound cc conj nmod punct

text: We have a website dedicated for this , the Civil IoT project at CI.taiwan.gov.tw , that is basically , collective intelligence , meteorological , air quality , earthquake , and disaster prevention , and things like that .
label: nsubj root det obj acl case obl punct det amod compound appos case nmod punct nsubj cop advmod punct amod acl punct conj punct compound conj punct compound punct cc conj conj punct cc conj case nmod punct

text: We have single websites like this , CI for Collective Intelligence , AI for AI Taiwan , SI for Social Innovation , Smart Taiwan for the Smart Taiwan plan , and also , Bio Taiwan .
label: nsubj root amod obj case nmod punct appos case amod nmod punct conj case compound nmod punct conj case amod nmod punct amod conj case det amod compound nmod punct cc advmod punct compound conj punct

label: det amod nsubj root punct punct nsubj advmod aux ccomp obj xcomp mark nsubj cc conj cop amod advcl punct punct

text: Biomed Taiwan goes to the same website as Bio Taiwan .
label: compound nsubj root case det amod obl case compound nmod punct

text: In any case , what we 're doing is now is breaking across ministry and municipality and national government because this says nothing about the level of the government or the departments .
label: case det obl punct nsubj nsubj aux acl reparandum advmod aux root case obl cc conj cc amod conj mark nsubj advcl obj case det obl case det nmod cc det conj punct

text: It is one , single message that is collaboratively curated by everybody .
label: nsubj cop nummod punct amod root nsubj aux advmod acl case obl punct

text: Through this , we solved not just our local social and environmental issues through economic approaches but using the SDGs as a map to unite the efforts together .
label: case obl punct nsubj root advmod advmod nmod amod amod cc conj obj case amod obl cc conj det obj case det obl mark advcl det obj advmod punct

text: Just by saying " Taiwan can help " , we mean specifically , 17 , 18 , which is the availability of reliable data that people from across sectors , across jurisdictions , can trust the data .
label: advmod mark advcl punct nsubj aux ccomp punct punct nsubj root advmod punct obj punct conj punct nsubj cop det acl case amod nmod mark nsubj case case nmod punct case conj punct aux conj det iobj punct

text: Then , based on the data , we encourage cross-sectoral partnerships .
label: advmod punct advcl case det obl punct nsubj root amod obj punct

text: Then , based on that , we make open innovations that we , then , export , not as colonizers but , really , co-creators .
label: advmod punct advcl case obl punct nsubj root amod obj obj nsubj punct advmod punct acl punct advmod case obl cc punct advmod punct conj punct

text: Just download it on GitHub and then , we devise something together in a way that has free access to science and technology .
label: advmod root obj case obl cc advmod punct nsubj conj obj advmod case det obl nsubj acl amod obj case nmod cc conj punct

text: When I joined the cabinet two years ago , based on these ideas -- with a contract -- the administration asked me for a job description , because they 've never seen anything like this before .
label: advmod nsubj advcl det obj nummod obl advmod punct advcl case det obl punct case det obl punct det nsubj root iobj case det compound obl punct mark nsubj aux advmod advcl obj case nmod advmod punct

text: Instead of a job description , I just wrote them a poem , a prayer , which I 'm going to read to you as a conclusion .
label: case fixed det compound obl punct nsubj advmod root iobj det obj punct det appos punct obj nsubj aux acl mark xcomp case obl case det obl punct

text: To me , it means the shift from IT or ICT to digital , the shift from the sectors separately as attack or an innovation , or whatever , into the humanity as a whole .
label: case obl punct nsubj root det obj case nmod cc conj case nmod punct det appos case det nmod advmod case nmod cc det conj punct cc conj punct case det nmod case det nmod punct

text: This is digital transformation for me .

text: It goes like this .

text: " When we see the Internet of Things , let 's make it an Internet of Beings .

text: A Tryst With Destiny
label: det root case nmod

text: Indian Prime Minister Jawaharlal Nehru 's Inaugural Address
label: amod amod nmod flat flat case compound root

text: 14 August 1947
label: root compound nmod

text: Long years ago we made a tryst with destiny , and now the time comes when we shall redeem our pledge , not wholly or in full measure , but very substantially .
label: amod obl advmod nsubj root det obj case nmod punct cc advmod det nsubj conj advmod nsubj aux advcl nmod obj punct advmod advmod cc case amod conj punct cc advmod conj punct

text: At the stroke of the midnight hour , when the world sleeps , India will awake to life and freedom .
label: case det obl case det compound nmod punct advmod det nsubj advcl punct nsubj aux root case obl cc conj punct

text: A moment comes , which comes but rarely in history , when we step out from the old to the new , when an age ends , and when the soul of a nation , long suppressed , finds utterance .
label: det nsubj root punct nsubj acl advmod advmod case obl punct advmod nsubj advcl compound case det obl case det obl punct advmod det nsubj conj punct cc advmod det nsubj case det nmod punct advmod acl punct conj obj punct

text: It is fitting that at this solemn moment , we take the pledge of dedication to the service of India and her people and to the still larger cause of humanity .
label: expl cop root mark case det amod obl punct nsubj csubj det obj case nmod case det nmod case nmod cc nmod conj cc case det advmod amod conj case nmod punct

text: At the dawn of history , India started on her unending quest , and trackless centuries are filled with her striving and grandeur of her success and failures .
label: case det obl case nmod punct nsubj root case nmod amod obl punct cc amod nsubj aux conj case nmod obl cc conj case nmod nmod cc conj punct

text: Through good and ill fortune alike , she has never lost sight of that quest , forgotten the ideals which gave her strength .
label: case amod cc conj obl advmod punct nsubj aux advmod root obj case det nmod punct conj det obj nsubj acl iobj obj punct

text: We end today a period of misfortunes and India discovers herself again .
label: nsubj root obl det obj case nmod cc nsubj conj obj advmod punct

text: The achievement we celebrate today is but a step , an opening of opportunity to the greater triumphs and achievements that await us .
label: det nsubj nsubj acl obl cop advmod det root punct det appos case nmod case det amod nmod cc conj nsubj acl obj punct

text: Are we brave enough and wise enough to grasp this opportunity and accept the challenge of the future ?
label: cop nsubj root advmod cc conj advmod mark advcl det obj cc conj det obj case det nmod punct

text: Freedom and power bring responsibility .
label: nsubj cc conj root obj punct

text: The responsibility rests upon this Assembly , a sovereign body representing the sovereign people of India .
label: det nsubj root case det obl punct det amod appos acl det amod obj case nmod punct

text: Before the birth of freedom , we have endured all the pains of labour and our hearts are heavy with the memory of this sorrrow .
label: case det obl case nmod punct nsubj aux root det det obj case nmod cc nmod nsubj cop conj case det obl case det nmod punct

text: Some of those pains continue even now .
label: nsubj case det nmod root advmod advmod punct

text: Nevertheless , the past is over and it is the future that beckons us now .
label: advmod punct det nsubj cop root cc expl cop det conj nsubj advcl obj advmod punct

text: That future is not one of ease or resting but of incessant striving so that we may fulfill the pledges we have so often taken and the one we shall take today .
label: det nsubj cop advmod root case nmod cc conj cc case amod conj mark fixed nsubj aux advcl det obj nsubj aux advmod advmod acl cc det conj nsubj aux acl obl punct

text: The service of India means , the service of the millions who suffer .
label: det nsubj case nmod root punct det obj case det nmod nsubj acl punct

text: It means the ending of poverty and ignorance and poverty and disease and inequality of opportunity .
label: nsubj root det obj case nmod cc conj cc conj cc conj cc conj case nmod punct

text: The ambition of the greatest men of our generation has been to wipe every tear from every eye .
label: det nsubj case det amod nmod case nmod nmod aux cop mark root det obj case det obl punct

text: That may be beyond us , but as long as there are tears and suffering , so long our work will not be over .
label: nsubj aux cop case root punct cc advmod advmod mark expl advcl nsubj cc conj punct advmod advmod nmod nsubj aux advmod cop conj punct

text: And so we have to labour and to work , and to work hard , to give reality to our dreams .
label: cc advmod nsubj root mark xcomp cc mark conj punct cc mark conj advmod punct mark advcl obj case nmod obl punct

text: Those dreams are for India , but they are also for the world , for all the nations and peoples are too closely knit together today for any one of them to imagine that it can live apart .
label: det nsubj cop case root punct cc nsubj cop advmod case det conj punct mark det det nsubj cc conj aux advmod advmod advcl advmod obl mark det nsubj case nmod mark advcl mark nsubj aux ccomp advmod punct

text: Peace is said to be indivisible , so is freedom , so is prosperity now , and also is disaster in this one world that can no longer be split into isolated fragments .
label: nsubj aux root mark cop xcomp punct conj cop nsubj punct conj cop nsubj advmod punct cc conj cop nsubj case det nummod obl nsubj aux advmod advmod aux acl case amod obl punct

text: To the people of India , whose representatives we are , we make an appeal to join us with faith and confidence in this great adventure .
label: case det obl case nmod punct nmod nsubj acl cop punct nsubj root det obj mark acl obj case obl cc conj case det amod obl punct

text: This is no time for petty and destructive criticism , no time for illwill or blaming others .
label: nsubj cop det root case amod cc conj nmod punct det conj case nmod cc conj obj punct

text: We have to build the noble mansion of free India where all her children may dwell .
label: nsubj root mark xcomp det amod obj case amod nmod advmod det nmod nsubj aux acl punct

text: The appointed day has come - the day appointed by destiny - and India stands forth again , after long slumber and struggle , awake , vital , free and independent .
label: det amod nsubj aux root punct det parataxis acl case obl punct cc nsubj conj advmod advmod punct case amod obl cc conj punct xcomp punct conj punct conj cc conj punct

text: The past clings on to us still in some measure and we have to do much before we redeem the pledges we have so often taken .
label: det nsubj root compound case obl advmod case det obl cc nsubj conj mark xcomp obj mark nsubj advcl det obj nsubj aux advmod advmod acl punct

text: Yet the turning - point is past , and history begins anew for us , the history which we shall live and act and others will write about .
label: cc det compound punct nsubj cop root punct cc nsubj conj advmod case obl punct det parataxis obj nsubj aux acl cc conj cc nsubj aux conj obl punct

text: It is a fateful moment for us in India , for all Asia and for the world .
label: nsubj cop det amod root case nmod case nmod punct case det conj cc case det conj punct

text: A new star rises , the star of freedom in the East , a new hope comes into being , a vision long cherished materializes .
label: det amod nsubj root punct det parataxis case nmod case det nmod punct det amod nsubj parataxis case obl punct det nsubj advmod acl parataxis punct

text: May the star never set and that hope never be betrayed !
label: aux det nsubj advmod root cc det nsubj advmod aux conj punct

text: We rejoice in that freedom , even though clouds surround us , and many of our people are sorrowstricken and difficult problems encompass us .
label: nsubj root case det obl punct advmod mark nsubj advcl obj punct cc nsubj case nmod nmod cop conj cc amod nsubj conj obj punct

text: But freedom brings responsibilities and burdens and we have to face them in the spirit of a free and disciplined people .
label: cc nsubj root obj cc conj cc nsubj conj mark xcomp obj case det obl case det amod cc conj nmod punct

text: On this day our first thoughts go to the architect of this freedom , the Father of our Nation , who , embodying the old spirit of India , held aloft the torch of freedom and lighted up the darkness that surrounded us .
label: case det obl nmod amod nsubj root case det obl case det nmod punct det appos case nmod nmod punct nsubj punct advcl det amod obj case nmod punct acl compound det obj case nmod cc conj compound det obj nsubj acl obj punct

text: We have often been unworthy followers of his and have strayed from his message , but not only we but succeeding generations will remember this message and bear the imprint in their hearts of this great son of India , magnificent in his faith and strength and courage and humility .
label: nsubj aux advmod cop amod root case nmod cc aux conj case nmod obl punct cc advmod advmod nsubj cc amod conj aux conj det obj cc conj det obj case nmod obl case det amod nmod case nmod punct acl case nmod obl cc conj cc conj cc conj punct

text: We shall never allow that torch of freedom to be blown out , however high the wind or stormy the tempest .
label: nsubj aux advmod root det iobj case nmod mark aux xcomp compound punct advmod advcl det nsubj cc conj det nsubj punct

text: Our next thoughts must be of the unknown volunteers and soldiers of freedom who , without praise or reward , have served India even unto death .
label: nmod amod nsubj aux cop case det amod root cc conj case nmod nsubj punct case obl cc conj punct aux acl obj advmod case obl punct

text: We think also of our brothers and sisters who have been cut off from us by political boundaries and who unhappily can not share at present in the freedom that has come .
label: nsubj root advmod case nmod obl cc conj nsubj aux aux acl compound case obl case amod obl cc nsubj advmod aux advmod conj case obl case det obl nsubj aux acl punct

text: They are of us and will remain of us whatever may happen , and we shall be sharers in their good [ or ] ill fortune alike .
label: nsubj cop case root cc aux conj case obl nsubj aux advcl punct cc nsubj aux cop conj case nmod amod punct cc punct conj nmod advmod punct

text: The future beckons to us .
label: det nsubj root case obl punct

text: Whither do we go and what shall be our endeavour ?
label: advmod aux nsubj root cc conj aux cop nmod nsubj punct

text: To bring freedom and opportunity to the common man , to the peasants and workers of India ; to fight and end poverty and ignorance and disease ; to build up a prosperous , democratic and progressive nation , and to create social , economic and political institutions which will ensure justice and fullness of life to every man and woman .
label: mark root obj cc conj case det amod obl punct case det obl cc conj case nmod punct mark conj cc conj obj cc conj cc conj punct mark conj compound det amod punct conj cc conj obj punct cc mark conj amod punct conj cc conj obj nsubj aux acl obj cc conj case nmod case det obl cc conj punct

text: We have hard work ahead .
label: nsubj root amod obj advmod punct

text: There is no resting for any one of us till we redeem our pledge in full , till we make all the people of India what destiny intended them to be .
label: expl root det nsubj case det obl case nmod mark nsubj advcl nmod obj case obl punct mark nsubj advcl det det obj case nmod xcomp nsubj acl obj mark xcomp punct

text: We are citizens of a great country on the verge of bold advance , and we have to live up to that high standard .
label: nsubj cop root case det amod nmod case det nmod case amod nmod punct cc nsubj conj mark xcomp compound case det amod obl punct

text: All of us , to whatever religion we may belong , are equally the children of India with equal rights , privileges and obligations .
label: nsubj case nmod punct case det obl nsubj aux acl punct cop advmod det root case nmod case amod nmod punct conj cc conj punct

text: We can not encourage communalism or narrow - mindedness , for no nation can be great whose people are narrow in thought or in action .
label: nsubj aux advmod root obj cc amod punct conj punct mark det nsubj aux cop conj nmod nsubj cop acl case obl cc case conj punct

text: To the nations and peoples of the world we send greetings and pledge ourselves to cooperate with them in furthering peace , freedom and democracy .
label: case det obl cc conj case det nmod nsubj root obj cc conj obj mark xcomp case obl mark advcl obj punct conj cc conj punct

text: And to India , our much - loved motherland , the ancient , the eternal and the ever - new , we pay our reverent homage and we bind ourselves afresh to her service .
label: cc case obl punct nmod advmod punct amod appos punct det appos punct det conj cc det advmod punct conj punct nsubj root nmod amod obj cc nsubj conj obj advmod case nmod obl punct

text: Speaker Pelosi .

text: Thank you , Mr. Chair .
