text: I thank the gentleman from New York , the distinguished Chair of the Judiciary Committee , for yielding and for his leadership in bringing this important legislation to the Floor .
label: nsubj root det obj case amod nmod punct det amod appos case det amod nmod punct mark advcl cc case nmod conj mark acl det amod obj case det obl punct

text: And I commend Congresswoman Karen Bass , Madam Chair , for your great leadership in this important legislation .
label: cc nsubj root obj flat flat punct vocative flat punct case nmod amod obl case det amod nmod punct

text: Madam Speaker , nearly one year ago , George Floyd gasped his last words , ‘ I ca n't breathe , ’ and ignited a nationwide reckoning on the racial injustice and police brutality in America .
label: vocative flat punct advmod nummod obl advmod punct nsubj flat root nmod amod obj punct punct nsubj aux advmod appos punct punct cc conj det amod obj case det amod nmod cc compound conj case nmod punct

text: Americans from every corner of the country took to the streets to peacefully protest violence against Black Americans , waving Black Lives Matter flags , chanting the names of the murdered , repeating George Floyd 's dying words , ‘ I ca n't breathe . ’
label: nsubj case det nmod case det nmod root case det obl mark advmod advcl obj case amod nmod punct advcl amod nsubj compound obj punct conj det obj case det nmod punct conj nmod flat case amod obj punct punct nsubj aux advmod appos punct punct

text: They turned their agony into action , but tragically , despite these mass protests , the injustice , killings continued .
label: nsubj root nmod obj case obl punct cc advmod punct case det compound obl punct det nsubj punct conj conj punct

text: Those protests were global .
label: det nsubj cop root punct

text: They were all over the world .
label: nsubj cop advmod case det root punct

text: Here , as Members of Congress and as Americans , we can not accept this epidemic of injustice .
label: advmod punct case obl case nmod cc case conj punct nsubj aux advmod root det obj case nmod punct

text: We can not stay silent when one – when our most vulnerable and historically marginalized communities , people of color , those living in poverty , Americans with disabilities are being targeted and sometimes killed .
label: nsubj aux advmod root xcomp advmod reparandum punct advmod nmod advmod amod cc advmod conj nsubj punct appos case nmod punct conj acl case obl punct conj case nmod aux aux advcl cc advmod conj punct

text: That is why , today , the House will again pass the George Floyd Justice in Policing Act and send it to the Senate and the President 's desk so that it can finally become the law of the land .
label: nsubj cop root punct obl punct det nsubj aux advmod advcl det compound flat compound case nmod obj cc conj obj case det obl cc det nmod case conj mark fixed nsubj aux advmod advcl det xcomp case det nmod punct

text: I salute Congresswoman Karen Bass who has been relentless , persistent and absolutely courageous in her leadership on this legislation .
label: nsubj root obj flat flat nsubj aux cop acl punct conj cc advmod conj case nmod obl case det nmod punct

text: Thank you to the Congressional Black Caucus and its Chair , Joyce Beatty .
label: root obj case det amod amod obl cc nmod conj punct appos flat punct

text: And Judiciary Chair Jerry Nadler , thank you .
label: cc compound vocative flat flat punct root obj punct

text: The George Floyd Justice in Policing Act fundamentally transforms the culture of policing with strong , unprecedented reforms .
label: det compound flat compound case nmod nsubj advmod root det obj case nmod case amod punct amod obl punct

text: This legislation will not erase centuries of systemic racism and excessive policing in America .
label: det nsubj aux advmod root obj case amod nmod cc amod conj case nmod punct

text: It will not bring back George Floyd , Breonna Taylor – say her name , Breonna Taylor – Ahmaud Arbery , or the countless other men and women who died or were senselessly injured .
label: nsubj aux advmod root advmod obj flat punct conj flat punct parataxis nmod obj punct appos flat punct conj flat punct cc det amod amod conj cc conj nsubj acl cc aux advmod conj punct

text: But it will make a tremendous – take a tremendous step toward – or to stop the violence , stem the suffering and start to build a healthier , better relationship between law enforcement and communities that they respect .
label: cc nsubj aux reparandum det obj punct root det amod obj reparandum punct conj mark acl det obj punct conj det obj cc conj mark xcomp det amod punct amod obj case compound nmod cc conj obj nsubj acl punct

text: All of us here salute and are proudly , profoundly grateful to our law enforcement heroes .
label: nsubj case nmod advmod root cc cop advmod punct advmod conj case nmod compound compound obl punct

text: I grew up in a family , public service family .
label: nsubj root compound case det reparandum punct amod compound obl punct

text: My father , my whole life at home , was Mayor of Baltimore .
label: nmod nsubj punct nmod amod obl case nmod punct cop root case nmod punct

text: My brother was Mayor later , Thomas D’Alesandro , in Baltimore .
label: nmod nsubj cop root advmod punct appos flat punct case obl punct

text: And they had a motto about the police : ‘ Be true to the men in blue . ’
label: cc nsubj root det obj case det nmod punct punct cop appos case det obl case nmod punct punct

text: Of course this was a long time ago and they were all men .
label: advmod fixed nsubj cop det amod obl root cc nsubj cop advmod conj punct

text: ‘ Be true to the men in blue . ’
label: punct cop root case det obl case nmod punct punct

text: So , I was I was raised with that respect , with the – prayerfully that these people , our men and women , now , men and women in uniform , whether they 're police or fire , but addressing police here , our first responders left home when they left to go to work , not knowing – their families not knowing if they would return home because they were risking their lives to save lives and to protect all of us .
label: advmod punct nsubj reparandum nsubj aux root case det obl punct case reparandum punct advmod mark det dislocated punct nmod appos cc conj punct advmod punct appos cc conj case nmod punct mark nsubj cop acl cc conj punct cc conj obj advmod punct nmod amod nsubj parataxis obj advmod nsubj advcl mark advcl case obl punct advmod reparandum punct nmod nsubj advmod advcl mark nsubj aux ccomp advmod mark nsubj aux advcl nmod obj mark advcl obj cc mark conj obj case nmod punct

text: So , it ’s with great , prayerful gratitude to most of the men and women in blue , that we sadly have to say that our appreciation for them can not lapse into apathy or acceptance of actions that are fundamentally incompatible with the purpose of policing , the purpose of policing .
label: advmod punct expl cop case amod punct amod root case nmod case det obl cc conj case nmod punct mark nsubj advmod csubj mark xcomp mark nmod nsubj case nmod aux advmod ccomp case obl cc conj case nmod nsubj cop advmod acl case det obl case nmod punct det appos case nmod punct

text: Of course , we all – there 's not anyone on our side of the aisle who has advocated any policy in this body to defund the police , contrary to misrepresentations that are coming forth .
label: advmod fixed punct reparandum det punct expl root advmod nsubj case nmod nmod case det nmod nsubj aux acl det obj case det obl mark acl det obj punct advmod case obl nsubj aux acl advmod punct

text: All of us here , again , salute and profoundly grateful for our law enforcement heroes .
label: nsubj case nmod advmod punct advmod punct root cc advmod conj case nmod compound compound obl punct

text: As the National Organization of Black Law Enforcement Executives writes , ‘ The passage of this act is paramount in achieving the fundamental principle of a police force that protects and serves every citizen of their community with fairness , accountability and transparency in their actions . ’
label: mark det amod nsubj case amod compound compound nmod advcl punct punct det nsubj case det nmod cop root mark advcl det amod obj case det compound nmod nsubj acl cc conj det obj case nmod nmod case obl punct conj cc conj case nmod nmod punct punct

text: The Democratic Congress , together with the Biden - Harris Administration , is committed to not only ensuring that this legislation becomes law , but to take further action to end violence and advance justice in America .
label: det amod nsubj punct advmod case det compound punct compound obl punct cop root mark advmod advmod advcl mark det nsubj ccomp xcomp punct cc mark conj amod obj mark advcl obj cc conj obj case obl punct

text: Let us ensure that the passage of the George Floyd Justice in Policing Act is the first of many steps in this direction .
label: root obj xcomp mark det nsubj case det compound flat compound case nmod nmod cop det ccomp case amod nmod case det nmod punct

text: To the family of George Floyd that came here when the bill was being reviewed by your committee , Mr Chairman – you remember that day .
label: case det root case nmod flat nsubj acl advmod advmod det nsubj aux aux advcl case nmod obl punct compound vocative punct nsubj parataxis det obj punct

text: We could n't be in your committee room because of COVID , but they came and they asked me that day , they said , ‘ Madam Speaker , will you name this bill for our brother ? ’
label: nsubj aux advmod cop case nmod compound root case fixed obl punct cc nsubj conj cc nsubj conj iobj det obl punct nsubj parataxis punct punct vocative flat punct aux nsubj ccomp det obj case nmod obl punct punct

text: Philonise , his brother , asked that question .
label: nsubj punct nmod appos punct root det obj punct

text: I said , ‘ Only if you think it is worthy of your brother . ’
label: nsubj root punct punct advmod mark nsubj ccomp nsubj cop ccomp case nmod obl punct punct

text: I think of George Floyd at least once a day – sometimes more .
label: nsubj root case obl flat case obl advmod det obl punct advmod advmod punct

text: And you know why ?
label: cc nsubj root obj punct

text: Not just because of the sadness of it all , but I think of him because they tell us that in order to be safe from COVID , we must wash our hands for 20 seconds .
label: advmod advmod case fixed det root case nmod det punct cc nsubj conj case obl mark nsubj advcl iobj mark mark fixed mark cop advcl case obl punct nsubj aux ccomp nmod obj case nummod obl punct

text: As I 'm washing my hands for 20 seconds , after about eight or nine seconds , I 'm thinking
label: mark nsubj aux advcl nmod obj case nummod obl punct case advmod nummod cc conj obl punct nsubj aux root

text: ‘ This is taking forever .
label: punct nsubj aux root obj punct

text: I ca n't do this for 20 seconds .
label: nsubj aux advmod root obj case nummod obl punct

text: It takes too long . ’
label: nsubj root advmod advmod punct punct

text: And then I think of George Floyd .
label: cc advmod nsubj root case obl flat punct

text: Eight minutes and 46 seconds .
label: nummod root cc nummod conj punct

text: That 's a long time .
label: nsubj cop det amod root punct

text: It 's a long time , as Congresswoman Dean said , calling out for his mother , extending love to his family .
label: nsubj cop det amod root punct mark nsubj flat advcl punct acl compound case nmod obl punct advcl obj case nmod obl punct

text: OK .
label: root punct

text: Let us ensure that George 's brother , Philonise , when he said , ‘ George 's name means something , ’ and that , as his daughter , Gianna , said , ‘ Daddy changed the world ’ with this legislation .
label: root obj xcomp mark nmod case ccomp punct appos punct advmod nsubj advcl punct punct nmod case nsubj ccomp obj punct punct cc mark punct mark nmod nsubj punct appos punct advcl punct punct nsubj conj det obj punct case det obl punct

text: Let us take an important step in changing the world for George 's family , for all communities of color , for all Americans , for the whole world .
label: root obj xcomp det amod obj mark acl det obj case nmod case obl punct case det conj case nmod punct case det conj punct case det amod conj punct

text: With that , Madam Speaker , I urge a strong , bipartisan vote on the George Floyd Justice in Policing Act .
label: case obl punct vocative flat punct nsubj root det amod punct amod obj case det compound flat compound case nmod nmod punct

text: I thank Karen Bass again , Madam Chair .
label: nsubj root obj flat advmod punct vocative flat punct

text: Thank you so much , again .
label: root obj advmod advmod punct advmod punct

text: And I yield back the balance of my time .
label: cc nsubj root advmod det obj case nmod nmod punct

text: The Charter of the United Nations sends a clear message to us all : put people first .
label: det nsubj case det amod nmod root det amod obj case obl det punct parataxis obj xcomp punct

text: The first words of the Charter , “ We the peoples ” , are a summons to place people at the centre of our work — every day , everywhere .
label: det amod nsubj case det nmod punct punct appos det appos punct punct cop det root mark acl obj case det obl case nmod nmod punct det obl punct advmod punct

text: People with anxieties and aspirations , people with heartbreaks and hopes and , above all , people with rights .
label: root case nmod cc conj punct conj case nmod cc conj cc punct advmod det punct conj case nmod punct

text: Those rights are not a favour to be rewarded or withheld ; they are an endowment for simply being human .
label: det nsubj cop advmod det root mark aux acl cc conj punct nsubj cop det parataxis mark advmod cop acl punct

text: Throughout the first half of my mandate , I have had the good fortune to meet people around the world , not in gilded meeting rooms but where they live , work and dream .
label: case det amod obl case nmod nmod punct nsubj aux root det amod obj mark acl obj case det obl punct advmod case amod compound obl cc advmod nsubj conj punct conj cc conj punct

text: And I have listened .
label: cc nsubj aux root punct

text: I have heard families in the South Pacific who fear their lives being swept away by rising seas ; young refugees in the Middle East yearning for a return to school and home ; Ebola survivors in North Kivu struggling to rebuild their lives ; women demanding equality and opportunity ; people of all beliefs and traditions who suffer simply because of who they are ; and so many others .
label: nsubj aux root obj case det compound nmod nsubj acl nmod nsubj aux ccomp advmod case amod obl punct amod conj case det amod nmod acl case det obl case nmod cc conj punct compound conj case compound nmod acl mark xcomp nmod obj punct conj acl obj cc conj punct conj case det nmod cc conj nsubj acl advmod case fixed obl nsubj acl punct cc advmod amod conj punct

text: We are living in a world of disquiet .
label: nsubj aux root case det obl case nmod punct

text: A great many people fear getting trampled , thwarted , left behind .
label: det amod amod nsubj root aux xcomp punct conj punct conj compound punct

text: Machines take their jobs , traffickers take their dignity , demagogues take their rights , warlords take their lives , fossil fuels take their futures .
label: nsubj root nmod obj punct nsubj parataxis nmod obj punct nsubj parataxis nmod obj punct nsubj parataxis nmod obj punct compound nsubj parataxis nmod obj punct

text: And yet people believe in the spirit and ideas that bring us to this Hall .
label: cc advmod nsubj root case det obl cc conj nsubj acl obj case det obl punct

text: They believe in the United Nations .
label: nsubj root case det amod obl punct

text: But do they believe in us ?
label: cc aux nsubj root case obl punct

text: Do they believe that , as leaders , we will put people first ?
label: aux nsubj root mark punct case obl punct nsubj aux ccomp obj xcomp punct

text: We the leaders must deliver for we the peoples .
label: nsubj det appos aux root case obl det appos punct

text: People have the right to live in peace .
label: nsubj root det obj mark acl case obl punct

text: One year ago in this Hall , I spoke of winds of hope despite the chaos and confusion of our world ( see A/73/PV.6 ) .
label: nummod nmod advmod case det obl punct nsubj root case obl case nmod case det obl cc conj case nmod nmod punct parataxis obj punct punct

text: Since then , some of those currents have continued to move in promising directions .
label: case obl punct nsubj case det nmod aux root mark xcomp case amod obl punct

text: Against the expectations of many , elections unfolded peacefully in Madagascar , the Maldives and the Democratic Republic of the Congo , to name just a few places .
label: case det obl case nmod punct nsubj root advmod case obl punct det conj cc det amod conj case det nmod punct mark advcl advmod det amod obj punct

text: Greece and the Republic of North Macedonia resolved their decades - long name dispute .
label: nsubj cc det conj case compound nmod root nmod compound punct amod compound obj punct

text: Political dialogue in the Sudan and the peace process in the Central African Republic have brought renewed hope .
label: amod nsubj case det nmod cc det compound conj case det amod amod nmod aux root amod obj punct

text: A long - sought step forward has just been taken on the political path out of the tragedy in Syria , in line with Security Council resolution 2254 ( 2015 ) .
label: det compound punct amod nsubj advmod aux advmod aux root case det amod obl case fixed det nmod case nmod punct case obl case compound compound nmod dep punct nmod punct punct

text: As I announced yesterday , an agreement has been reached with all parties for a credible , balanced and inclusive Syrian - owned and Syrian - led constitutional committee .
label: mark nsubj advcl obl punct det nsubj aux aux root case det obl case det amod punct conj cc conj compound punct amod cc compound punct conj amod nmod punct

text: My Special Envoy just left Damascus after finalizing the last details with the Government and the opposition .
label: nmod amod nsubj advmod root obj mark advcl det amod obj case det nmod cc det conj punct

text: The United Nations looks forward to convening the committee in Geneva in the coming weeks .
label: det amod nsubj root advmod mark advcl det obj case obl case det amod obl punct

text: However , across the global landscape , we see conflicts persisting , terrorism spreading and the risk of a new arms race growing .
label: advmod punct case det amod obl punct nsubj root obj xcomp punct nsubj conj cc det nsubj case det amod compound nmod conj punct

text: Outside interferences , often in violation of Security Council resolutions , make peace processes more difficult .
label: compound nsubj punct advmod case nmod case compound compound nmod punct root compound obj advmod xcomp punct

text: Many situations remain unresolved , from Yemen and Libya to Afghanistan and beyond .
label: amod nsubj root xcomp punct case obl cc conj case obl cc conj punct

text: A succession of unilateral actions threatens to thwart a two - State solution between Israel and Palestine .
label: det nsubj case amod nmod root mark xcomp det nummod punct compound obj case nmod cc conj punct

text: In Venezuela , 4 million people have fled the country — one of the largest displacements in the world .
label: case obl punct compound nummod nsubj aux root det obj punct parataxis case det amod nmod case det nmod punct

text: Tensions are heightened in South Asia , where differences need to be addressed through dialogue .
label: nsubj aux root case compound obl punct advmod nsubj acl mark aux xcomp case obl punct

text: Above all , we are facing the alarming possibility of armed conflict in the Gulf , the consequences of which the world can not afford .
label: advmod advmod punct nsubj aux root det amod obj case amod nmod case det nmod punct det obj case nmod det nsubj aux advmod acl punct

text: The recent attack on Saudi Arabia ’s oil facilities was completely unacceptable .
label: det amod nsubj case amod nmod case compound nmod cop advmod root punct

text: In a context where a minor miscalculation can lead to a major confrontation , we must do everything possible to push for reason and restraint .
label: case det obl advmod det amod nsubj aux acl case det amod obl punct nsubj aux root obj amod mark advcl case obl cc conj punct

text: I hope for a future in which all the countries of the region can live in a state of mutual respect and cooperation , without interference in each other ’s affairs .
label: nsubj root case det obl case obl det det nsubj case det nmod aux acl case det obl case amod nmod cc conj punct case obl case nmod fixed case nmod punct

text: I hope equally that it will still be possible to preserve the progress on nuclear non-proliferation represented by the Joint Comprehensive Plan of Action .
label: nsubj root advmod mark expl aux advmod cop ccomp mark csubj det obj case amod nmod acl case det amod amod obl case nmod punct

text: From the first day , I have emphasized prevention , mediation and a surge in diplomacy for peace in order to address the crises that we face .
label: case det amod obl punct nsubj aux root obj punct conj cc det conj case nmod case nmod mark fixed mark advcl det obj obj nsubj acl punct

text: Consider the lives that we can save by strengthening our investments to sustain peace around the world .
label: root det obj obj nsubj aux acl mark advcl nmod obj mark acl obj case det obl punct

text: Across some of the most troubled corners of the world , some 100,000 United Nations peacekeepers protect civilians and promote peace .
label: case obl case det advmod amod nmod case det nmod punct advmod nummod amod compound nsubj root obj cc conj obj punct

text: Through the Action for Peacekeeping initiative , we are strengthening our effectiveness and efficiency and we are renewing partnerships with troop - and police - contributing countries , host countries and regional organizations , such as the African Union and the European Union .
label: case det compound case nmod obl punct nsubj aux root nmod obj cc conj cc nsubj aux conj obj case compound punct cc conj punct amod nmod punct compound conj cc amod conj punct case fixed det amod nmod cc det amod conj punct

text: I am also proud of the work of our humanitarian workers , easing suffering around the world .
label: nsubj cop advmod root case det obl case nmod amod nmod punct acl obj case det obl punct

text: Fully half of all international relief aid is channelled through the United Nations , ensuring that millions receive protection , food , medicine , shelter , water and other life - saving forms of assistance .
label: advmod nsubj case det amod compound nmod aux root case det amod obl punct advcl mark nsubj ccomp obj punct conj punct conj punct conj punct conj cc amod compound punct amod conj case nmod punct

text: This year alone , in brutal attacks and other circumstances , we have lost at least 80 peacekeepers , humanitarian workers and others , all of whom gave their lives serving the United Nations and trying to better the lives of others .
label: det obl advmod punct case amod obl cc amod conj punct nsubj aux root case nmod nummod obj punct amod conj cc conj punct nsubj case nmod acl nmod obj advcl det amod obj cc conj mark xcomp det obj case nmod punct

text: I honour their service and their sacrifice .
label: nsubj root nmod obj cc nmod conj punct

text: We have bolstered our counter-terrorism architecture and defined new strategies to tackle violent extremism and to address root causes , while respecting human rights .
label: nsubj aux root nmod compound obj cc conj amod obj mark acl amod obj cc mark conj compound obj punct mark advcl amod obj punct

text: I have put forward a new disarmament agenda to advance global peace .
label: nsubj aux root advmod det amod compound obj mark acl amod obj punct

text: In the near term , the New START Treaty must be extended .
label: case det amod obl punct det amod compound nsubj aux aux root punct

text: We must work to address the heightened threat posed by ballistic missiles and ensure a successful 2020 Review Conference of the Parties to the Treaty on the Non-Proliferation of Nuclear Weapons .
label: nsubj aux root mark xcomp det amod obj acl case amod obl cc conj det amod compound compound obj case det nmod case det nmod case det nmod case amod nmod punct

text: The situation of the Korean peninsula remains uncertain .
label: det nsubj case det amod nmod root xcomp punct

text: I fully support the efforts towards a new summit between the President of the United States and the leader of the Democratic People ’s Republic of Korea .
label: nsubj advmod root det obj case det amod nmod case det nmod case det amod nmod cc det conj case det amod nmod case nmod case nmod punct

text: At this time of transition and dysfunction in global power relations , there is a new risk looming on the horizon that may not yet be large but it is real .
label: case det obl case nmod cc conj case amod compound nmod punct expl root det amod nsubj acl case det obl nsubj aux advmod advmod cop acl cc nsubj cop conj punct

text: I fear the possibility of a great fracture — the world splitting in two , with the two largest economies on Earth creating two separate and competing worlds , each with their own dominant currency , trade and financial rules , their own Internet and artificial intelligence capacities and their own zero - sum geopolitical and military strategies .
label: nsubj root det obj case det amod nmod punct det nsubj appos case obl punct mark det nummod amod nsubj case nmod advcl nummod amod cc conj obj punct nsubj case nmod amod amod acl punct compound cc conj conj punct nmod amod conj cc amod compound conj cc nmod amod compound punct compound amod cc conj conj punct

text: We must do everything possible to avert the great fracture and maintain a universal system — a universal economy with universal respect for international law , a multipolar world with strong multilateral institutions .
label: nsubj aux root obj amod mark advcl det amod obj cc conj det amod obj punct det amod appos case amod nmod case amod nmod punct det amod appos case amod amod nmod punct

text: CONGRESSIONAL RECORD — SENATE S65
label: amod root punct appos flat

text: January 20 , 2021
label: compound root punct nmod

text: MAIDEN SPEECH
label: compound root

text: Mr. President , I need to catch my breath , so much has happened .
label: vocative flat punct nsubj root mark xcomp nmod obj punct advmod nsubj aux parataxis punct

text: A few hours ago , on the West Front of this citadel of democracy , Joe Biden and KAMALA HARRIS were administered the oaths of Office to the Presidency and Vice Presidency of the United States .
label: det amod obl advmod punct case det compound obl case det nmod case nmod punct nsubj flat cc conj flat aux root det obj case nmod case det nmod cc compound conj case det amod nmod punct

text: We have turned the page to a new chapter in the history of our democracy , and I am full of hope .
label: nsubj aux root det obj case det amod obl case det nmod case nmod nmod punct cc nsubj cop conj case obl punct

text: I would challenge anyone not to feel hopeful today after listening to Amanda Gorman , the amazing 22 – year - old poet , wise far beyond her years , who told us that :
label: nsubj aux root obj advmod mark xcomp xcomp obl mark advcl case obl flat punct det amod nummod punct compound punct amod appos punct acl advmod case nmod obl punct nsubj acl iobj ccomp punct

text: Somehow we ’ve weathered and witnessed a nation that is n’t broken but simply unfinished
label: advmod nsubj aux root cc conj det obj nsubj aux advmod acl cc advmod conj

text: The hope she spoke about — the strong and happy hope — the hope we feel today , is a hope , of course , that is tempered by reality .
label: det nsubj nsubj acl obl punct det amod cc conj appos punct det appos nsubj acl obl punct cop det root punct advmod fixed punct nsubj aux acl case obl punct

text: This was an inauguration unlike most others .
label: nsubj cop det root case amod nmod punct

text: The crowds that customarily line the National Mall were absent , a reminder that our Nation is still in the throes of a deadly pandemic .
label: det nsubj nsubj advmod acl det amod obj cop root punct det parataxis mark nmod nsubj cop advmod case det acl case det amod nmod punct

text: The presence of thousands of National Guardsmen , police , and Secret Service was a reminder that 2 weeks ago , in this very room and on those very steps where President Biden took the oath , a mob of violent criminals tried to dismantle our democracy — our sacred democracy — brick by brick and would try again if they could .
label: det nsubj case nmod case amod nmod punct conj punct cc amod conj cop det root mark nummod obl advmod punct case det amod obl cc case det amod conj advmod nsubj flat acl det obj punct det nsubj case amod nmod acl mark xcomp nmod obj punct nmod amod appos punct obl case nmod cc aux conj advmod mark nsubj advcl punct

text: But , as President Biden said a few hours ago , today , democracy has prevailed , the will of the people was heeded , and the peaceful transfer of power fulfilled .
label: cc punct mark nsubj flat advcl det amod obl advmod punct obl punct nsubj aux root punct det nsubj case det nmod aux conj punct cc det amod nsubj case nmod conj punct

text: It takes a lot more than a band of hooligans to bring our grand democracy down .
label: expl root det obl obj case det obl case nmod mark csubj nmod amod obj compound punct

text: Let it be a message to our friends and adversaries around the world that our democracy , though it has been tried and been tested , shall long endure .
label: root expl cop det xcomp case nmod nmod cc conj case det nmod mark nmod nsubj punct mark nsubj aux aux advcl cc aux conj punct aux advmod ccomp punct

text: And let it be a message to those terrorists who desecrated this temple of democracy that they will never prevail .
label: cc root expl cop det xcomp case det nmod nsubj acl det obj case nmod mark nsubj aux advmod ccomp punct

text: Joe Biden is now the 46th President of the United States .
label: nsubj flat cop advmod det amod root case det amod nmod punct

text: KAMALA HARRIS is now the 49th Vice President of the United States .
label: nsubj flat cop advmod det amod compound root case det amod nmod punct

text: But , of course , in more ways than one , she is not the 49th but the first — the first African - American woman , the first Asian - American woman , and the first woman , period , to hold the Office of Vice Presidency in our Nation ’s history .
label: cc punct advmod fixed punct case amod obl case nmod punct nsubj cop advmod det root cc det reparandum punct det amod compound punct amod conj punct det amod compound punct amod conj punct cc det amod conj punct discourse punct mark acl det obj case amod nmod case nmod nmod case obl punct

text: Today , the threat to our democracy from the Presidency itself has ended , but the challenges we face as a nation remain .
label: obl punct det nsubj case nmod nmod case det nmod nmod aux root punct cc det nsubj nsubj acl case det obl conj punct

text: In the wake of violence and division , hatred and mistruth , in the shadow of disease and economic hardship , a warming planet and unequal society , we begin the work of the 117th Congress .
label: case det obl case nmod cc conj punct conj cc conj punct case det obl case nmod cc amod conj punct det amod conj cc amod conj punct nsubj root det obj case det amod nmod punct

text: In his inaugural address , President Biden spoke to this moment — a moment of great challenge — and told us two simple truths : One , that our responsibilities are numerous , and , two , it will take unity — unity of spirit , unity of purpose — to fulfill them .
label: case nmod amod obl punct nsubj flat root case det obl punct det appos case amod nmod punct cc conj iobj nummod amod obj punct dislocated punct mark nmod nsubj cop appos punct cc punct dep punct expl aux conj obj punct appos case nmod punct conj case nmod punct mark csubj obj punct

text: President Biden , we heard you loud and clear .
label: vocative flat punct nsubj root obj advmod cc conj punct

text: We have a lengthy agenda , and we need to get it done together .
label: nsubj root det amod obj punct cc nsubj conj mark xcomp obj xcomp advmod punct

text: President Biden pointed the way to our Nation ’s recovery and renewal .
label: nsubj flat root det obj case nmod nmod case nmod cc conj punct

text: He reminded us of who we are and where we need to go , but we must now turn the spirit of his words into action .
label: nsubj root iobj case obl nsubj acl cc conj nsubj advcl mark xcomp punct cc nsubj aux advmod conj det obj case nmod nmod case obl punct

text: The Senate must immediately set to work on the mission President Biden described — restoring the greatness and goodness of America .
label: det nsubj aux advmod root case xcomp case det obl nsubj flat acl punct appos det obj cc conj case nmod punct

text: This will be an exceptionally busy and consequential period for the U.S. Senate .
label: nsubj aux cop det advmod amod cc conj root case det compound nmod punct

text: There is much to do , and we are ready to get to work .
label: expl root nsubj mark acl punct cc nsubj cop conj mark xcomp case obl punct

text: Now , not to upstage our new President and Vice President , but theirs has not been the only swearing in today .
label: advmod punct advmod mark root nmod amod obj cc compound conj punct cc nsubj aux advmod cop det amod conj compound nmod punct

text: A few moments ago , the Senate welcomed three new Members to this Chamber .
label: det amod obl advmod punct det nsubj root nummod amod obj case det nmod punct

text: I can now happily and proudly call them Senator PADILLA , Senator OSSOFF , and Senator WARNOCK .
label: nsubj aux advmod advmod cc conj root obj xcomp flat punct conj flat punct cc conj flat punct

text: They join Senators KELLY , HICKENLOOPER , and Luján as part of a six - Member class of Democratic Senators and a new Democratic Senate majority .
label: nsubj root obj flat punct conj punct cc conj case obl case det nummod punct compound nmod case amod nmod cc det amod amod compound conj punct

text: I mention the historic nature of Vice President HARRIS ’ ascendance , but let ’s not forget that her successor , ALEX PADILLA , is the first Latino Senator to represent California ; that RAFAEL WARNOCK , born while Georgia was represented in this Chamber by two staunch segregationists , is now the first African - American Senator Georgia has ever elected ; and that JOHN OSSOFF is the first Jewish Senator from his State , sworn in today on a book of Hebrew Scripture once owned by the rabbi , who , decades ago , formed a bond between the Jewish and African - American communities of Georgia .
label: nsubj root det amod obj case nmod flat flat case nmod punct cc conj obj advmod xcomp mark nmod nsubj punct appos flat punct cop det amod amod ccomp mark acl obj punct mark nsubj flat punct acl mark nsubj aux advcl case det obl case nummod amod obl punct cop advmod det amod compound punct amod conj nsubj aux advmod acl punct cc mark nsubj flat cop det amod amod conj case nmod nmod punct acl compound obl case det obl case amod nmod advmod acl case det obl punct nsubj punct obl advmod punct acl det obj case det amod cc compound punct conj nmod case nmod punct

text: As President Biden said in his inaugural address , “ do n’t tell me things ca n’t change . ”
label: mark nsubj flat advcl case nmod amod obl punct punct aux advmod root iobj nsubj aux advmod ccomp punct punct

text: With the swearing in of these three Senators , the Senate will turn to Democratic control , for which I deeply thank my colleagues .
label: case det obl compound case det nummod nmod punct det nsubj aux root case amod obl punct case obl nsubj advmod advcl nmod obj punct

text: We will return to Democratic control under the first New York - born majority leader in American history — a kid from Brooklyn , the son of an exterminator and a housewife , and a descendant of victims of the Holocaust .
label: nsubj aux root case amod obl case det amod amod compound punct amod compound obl case amod nmod punct det appos case nmod punct det conj case det nmod cc det conj punct cc det conj case nmod case det nmod punct

text: That I should be the leader of this new Senate majority is an awesome responsibility — awesome in the Biblical sense , as the angels that tremble in awe before God .
label: mark nsubj aux cop det csubj case det amod compound nmod cop det amod root punct parataxis case det amod obl punct case det obl nsubj acl case obl case obl punct

text: Today , I feel the full weight of that responsibility , a sense of reverence and of awe at the trust placed in me .
label: obl punct nsubj root det amod obj case det nmod punct det conj case nmod cc case conj case det nmod acl case obl punct

text: I intend to honor that trust with all of my energy and with joy .
label: nsubj root mark xcomp det obj case obl case nmod nmod cc case conj punct

text: And as the majority changes in the Senate , the Senate will do business differently .
label: cc mark det nsubj advcl case det obl punct det nsubj aux root obj advmod punct

text: The Senate will address the challenges our country faces head on and without delay , not with timid solutions but with boldness and with courage .
label: det nsubj aux root det obj nmod nsubj acl compound advmod cc case conj punct advmod case amod obl cc case conj cc case conj punct

text: The Senate will tackle the perils of the moment , a once - in - a - generation health and economic crisis , and it will strive to make progress on generations - long struggle for racial justice , economic justice , equality of opportunity , and equality under the law .
label: det nsubj aux root det obj case det nmod punct det amod punct case punct det punct obl compound cc conj appos punct cc nsubj aux conj mark xcomp obj case compound punct amod nmod case amod nmod punct amod conj punct conj case nmod punct cc conj case det nmod punct

text: And make no mistake , the Senate will forcefully , consistently , and urgently address the greatest threat to this country and to our planet : climate change .
label: cc root det obj punct det nsubj aux advmod punct conj punct cc conj parataxis det amod obj case det nmod cc case nmod conj punct compound appos punct

text: This Senate will legislate .
label: det nsubj aux root punct

text: It will be active , responsive , energetic , and bold .
label: nsubj aux cop root punct conj punct conj punct cc conj punct

text: And to my Republican colleagues , when and where we can , the Democratic majority will strive to make this important work bipartisan .
label: cc case nmod amod obl punct advmod cc conj nsubj advcl punct det amod nsubj aux root mark xcomp det amod obj xcomp punct

text: The Senate works best when we work together .
label: det nsubj root advmod advmod nsubj advcl advmod punct

text: We have no choice .
label: nsubj root det obj punct

text: The challenges we face are great .
label: det nsubj nsubj acl cop root punct

text: The divisions in the country are real .
label: det nsubj case det nmod cop root punct

text: We have no choice but to try to work together every day to reward the faith the American people have placed in us .
label: nsubj root det obj mark mark acl mark xcomp advmod det obl mark advcl det obj det amod nsubj aux acl case obl punct

text: So let us begin .
label: advmod root obj xcomp punct

text: I yield the floor .
label: nsubj root det obj punct

text: Address to the Nation
label: root case det nmod

text: Announcing Decision To Resign the Office of President of the United States
label: root obj mark acl det obj case nmod case det amod nmod

text: August 08 , 1974
label: compound root punct nmod

text: Good evening :
label: amod root punct

text: This is the 37th time I have spoken to you from this office , where so many decisions have been made that shaped the history of this Nation .
label: nsubj cop det amod root nsubj aux acl case obl case det obl punct advmod advmod amod nsubj aux aux acl nsubj acl det obj case det nmod punct

text: Each time I have done so to discuss with you some matter that I believe affected the national interest .
label: det obl nsubj aux root advmod mark advcl case obl det obj nsubj nsubj acl ccomp det amod obj punct

text: In all the decisions I have made in my public life , I have always tried to do what was best for the Nation .
label: case det det obl nsubj aux acl case nmod amod obl punct nsubj aux advmod root mark xcomp obj cop acl case det obl punct

text: Throughout the long and difficult period of Watergate , I have felt it was my duty to persevere , to make every possible effort to complete the term of office to which you elected me .
label: case det amod cc conj obl case nmod punct nsubj aux root expl cop nmod ccomp mark csubj punct mark conj det amod obj mark acl det obj case nmod case obl nsubj acl obj punct

text: In the past few days , however , it has become evident to me that I no longer have a strong enough political base in the Congress to justify continuing that effort .
label: case det amod amod obl punct advmod punct expl aux root xcomp case obl mark nsubj advmod advmod csubj det amod advmod amod obj case det nmod mark advcl xcomp det obj punct

text: As long as there was such a base , I felt strongly that it was necessary to see the constitutional process through to its conclusion , that to do otherwise would be unfaithful to the spirit of that deliberately difficult process and a dangerously destabilizing precedent for the future .
label: advmod advmod mark expl advcl det det nsubj punct nsubj root advmod mark expl cop ccomp mark csubj det amod obj compound case nmod obl punct mark mark csubj advmod aux cop conj case det obl case det advmod amod nmod cc det advmod amod conj case det nmod punct

text: But with the disappearance of that base , I now believe that the constitutional purpose has been served , and there is no longer a need for the process to be prolonged .
label: cc case det obl case det nmod punct nsubj advmod root mark det amod nsubj aux aux ccomp punct cc expl conj advmod advmod det nsubj mark det nsubj mark aux acl punct

text: I would have preferred to carry through to the finish , whatever the personal agony it would have involved , and my family unanimously urged me to do so .
label: nsubj aux aux root mark xcomp compound case det obl punct advcl det amod nsubj nsubj aux aux acl punct cc nmod nsubj advmod conj obj mark xcomp advmod punct

text: But the interests of the Nation must always come before any personal considerations .
label: cc det nsubj case det nmod aux advmod root case det amod obl punct

text: From the discussions I have had with Congressional and other leaders , I have concluded that because of the Watergate matter , I might not have the support of the Congress that I would consider necessary to back the very difficult decisions and carry out the duties of this office in the way the interests of the Nation will require .
label: case det obl nsubj aux acl case amod cc conj obl punct nsubj aux root mark case fixed det compound obl punct nsubj aux advmod ccomp det obj case det nmod obj nsubj aux acl xcomp mark advcl det advmod amod obj cc conj compound det obj case det nmod case det obl det nsubj case det nmod aux acl punct

text: I have never been a quitter .
label: nsubj aux advmod cop det root punct

text: To leave office before my term is completed is abhorrent to every instinct in my body .
label: mark csubj obj mark nmod nsubj aux advcl cop root case det obl case nmod nmod punct

text: But as President , I must put the interests of America first .
label: cc case obl punct nsubj aux root det obj case nmod xcomp punct

text: America needs a full - time President and a full - time Congress , particularly at this time with problems we face at home and abroad .
label: nsubj root det amod punct compound obj cc det amod punct compound conj punct advmod case det obl case obl nsubj acl case obl cc conj punct

text: To continue to fight through the months ahead for my personal vindication would almost totally absorb the time and attention of both the President and the Congress in a period when our entire focus should be on the great issues of peace abroad and prosperity without inflation at home .
label: mark csubj mark xcomp case det obl advmod case nmod amod obl aux advmod advmod root det obj cc conj case cc det nmod cc det conj case det obl advmod nmod amod nsubj aux cop case det amod acl case nmod advmod cc conj case nmod case nmod punct

text: Therefore , I shall resign the Presidency effective at noon tomorrow .
label: advmod punct nsubj aux root det obj advmod case obl nmod punct

text: Vice President Ford will be sworn in as President at that hour in this office .
label: compound nsubj flat aux aux root compound case obl case det obl case det obl punct

text: As I recall the high hopes for America with which we began this second term , I feel a great sadness that I will not be here in this office working on your behalf to achieve those hopes in the next 2 1/2 years .
label: mark nsubj advcl det amod obj case nmod case obl nsubj acl det amod obj punct nsubj root det amod obj mark nsubj aux advmod cop acl case det obl advcl case nmod obl mark advcl det obj case det amod nummod conj obl punct

text: But in turning over direction of the Government to Vice President Ford , I know , as I told the Nation when I nominated him for that office 10 months ago , that the leadership of America will be in good hands .
label: cc mark advcl compound obj case det nmod case compound obl flat punct nsubj root punct mark nsubj advcl det iobj advmod nsubj advcl obj case det obl nummod obl advmod punct mark det nsubj case nmod aux cop case amod ccomp punct

text: In passing this office to the Vice President , I also do so with the profound sense of the weight of responsibility that will fall on his shoulders tomorrow and , therefore , of the understanding , the patience , the cooperation he will need from all Americans .
label: mark advcl det obj case det compound obl punct nsubj advmod root advmod case det amod obl case det nmod case nmod nsubj aux acl case nmod obl obl cc punct advmod punct case det conj punct det conj punct det conj nsubj aux acl case det obl punct

text: As he assumes that responsibility , he will deserve the help and the support of all of us .
label: mark nsubj advcl det obj punct nsubj aux root det obj cc det conj case nmod case nmod punct

text: As we look to the future , the first essential is to begin healing the wounds of this Nation , to put the bitterness and divisions of the recent past behind us and to rediscover those shared ideals that lie at the heart of our strength and unity as a great and as a free people .
label: mark nsubj advcl case det obl punct det amod nsubj cop mark root xcomp det obj case det nmod punct mark conj det obj cc conj case det amod nmod case xcomp cc mark conj det amod obj nsubj acl case det obl case nmod nmod cc conj case det amod cc case det conj nmod punct

text: By taking this action , I hope that I will have hastened the start of that process of healing which is so desperately needed in America .
label: mark advcl det obj punct nsubj root mark nsubj aux aux ccomp det obj case det nmod case nmod nsubj aux advmod advmod acl case obl punct

text: I regret deeply any injuries that may have been done in the course of the events that led to this decision .
label: nsubj root advmod det obj nsubj aux aux aux acl case det obl case det nmod nsubj acl case det obl punct

text: I would say only that if some of my judgments were wrong -- and some were wrong -- they were made in what I believed at the time to be the best interest of the Nation .
label: nsubj aux root advmod mark mark nsubj case nmod nmod cop advcl punct cc nsubj cop parataxis punct nsubj aux ccomp case obl nsubj acl case det obl mark cop det amod xcomp case det nmod punct

text: To those who have stood with me during these past difficult months -- to my family , my friends , to many others who joined in supporting my cause because they believed it was right -- I will be eternally grateful for your support .
label: case obl nsubj aux acl case obl case det amod amod obl punct case nmod parataxis punct nmod conj punct case amod conj nsubj acl mark advcl nmod obj mark nsubj advcl nsubj cop ccomp punct nsubj aux cop advmod root case nmod obl punct

text: And to those who have not felt able to give me your support , let me say I leave with no bitterness toward those who have opposed me , because all of us , in the final analysis , have been concerned with the good of the country , however our judgments might differ .
label: cc case obl nsubj aux advmod acl xcomp mark xcomp iobj nmod obj punct root obj xcomp nsubj ccomp case det obl case nmod nsubj aux acl obj punct mark nsubj case nmod punct case det amod obl punct aux cop advcl case det obl case det nmod punct advmod nmod nsubj aux advcl punct

text: So , let us all now join together in affirming that common commitment and in helping our new President succeed for the benefit of all Americans .
label: advmod punct root obj det advmod xcomp advmod mark advcl det amod obj cc mark conj nmod amod obj xcomp case det obl case det nmod punct

text: I shall leave this office with regret at not completing my term , but with gratitude for the privilege of serving as your President for the past 5 1/2 years .
label: nsubj aux root det obj case obl mark advmod acl nmod obj punct cc case conj case det nmod mark acl case nmod obl case det amod nummod conj obl punct

text: These years have been a momentous time in the history of our Nation and the world .
label: det nsubj aux cop det amod root case det nmod case nmod nmod cc det conj punct

text: They have been a time of achievement in which we can all be proud , achievements that represent the shared efforts of the Administration , the Congress , and the people .
label: nsubj aux cop det root case nmod case obl nsubj aux advmod cop acl punct parataxis nsubj acl det amod obj case det nmod punct det conj punct cc det conj punct

text: But the challenges ahead are equally great , and they , too , will require the support and the efforts of the Congress and the people working in cooperation with the new Administration .
label: cc det nsubj advmod cop advmod root punct cc nsubj punct advmod punct aux conj det obj cc det conj case det nmod cc det conj acl case obl case det amod nmod punct

text: We have ended America 's longest war , but in the work of securing a lasting peace in the world , the goals ahead are even more far - reaching and more difficult .
label: nsubj aux root nmod case amod obj punct cc case det obl mark acl det amod obj case det obl punct det nsubj advmod cop advmod advmod advmod punct conj cc advmod conj punct

text: We must complete a structure of peace so that it will be said of this generation , our generation of Americans , by the people of all nations , not only that we ended one war but that we prevented future wars .
label: nsubj aux root det obj case nmod mark fixed expl aux aux advcl case det obl punct nmod appos case nmod punct case det obl case det nmod punct advmod advmod mark nsubj csubj nummod obj cc mark nsubj conj amod obj punct

text: We have unlocked the doors that for a quarter of a century stood between the United States and the People 's Republic of China .
label: nsubj aux root det obj nsubj case det obl case det nmod acl case det amod obl cc det nmod case conj case nmod punct

text: We must now ensure that the one quarter of the world 's people who live in the People 's Republic of China will be and remain not our enemies , but our friends .
label: nsubj aux advmod root mark det nummod nsubj case det nmod case nmod nsubj acl case det nmod case obl case nmod aux cop cc conj advmod nmod ccomp punct cc nmod conj punct

text: I am proud to come here to Philadelphia and join my fellow Democrats .
label: nsubj cop root mark xcomp advmod case obl cc conj nmod amod obj punct

text: In 1960 , the Democrats of this city produced a margin in the presidential race that was in this city three times as large as it was in the whole United States .
label: case obl punct det nsubj case det nmod root det obj case det amod nmod nsubj cop case det acl nummod obl advmod amod mark nsubj cop case det amod amod advcl punct

text: So I am proud to be back here again , and I am very happy to be introduced by your distinguished chairman , Bill Green .
label: advmod nsubj cop root mark cop xcomp advmod advmod punct cc nsubj cop advmod conj mark aux xcomp case nmod amod obl punct appos flat punct

text: When he became chairman of this city committee , there were 300,000 more Republicans registered in the city of Philadelphia than Democrats , and it is a source of satisfaction to me that tonight there are 260,000 more Democrats registered .
label: advmod nsubj advcl xcomp case det compound nmod punct expl root nummod amod nsubj acl case det obl case nmod case obl punct cc expl cop det conj case nmod case obl mark obl expl csubj nummod amod nsubj acl punct

text: I can understand why some Republicans may not like it , but , as a Democrat , as one who believes in the Democratic Party , as one who believes that the Democratic Party has meant progress for this city , this State , and this country , I am proud to be here in Philadelphia .
label: nsubj aux root obj det nsubj aux advmod advcl obj punct cc punct case det obl punct case obl nsubj acl case det amod obl punct case obl nsubj acl mark det amod nsubj aux ccomp obj case det nmod punct det conj punct cc det conj punct nsubj cop conj mark cop xcomp case obl punct

text: And I am proud to be here with your mayor .
label: cc nsubj cop root mark cop xcomp case nmod obl punct

text: I do not come from Philadelphia , and I would not interfere , but I am hopeful and confident that when we come to the Army - Navy game in a month from now , we will be greeted by the new mayor of Philadelphia , Mayor Tale .
label: nsubj aux advmod root case obl punct cc nsubj aux advmod conj punct cc nsubj cop conj cc conj mark advmod nsubj advcl case det compound punct compound obl case det obl case nmod punct nsubj aux aux ccomp case det amod obl case nmod punct appos flat punct

text: I have n't given a political speech for about 3 years , so I am a little out of practice , but I am gradually getting back into it .
label: nsubj aux advmod root det amod obj case advmod nummod obl punct advmod nsubj cop det nmod case fixed parataxis punct cc nsubj aux advmod conj advmod case obl punct

text: And I am glad to be here with a mayor who follows two other distinguished mayors of this city , who carries on their tradition - Joe Clark , your United States Senator who was a great mayor of Philadelphia , and Dick Dilworth , who followed him , who was a great mayor of Philadelphia .
label: cc nsubj cop root mark cop xcomp case det obl nsubj acl nummod amod amod obj case det nmod punct nsubj acl compound nmod obj punct parataxis flat punct nmod amod compound appos nsubj cop det amod acl case nmod punct cc conj flat punct nsubj acl obj punct nsubj cop det amod acl case nmod punct

text: That is the tradition of honest , progressive democratic government that Mayor Tate carries on .
label: nsubj cop det root case amod punct amod amod nmod obj nsubj flat acl compound punct

text: And I am glad to be here with Judge Hoffman and Senator Mahady who also run this fall in the State of Pennsylvania .
label: cc nsubj cop root mark cop xcomp case obl flat cc conj flat nsubj advmod acl det obl case det obl case nmod punct

text: Everyone expects things of Presidents , but I am not sure that they realize how much depends upon the Members of the House and the Members of the Senate who must make the final judgment on what kind of laws a President must execute .
label: nsubj root obj case obl punct cc nsubj cop advmod conj mark nsubj ccomp advmod advmod ccomp case det obl case det nmod cc det conj case det nmod nsubj aux acl det amod obj case det nmod case nmod det nsubj aux acl punct

text: The Congressmen from this city as well as the Senator from this State - Bill Barrett and Bob Nix and Herman Toll and Jim Byrne and Chairman Green - have , with Joe Clark supported legislation month in and month out that benefited this city and this State and this country and , what is more , has helped make the United States meet its responsibilities around the globe .
label: det nsubj case det nmod cc fixed fixed det conj case det nmod punct appos flat cc conj flat cc conj flat cc conj flat cc conj flat punct aux punct case obl flat root obj nsubj advcl cc nsubj conj nsubj acl det obj cc det conj cc det conj cc punct nsubj cop advcl punct aux conj xcomp det amod obj xcomp nmod obj case det nmod punct

text: So what you do in this city counts all across the country , and Philadelphia has sent the right men to the House of Representatives and to the Senate of the United States .
label: advmod obj nsubj csubj case det obl root advmod case det obl punct cc nsubj aux conj det amod obj case det obl case nmod cc case det conj case det amod nmod punct

text: And I am also proud to be here with your former Governor who is now working for us in Washington as our adviser on fair housing , Governor Dave Lawrence , of the State of Pennsylvania .
label: cc nsubj cop advmod root mark cop xcomp case nmod amod obl nsubj aux advmod acl case obl case obl case nmod obl case amod nmod punct parataxis flat flat punct case det nmod case nmod punct

text: Three years ago tomorrow night , I spoke in this hall in the closing days of the 1960 campaign , and I asked the people of this city to give us their support to help this country move again .
label: nummod nmod advmod compound obl punct nsubj root case det obl case det amod obl case det nummod nmod punct cc nsubj conj det iobj case det nmod mark xcomp iobj nmod obj mark advcl det obj xcomp advmod punct

text: The people of Philadelphia gave that support , and the support I received from this city and this State was , as it was in the 1960 convention , the key to our victory across the country .
label: det nsubj case nmod root det obj punct cc det nsubj nsubj acl case det obl cc det conj conj punct mark nsubj cop case det compound advcl punct det obj case nmod nmod case det nmod punct

text: I am back in Philadelphia to express my thanks for that support and also to express appreciation for the help we received from those Democrats in this city and State , and to report to you on the progress that this country has made on the goals that were outlined 3 years ago .
label: nsubj cop root case obl mark advcl nmod obj case det nmod cc advmod mark conj obj case det nmod nsubj acl case det obl case det nmod cc conj punct cc mark conj case obl case det obl obj det nsubj aux acl case det obl nsubj aux acl nummod obl advmod punct

text: I did not promise on that October night that life would be easy in the Great Republic .
label: nsubj aux advmod root case det nmod obl mark nsubj aux cop ccomp case det amod obl punct

text: I did not say we would not have new pressures and new problems .
label: nsubj aux advmod root nsubj aux advmod ccomp amod obj cc amod conj punct

text: Nor did I speak of swift solutions in 100 days in office .
label: cc aux nsubj root case amod obl case nummod obl case nmod punct

text: I talked instead about the kind of America that I wanted for my family and for your family and all those who are citizens of this country in these difficult and changing years , the kind of America in which I believed , not as a Democrat or as a candidate , but as a citizen .
label: nsubj root advmod case det obl case nmod obj nsubj acl case nmod obl cc case nmod conj cc det conj nsubj cop acl case det nmod case det amod cc conj obl punct det appos case nmod case obl nsubj acl punct advmod case det obl cc case det conj punct cc case det conj punct

text: Today , in many ways , the world looks very different , and the revolutionary change of pace is even more rapid than it has been in the past .
label: obl punct case amod obl punct det nsubj root advmod xcomp punct cc det amod nsubj case nmod cop advmod advmod conj mark nsubj aux cop case det advcl punct

text: But there has been no change in my concept of the goals which this country must strive for if it is to meet its responsibilities to its people and those who depend upon it .
label: cc expl aux root det nsubj case nmod nmod case det nmod obl det nsubj aux acl case mark nsubj aux mark advcl nmod obj case nmod nmod cc conj nsubj acl case obl punct

text: I still believe in the kind of America which I described in this hall 3 years ago , and I am still determined that this Nation shall continue to strive to meet those goals .
label: nsubj advmod root case det obl case nmod obj nsubj acl case det obl nummod obl advmod punct cc nsubj cop advmod conj mark det nsubj aux ccomp mark xcomp mark advcl det obj punct

text: And I am gratified to be able to report some progress in the last 33 1/2 months .
label: cc nsubj cop root mark cop advcl mark xcomp det obj case det amod nummod compound obl punct

text: I said , first of all , that I believed in America where work was available to those who were willing and able to work , where the waste of idle men and machines could be avoided , and where greater economic growth could provide the new jobs and the new markets that our growing Nation needed .
label: nsubj root punct advmod case obl punct mark nsubj ccomp case obl advmod nsubj cop acl case obl nsubj cop acl cc conj mark xcomp punct advmod det nsubj case amod nmod cc conj aux aux conj punct cc advmod amod amod nsubj aux conj det amod obj cc det amod conj obj nmod amod nsubj acl punct

text: That goal has not been fully achieved .
label: det nsubj aux advmod aux advmod root punct

text: There are still too many men and women , particularly young men and women , unable to find work .
label: expl root advmod advmod amod nsubj cc conj punct advmod amod appos cc conj punct acl mark xcomp obj punct

text: And our high wartime tax rates still prevent our economy from growing as fully and as freely as it must .
label: cc nmod amod compound compound nsubj advmod root nmod obj mark xcomp advmod advmod cc advmod conj mark nsubj advcl punct

text: But one fact is that 2 1/2 million people more are working in the United States than were working 33 months ago .
label: cc nummod nsubj cop mark compound compound obl nsubj amod aux root case det amod obl mark aux advcl nummod obl advmod punct

text: The rate of unemployment and idle capacity has been cut , and our economy of the United States will shortly pass the $ 600 billion mark , for a record rise -- for a record rise in 3 years of $ 100 billion -- the largest peacetime rise in the history of the United States .
label: det nsubj case nmod cc amod conj aux aux root punct cc nmod nsubj case det amod nmod aux advmod conj det compound compound nummod obj punct case det amod obl punct case det amod parataxis case nummod nmod case nmod compound nummod punct det amod compound appos case det nmod case det amod nmod punct

text: And if we can obtain the early passage of an effective tax cut which the House of Representatives has already passed -- and which the Ways and Means Committee , on which Bill Green serves , wrote -- we shall be sailing this country next year on the longest and strongest peacetime expansion of our economy in the history of the United States .
label: cc mark nsubj aux advcl det amod obj case det amod compound nmod obj det nsubj case nmod aux advmod acl punct cc obj det compound cc conj nsubj punct case obl nsubj flat acl punct conj punct nsubj aux aux root det obj amod obl case det amod cc conj compound obl case nmod nmod case det nmod case det amod nmod punct

text: It is well within our reach .

text: It gives me great pleasure to be here today as the Chief Guest during the launch of School of Open – Africa .
label: expl root iobj amod obj mark cop csubj obl case det amod obl case det obl case nmod case nmod punct appos punct

text: I would like to begin by sincerely thanking Creative Commons Africa community and under the able coordination of Alex Gakuru and Tobias Schonwetter , and the global Creative Commons Community for inviting me to preside over this launch .
label: nsubj aux root mark xcomp mark advmod advcl amod compound appos obj reparandum case det amod nmod case nmod flat cc conj flat punct cc det amod amod compound conj mark advcl obj mark xcomp case det obl punct

text: I am happy to note the enthusiasm demonstrated by School of Open Africa in transforming education along Sustainable Development Goals proposed for post - 2015 ( Goal No. 4 : “ Ensure inclusive and equitable quality education and promote life - long learning opportunities for all ” ) and in line with the Kenya Vision 2030 which seeks to transform Kenya into a middle - income country that offers high quality of life to all citizens by the year 2030 .
label: nsubj cop root mark xcomp det obj acl case obl case nmod appos mark advcl obj case amod compound obl acl case case punct obl punct appos dep dep punct punct parataxis amod cc conj compound obj cc conj compound punct amod compound obj case nmod punct punct cc case conj case det compound nmod dep nsubj acl mark xcomp obj case det compound punct compound obl nsubj acl amod obj case nmod case det obl case det obl appos punct

text: Kenya is a signatory to the UNESCO ’s 2012 Paris Declaration on Open Education Resources licensed under Creative Commons open licenses .

text: Fully aware of the role of education in a country ’s development agenda , I am sure that the new initiatives being undertaken by School of Open Africa , the Creative Commons and UNESCO are making their contribution towards the social , economic , and political pillars which are the three fundamental cornerstones of our country , and indeed for our great continent .
label: advmod advcl case det obl case nmod case det nmod case compound nmod punct nsubj cop root mark det amod nsubj aux acl case obl case nmod appos punct det amod conj cc conj aux ccomp nmod obj case det amod punct conj punct cc conj nmod nsubj cop det nummod amod acl case nmod nmod punct cc advmod case nmod amod conj punct

text: Ladies and gentlemen , as you may be aware , the Country ’s development blue print is being implemented through successive five - year Medium Term Plans ( MTPs ) that will finally enable the country to achieve the long - term goals .
label: vocative cc conj punct mark nsubj aux cop advcl punct det nmod case compound amod nsubj aux aux root case amod nummod punct compound amod compound obl punct appos punct nsubj aux advmod acl det obj mark xcomp det amod punct compound obj punct

text: We are now in the second medium term plan cycle ( 2013 - 2017 ) whose theme is “ Transforming Kenya : Pathways to Devolution , Socio-economic Development , Equity and National Unity ” .
label: nsubj cop advmod case det amod amod compound compound root punct appos case nmod punct nmod nsubj cop punct acl obj punct parataxis case nmod punct amod conj punct conj cc amod conj punct punct

text: As you may be aware , the ICT Authority rolled out the National ICT Master plan that will set the pace for progression of the country in ICT for the next five years .

text: The Master plan – once fully rolled out – will completely transform government processes , services and management , and make information access and service delivery more efficient .
label: det compound nsubj punct mark advmod acl compound punct aux advmod root compound obj punct conj cc conj punct cc conj compound obj cc compound conj advmod xcomp punct

text: Again , the Master plan , with the flagship projects to pilot its implementation , will steer the march towards the digital future that will transform the country to a regional technical hub , raise the country ’s competitiveness and align the country in line with vision 2030 ’s ICT goals .

text: By launching the Kenya ICT Master Plan , the government revealed its commitment towards the enhancement of access to quality education and training through ICT in line with the Millennium Development Goals ( MDGs ) .
label: mark advcl det compound compound compound obj punct det nsubj root nmod obj case det nmod case nmod case amod nmod cc conj case nmod case nmod case det compound compound nmod punct appos punct punct

text: We are reviewing the National ICT Policy Guidelines to ensure alignment with proposed Sustainable Development Goals .
label: nsubj aux root det amod compound compound obj mark advcl obj case amod amod compound nmod punct

text: As a country , we are also privileged to have a National ICT Policy whose goal is to create a prosperous ICT - driven Kenyan society .
label: case det obl punct nsubj cop advmod root mark xcomp det amod compound obj nmod nsubj cop mark acl det amod compound punct amod amod obj punct

text: With a well mainstreamed ICT society , we are assured of better livelihoods of Kenyans attainable through the availability of accessible , efficient , reliable and affordable ICT services .
label: case det advmod amod compound obl punct nsubj aux root case amod obl case nmod acl case det obl case amod punct conj punct conj cc conj compound nmod punct

text: ICT provides a platform that enables the realization of these goals .
label: nsubj root det obj nsubj acl det obj case det nmod punct

text: I must emphasize that Creative Commons through the School of Open Africa has provided a good example of innovative use of ICT in education that resonates well with the Kenya National ICT Master Plan .
label: nsubj aux root mark amod nsubj case det nmod case nmod appos aux ccomp det amod obj case amod nmod case nmod case nmod nsubj acl advmod case det compound amod compound compound obl punct

text: The integration of ICT into educational programmes places both the teaching staff and students at the forefront in the utilization of ICT for the enhancement of lives .
label: det nsubj case nmod case amod nmod root cc det compound obj cc conj case det obl case det obl case nmod case det nmod case nmod punct

text: I note with great pleasure the freedom to re-purpose offered by openly licensed educational resources , the convenience online access to learners as alternative courses delivery and certification methods .
label: nsubj root case amod obl det obj mark acl acl case advmod amod amod obl punct det conj amod nsubj case acl case amod compound compound cc conj nmod punct

text: At this juncture , ladies and gentlemen , I thank William Fisher III , Professor of Intellectual Property and his staff at the Berkman Centre for Internet and Society at Harvard Law School for providing a free copyright law course taught to graduands present today to receive their certificates .
label: case det obl punct vocative cc conj punct nsubj root obj flat flat punct appos case amod nmod cc nmod conj case det compound nmod case nmod cc conj case compound compound nmod mark advcl det amod compound compound obj acl case obl acl obl mark advcl nmod obj punct

label: nsubj advmod root obj flat punct advmod appos punct amod list case compound nmod cc punct compound conj punct punct cc conj flat mark advmod advcl det obj case obl punct

text: I must congratulate the former students and ask to make the very best use of the copyright law knowledge they acquired while also challenging all universities represented here to consider emulating the highly successfully CopyrightX initiative .
label: nsubj aux root det amod obj cc conj mark xcomp det advmod amod obj case det compound compound nmod nsubj acl mark advmod advcl det obj acl advmod mark xcomp xcomp det advmod amod compound obj punct

text: As the government continues to work on modalities of ensuring universal access to education and increasing the internet penetration in all parts of the country , we are pleased to witness this mode of study that will definitely translate to affordable education .
label: mark det nsubj advcl mark xcomp case obl mark acl amod obj case nmod cc conj det compound obj case det nmod case det nmod punct nsubj cop root mark xcomp det obj case nmod nsubj aux advmod acl case amod obl punct

label: amod compound nsubj acl case amod obl case nmod case nmod aux root obj case det amod nmod nsubj aux cop det compound punct amod acl punct

label: amod punct conj punct cc compound punct conj nsubj case nmod case cc amod cc conj nmod cop root case det nmod case det amod nmod punct

text: Thank you .

text: Thank you .

text: Well , good evening , everyone .

text: I am very honored to be with you all .

text: So , to our President , Joe Biden , thank you for your leadership around all of these issues .
