text: The Chatham Islands
label: det compound root

text: The Chatnam Islands ( Rekohu in the indigenous Moriori language ) are the eastern - most settled islands in New Zealand .
label: det compound nsubj punct appos case det amod compound nmod punct cop det amod punct amod amod root case nmod flat punct

text: The islands are in their own time zone , 45 minutes ahead of New Zealand time ;
label: det nsubj cop case nmod amod compound root punct nummod obl advmod case compound flat obl punct

text: the International Date Line jogs eastward to keep them on the same calendar day as the rest of New Zealand .
label: det amod compound nsubj root advmod mark advcl obj case det amod compound obl case det nmod case nmod flat punct

text: The islands lie 860 km east of Christchurch , in the middle of the " Roaring Forties " .
label: det nsubj root nummod obl xcomp case obl punct case det obl case det punct amod nmod punct punct

text: Steeped in culture and history , these islands are on the very edge of civilisation .
label: acl case obl cc conj punct det nsubj cop case det amod root case nmod punct

text: Experience Moriori culture , experience Rekohu .
label: root amod obj punct parataxis obj punct

text: Understand
label: root

text: The Chatham Islands consist of the main island , Chatham Island itself , with a population of 600 , smaller Pitt Island with about 40 inhabitants , and a number of rocky outcrops .
label: det compound nsubj root case det amod obl punct appos flat nmod punct case det nmod case nmod punct amod compound conj case advmod nummod nmod punct cc det conj case amod nmod punct

text: The islands are volcanic in origin and have a unique and sensitive habitat that supports many rare and endangered species .
label: det nsubj cop root case obl cc conj det amod cc conj obj nsubj acl amod amod cc conj obj punct

text: The original people of the islands are the Moriori , who were descended from the Maori of mainland New Zealand , but who developed their own culture and variant of the language .
label: det amod nsubj case det nmod cop det root punct nsubj aux acl case det obl case amod nmod flat punct cc nsubj conj nmod amod obj cc conj case det nmod punct

text: By plane
label: case root

text: The only way for visitors to travel to the Chathams is via scheduled or chartered air service .
label: det amod nsubj case nmod mark acl case det obl cop case amod cc conj compound root punct

text: Air Chathams fly 5 days per week , from either Christchurch , Auckland or Wellington and , seasonally , from Napier .
label: compound nsubj root nummod obl case nmod punct case cc obl punct conj cc conj cc punct orphan punct case conj punct

text: The plane is based in the Chathams and flies to mainland New Zealand in the morning , then back to the Chathams in the afternoon .
label: det nsubj aux root case det obl cc conj case amod obl flat case det obl punct advmod advmod case det obl case det nmod punct

text: As part of New Zealand , there are no passport or visa requirements and no border controls on arrival from the mainland .
label: case obl case nmod flat punct expl root det nsubj cc compound conj cc det compound conj case nmod case det nmod punct

text: You should book or ensure accommodation before you board a flight for the Chathams , as during the popular months of the tourism season , between October and April , accommodation can be severely limited .

text: There are no same - day return flights , so once there you have to stay at least one night .
label: expl root det amod punct compound compound nsubj punct advmod advmod advmod nsubj parataxis mark xcomp case nmod nummod obl punct

text: Although flying to the Chathams and back is not cheap , it is worth it .
label: mark csubj case det obl cc conj cop advmod advcl punct nsubj cop root obj punct

text: Even the mainland school groups that fly there for school camps , and choose to stay at Kopinga Marae [ 1 ] get value for money by chartering a flight one way .
label: advmod det compound compound nsubj nsubj acl advmod case compound obl punct cc conj mark xcomp case obl flat punct dep punct root obj case nmod mark advcl det obj nummod obl punct

text: Anyway , you do n't have a choice on how you get there , unless you happen to own an aeroplane .

text: By boat
label: case root

text: The only scheduled shipping service to the Chatham Islands remains the Black Robin Freighters " Rangatira " , an antiquated , slow and small coastal trading vessel .
label: det amod amod compound nsubj case det compound nmod root det amod compound nmod punct xcomp punct punct det amod punct conj cc conj amod compound appos punct

text: One of only two National Historic Scenic Reserves in New Zealand ( the other is the Waitangi Treaty Grounds ) , Hapupu is a special place , and somewhere that you will want to tell others about .

text: Cleveland is a culturally diverse city on the shores of Lake Erie , one of the Great Lakes , in Cuyahoga County , Ohio , USA .

label: nsubj aux root compound punct compound obj cc amod conj punct amod conj cc compound conj punct cc det amod compound conj case nmod case det amod nmod punct

text: Understand

text: Cleveland from lakefront .

text: Cleveland is the urban center of Northeast Ohio , the 15th largest combined metropolitan area in the United States .
label: nsubj cop det amod root case compound nmod punct det advmod amod amod amod appos case det amod nmod punct

text: Throughout the twentieth century , the City of Cleveland proper was ranked as one of the 10 largest cities in the U.S. ( from 1890 until 1970 per US Census Bureau statistics ) .
label: case det amod obl punct det nsubj case nmod amod aux root case obl case det nummod amod nmod case det nmod punct case obl case nmod case compound compound compound nmod punct punct

text: Like most U.S. cities , Cleveland proper began to lose population to suburban areas in the 1960s and 1970s .
label: case amod compound obl punct nsubj amod root mark xcomp obj case amod obl case det obl cc conj punct

text: However , in the mid-1980s , Cleveland earned the nickname the " Comeback City " as the urban core experienced a dramatic revitalization process that continues today .
label: advmod punct case det obl punct nsubj root det obj det punct compound appos punct mark det amod nsubj parataxis det amod compound obj nsubj acl obl punct

text: As its " comeback " has continued , the official moniker is now the New American City as Cleveland has rightfully earned the reputation as a model of effective public - private partnership for urban planning .
label: mark nmod punct nsubj punct aux advcl punct det amod nsubj cop advmod det compound compound root mark nsubj aux advmod advcl det obj case det nmod case amod compound punct amod nmod case amod nmod punct

text: Despite the common perception that Cleveland is an industrial town , just beyond the automotive and steel plants , a clean and beautiful downtown rises at the mouth of the Cuyahoga River on the southern shore of Lake Erie ( often marvelled over by visitors who are surprised you ca n't see the other side , i.e. , Canada ) .
label: case det amod obl mark nsubj cop det amod acl punct advmod case det amod cc conj obl punct det amod cc conj nsubj root case det obl case det compound nmod case det amod obl case nmod flat punct advmod acl obl case obl nsubj aux acl nsubj aux advmod ccomp det amod obj punct advmod punct appos punct punct

text: Like other cities in the so - called " rust belt “ , Cleveland has endured growing pains as it makes its transition from a manufacturing - based economy .
label: case amod obl case det advmod punct amod punct amod nmod punct punct nsubj aux root amod obj mark nsubj advcl nmod obj case det compound punct amod nmod punct

text: While Cleveland continues to play a leading role in building the U.S. industrial base , it has also developed economic prowess in the fields of health care , law , finance , insurance , real estate development , and professional services .
label: mark nsubj advcl mark xcomp det amod obj mark acl det compound amod obj punct nsubj aux advmod root amod obj case det nmod case compound nmod punct conj punct conj punct conj punct amod compound conj punct cc amod conj punct

text: Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum
label: compound cc conj root case nmod cc conj

text: Another thing non-locals do n't often realize is that Cleveland 's long history of industrial wealth has left it chock full of cultural riches as well as the beginnings of a " sustainable city " movement .
label: det nsubj nsubj aux advmod advmod acl cop mark nmod case amod nsubj case amod nmod aux root obj advmod xcomp case amod obl cc fixed fixed det conj case det punct amod compound punct nmod punct

text: Serving as a global model for urban rebirth , Cleveland has been named one of the top 10 international visitor hotspots by Travel and Leisure magazine .
label: advcl case det amod obl case amod nmod punct nsubj aux aux root xcomp case det amod nummod amod compound nmod case compound cc conj obl punct

text: For decades , the city has boasted of : a " Big Five " orchestra ( The Cleveland Orchestra ) , the second largest performing arts center in the U.S. ( Playhouse Square Center ) , a world - renowned art museum ( The Cleveland Museum of Art ) , the nation 's first health museum ( HealthSpace Cleveland ) , R&D hub of the aerospace and aviation industry ( the NASA Glenn Research & Visitors Center ) and a number of other first - rate attractions ( too many to mention here - read on ) .

text: During its " comeback " years , Cleveland has added : the Rock and Roll Hall of Fame and Museum , the Great Lakes Science Center with Omnimax theatre , and four new sports facilities in the downtown area - Progressive Field ( Still known as " The Jake " after a recent corporate name change ) for the Major League Baseball Indians , QuickenLoans Arena ( " The Q " ) for the NBA Cavaliers , Cleveland Browns Stadium for the NFL Browns and the Wolstein Center for the Cleveland State University Vikings basketball team .

text: Visa and legal issues
label: root cc amod conj

text: A tourist visa card ( visa de tarjeta del turista ) is necessary for travelers from most nations .
label: det compound compound nsubj punct appos flat flat flat flat punct cop root case obl case amod nmod punct

text: This visa , which is really little more than a piece of paper on which you list your vital statistics , costs between 15 - 25 CUC ( or € 15 - 25 ) , depending on where purchased .
label: det nsubj punct nsubj cop advmod obl acl case det obl case nmod case obl nsubj acl nmod amod obj punct root case nummod case nmod obl punct cc conj nummod case nmod punct punct case fixed obl advcl punct

text: It can be purchased at the Airport in Cuba on arrival , however it should be noted that many airlines will require a valid tourist visa card before boarding flights .
label: nsubj aux aux root case det obl case nmod case obl punct advmod expl aux aux parataxis mark amod nsubj aux csubj det amod compound compound obj mark advcl obj punct

text: It is usually valid for 30 days and can be extended once for another 30 days at any immigration office in Cuba ( for 25 CUC ) - beyond this you would need a flight out of Cuba within the extended visa period .
label: nsubj cop advmod root case nummod obl cc aux aux conj advmod case det nummod obl case det compound obl case nmod punct case nummod obl punct punct case obl nsubj aux parataxis det obj case fixed nmod case det amod compound nmod punct

text: Canadians are the exception , getting 90 days on arrival and can apply for a 90 day extension .
label: nsubj cop det root punct advcl nummod obj case obl cc aux conj case det nummod compound obl punct

text: Your passport needs to be valid at least six months past the end of your planned return .
label: nmod nsubj root mark cop xcomp case nmod nummod nmod case det obl case nmod amod nmod punct

text: Canadian passports must be valid for at least one month beyond the date of expected departure ( [ 2 ] ) .
label: amod nsubj aux cop root case case nmod nummod obl case det nmod case amod nmod punct punct dep punct punct punct

text: From Canada , the tourist card is normally provided on the flight .
label: case obl punct det compound nsubj aux advmod root case det obl punct

text: It can also be purchased from most Latin American gateway airports if departing from there ( Cancun : 250 MXN , Mexico City : USD 25 ) .
label: nsubj aux advmod aux root case amod amod amod compound obl mark advcl case obl punct parataxis punct nummod dep punct conj flat punct dep nummod punct punct

text: Please note that if departing from Europe ( this may apply to other countries ) , you will require to have the visa before boarding the plane .
label: discourse root mark mark advcl case obl punct nsubj aux parataxis case amod obl punct punct nsubj aux ccomp mark xcomp det obj mark advcl det obj punct

text: Some times , the airline provides these at the airport , however check first that this is the case .
label: det obl punct det nsubj root obj case det obl punct advmod parataxis advmod mark nsubj cop det ccomp punct

text: Without a valid visa , boarding will be denied ( the airline would otherwise get a $ 1,000 fine from the Cuban immigration authorities ) .
label: case det amod obl punct csubj aux aux root punct det nsubj aux advmod parataxis det compound nummod obj case det amod compound obl punct punct

text: Country - specific advise
label: compound punct amod root

text: UK : Applying for the visa is a very simple process and can be done by post or in person at the Cuban embassy in London .
label: root punct csubj case det obl cop det advmod amod parataxis cc aux aux conj case obl cc case conj case det amod orphan case nmod punct

text: When applying to the Cuban Consulate by post , there is a new charge introduced in 2011 which is a £ 25 for a non-personal transaction .
label: advmod advcl case det amod obl case obl punct expl root det amod nsubj acl case obl nsubj cop det acl nummod case det amod nmod punct

text: If you can not go to the Cuban Consulate you may consider using VisaCuba ( [ 3 ] ) because it may be cheaper .
label: mark nsubj aux advmod advcl case det amod obl nsubj aux root xcomp obj punct punct dep punct punct mark nsubj aux cop advcl punct

text: Through them it may cost £ 20 in total per person .
label: case obl nsubj aux root obj nummod case obl case obl punct

text: If you apply in person to the Cuban Consulate , you get the visa straight away .
label: mark nsubj advcl case obl case det amod obl punct nsubj root det obj advmod advmod punct

text: It can also be done through online agencies as mentioned before although they may be slightly more expensive ( normally £ 15 + £ 15 admin fee and additional postage ) .
label: nsubj aux advmod aux root case amod obl mark advcl advmod mark nsubj aux cop advmod advmod advcl punct advmod parataxis nummod cc compound nummod compound conj cc amod conj punct punct

text: Germany : You can obtain the tourist card through the Cuban embassy in post .
label: root punct nsubj aux parataxis det compound obj case det amod obl case obl punct

text: Travel agencies may often offer cheaper and quicker services though .
label: compound nsubj aux advmod root amod cc conj obj advmod punct

text: Regular tourists who renew their 30 day visa are eligible to depart the country ( to any destination ) and return immediately enjoying a further 60 days ( 30 days plus a 30 day extension ) .
label: amod nsubj nsubj acl nmod nummod compound obj cop root mark xcomp det obj punct case det obl punct cc conj advmod advcl det amod nummod obj punct nummod appos cc det nummod compound conj punct punct

text: You are only allowed two consecutive stays in this manner .
label: nsubj aux advmod root nummod amod obj case det obl punct

text: If you want to stay with friends or family in Cuba you have to go with your intended host within two days after arrival to a migration office and pay 40 CUC for a 30 days family visa .
label: mark nsubj advcl mark xcomp case obl cc conj case obl nsubj root mark xcomp case nmod amod obl case nummod obl case nmod case det compound obl cc conj nummod obj case det nummod compound compound obl punct

text: Citizens of Antigua and Barbuda ( 28 days ) , Barbados ( 28 days ) , Benin , Bosnia and Herzegovina , CIS ( except Ukraine and Uzbekistan ) , Dominica , Grenada ( 60 days ) , Liechtenstein ( 90 days ) , Macedonia , Malaysia ( 90 days ) , Mongolia , Montenegro ( 90 days ) , Namibia , Singapore , Slovakia , Saint Kitts and Nevis , Saint Lucia , Saint Vincent and the Grenadines , Serbia ( 90 days ) , Turkmenistan who can stay 30 days without visa .

text: Aeromexico staff at Cancun airport claim that only citizens of China and Russia need no visa .
label: compound nsubj case compound nmod root mark advmod nsubj case nmod cc conj ccomp det obj punct

text: It is important to note that there is also a departure tax of CUC 25 , to be paid in cash when departing Cuba by airplane ; this is not required for boat departures .
label: expl cop root mark csubj mark expl ccomp advmod det compound nsubj case nmod nummod punct mark aux acl case obl advmod advcl obj case obl punct nsubj aux advmod parataxis case compound obl punct

text: This tax is not well publicized but it is essential to remember it .

text: Fort Lee

text: Fort Lee is a city in Bergen County .

text: View of the George Washington Bridge 's long span and Manhattan , as seen while looking east from Fort Lee Historic Park

text: Understand

text: Fort Lee is located between the Paramus , NJ retail corridor and Upper Manhattan .
label: nsubj flat aux root case det compound punct appos compound obl cc amod conj punct

text: This town is comprised of a large residential community that includes Fort Lee natives , transplants from New York , and immigrants , especially from Korea .
label: det nsubj aux root case det amod amod obl nsubj acl compound flat obj punct conj case amod nmod punct cc conj punct advmod case nmod punct

text: This cultural diversity is represented through the vast variety of international restaurants and small business , and in particular , there is a strong Korean presence that can be seen in retail and dining storefronts .

text: Fort Lee is a small town but is piled high with apartment buildings .

text: Because Fort Lee is situated above the banks of the Hudson River , there are breathtaking views from almost any window facing the river .

text: The New York City skyline and 4th of July fireworks are spectacular over the river .

text: Although it is highly built up , Fort Lee also houses many playing fields and recreational parks as well as bike and running trails .
label: mark nsubj aux advmod advcl compound punct nsubj flat advmod root amod compound obj cc amod conj cc fixed fixed compound cc conj conj punct

text: And although there is a great deal of vehicle traffic to and from the George Washington Bridge , which connects Fort Lee with Manhattan , one of the largest perks of this town is the walking access to many restaurants , convenience stores and mass transit , in the form of buses and vans that frequently run across the bridge and up and down major streets .

text: Some are within 5 – 10 minutes walking distance from the nearest parking lot , some require at least 3 – 4 hours of hiking ( those are , of course less frequented by other tourists and you might find yourself alone at a spectacular waterfall in the middle of nowhere - an amazing experience ! ) .
label: nsubj cop case nummod case nmod nmod compound root case det amod compound nmod punct nsubj parataxis case nmod nummod case nmod obj mark acl punct nsubj aux punct advmod fixed advmod parataxis case amod obl cc nsubj aux conj obj xcomp case det amod obl case det nmod case nmod punct det amod appos punct punct punct

text: The local rum distilleries offer tours ( check for opening times as they may very from season to season ) which are certainly worth the while since rum production is a very integral part of Guadeloupe 's economy .

text: And sampling the local rums is definitely worth the while .

text: Even though they might not be the best way to get around the island , a ride on the bus is still an experience you should not miss .
label: advmod mark nsubj aux advmod cop det amod advcl mark acl case det obl punct det nsubj case det nmod cop advmod det root nsubj aux advmod acl punct

text: Isfahan ( Persian : اصفهان , also known as Esfahan ) is a city in central Iran , south of Tehran and is the capital of Isfahan Province .
label: nsubj punct dep punct appos punct advmod acl case obl punct cop det root case amod nmod punct advmod case obl cc cop det conj case compound nmod punct

text: The Persians call it " Nesf - e - Jahan " , meaning " Half The World " .
label: det nsubj root obj punct xcomp punct flat punct flat punct punct acl punct det det ccomp punct punct

text: Due to its beautiful hand - painted tiling and magnificent public square , it is considered to be one of the most beautiful cities in the world .
label: case fixed nmod amod compound punct amod obl cc amod amod conj punct nsubj aux root mark cop xcomp case det advmod amod nmod case det nmod punct

text: An ancient town and capital of Persia from 1598 to 1722 , it was long noted for its fine carpets and silver filigree .
label: det amod advcl cc conj case nmod case obl case nmod punct nsubj aux advmod root case nmod amod obl cc compound conj punct

text: Today , textile and steel mills take their place .
label: obl punct compound cc conj nsubj root nmod obj punct

text: Its architecture , tree - lined boulevards and relaxed pace make it one of the highlights of Iran .
label: nmod nsubj punct obl punct amod conj cc amod conj root obj xcomp case det nmod case nmod punct

text: Understand
label: root

text: The city is 430 km south of Tehran at the foothills of the Zagros mountain range .
label: det nsubj cop amod root advmod case obl case det conj case det compound compound nmod punct

text: The city enjoys a temperate climate and regular seasons .
label: det nsubj root det amod obj cc amod conj punct

text: Isfahan is located on the main north - south and east - west routes crossing Iran .
label: nsubj aux root case det amod compound punct amod cc compound punct conj obl acl obj punct

text: The city has an Armenian Quarter called Jolfa ( originally called New Julfa ) established by Shah Abbas I in the 1600s after he destroyed the prosperous Armenian town of Julfa in Armenia and forced all of the Armenians to move to Persia , mostly to Isfahan .
label: det nsubj root det amod obj acl xcomp punct advmod acl amod xcomp punct acl case obl flat amod case det obl mark nsubj advcl det amod amod obj case nmod case nmod cc conj obj case det nmod mark xcomp case obl punct advmod case obl punct

text: They were allocated land and rebuilt a prosperous community that was a key part of an Armenian trade network extending from Singapore and India to Venice and Amsterdam .
label: nsubj aux root obj cc conj det amod obj nsubj cop det amod acl case det amod compound nmod acl case obl cc conj case obl cc conj punct

text: Today the quarter still has many Armenian Churches , an Armenian school , shops and Armenian residents .

label: det nsubj cop det amod amod amod root case det nmod case compound nmod case nmod cc nsubj cop det compound compound compound conj punct

label: det amod nsubj case nmod cop case det advmod root cc conj case det obl punct

text: 3 Imam Mosque ( called Shah Mosque before the revolution ) , Naqsh-e Jahan Square , south side .
label: dep compound root punct acl compound xcomp case det obl punct punct appos flat flat punct compound appos punct

text: Built during the Safavid period , it is an excellent example of Islamic architecture of Iran , and regarded as one of the masterpieces of Persian Architecture .
label: advcl case det compound obl punct nsubj cop det amod root case amod nmod case nmod punct cc conj case obl case det nmod case amod nmod punct

text: It is registered as a UNESCO World Heritage Site .
label: nsubj aux root case det compound compound compound obl punct

text: Its splendour is mainly due to the beauty of its seven - colour mosaic tiles and calligraphic inscriptions .
label: nmod nsubj cop advmod root case det obl case nmod nummod punct compound compound nmod cc amod conj punct

text: 4 Sheikh Lotf Allah Mosque , Naqsh-e Jahan Square , east side .
label: dep compound flat flat root punct appos flat flat punct amod appos punct

text: One of the architectural masterpieces of Safavid Iranian architecture , this mosque is considered to be the most beautiful in Iran .
label: nsubj case det amod nmod case compound amod nmod punct det appos aux root mark cop det advmod xcomp case obl punct

text: Built in 1602 by Shah Abbas I.= and designed by his chief architect , Sheikh Bahai .
label: root case obl case obl flat amod cc conj case nmod amod obl punct appos flat punct

text: The mosque was designed to be a private mosque for the royal family and therefore it does not have any minarets .
label: det nsubj aux root mark cop det amod xcomp case det amod nmod cc advmod nsubj aux advmod conj det obj punct

text: There is a tunnel from the mosque to the Royal Palace , across the square .
label: expl root det nsubj case det nmod case det amod nmod punct case det obl punct

text: 5 Masjed-e Jāmé of Isfahan , north of Naqsh-e Jahan Square in the old quarter .

text: Started in AD 842 , this is the first Islamic building to adopt the four - courtyard layout of Sassanid palaces .
label: advcl case obl obl punct nsubj cop det amod amod root mark acl det nummod punct compound obj case compound nmod punct

text: 6 Hakim Mosque , Hakim ( north of Naqsh-e Jahan in the old quarter ) .

text: It is forty - eight meters high and there are seven floors , each accessible by a difficult spiral staircase .
label: nsubj cop nummod punct compound obl root cc expl conj nummod nsubj punct nsubj acl case det amod amod obl punct

text: In the sixth floor music room , deep circular niches are found in the walls , having not only aesthetic value , but also acoustic .
label: case det amod compound compound obl punct amod amod nsubj aux root case det obl punct advcl advmod advmod amod obj punct cc advmod conj punct

text: It is rich in naturalistic wall paintings by Reza Abbassi , the court painter of Shah Abbas I , and his pupils .
label: nsubj cop root case amod compound obl case nmod flat punct det compound appos case nmod flat amod punct cc nmod conj punct

label: advmod punct expl root nummod nsubj punct cc nsubj aux conj case det obl case nmod punct nsubj aux advmod advcl case nmod obl punct

text: Łódź
label: root

text: Łódź ( Pronounced : Wootch ) is Poland 's third biggest city , and the capital of the Łódzkie Voivodship .
label: nsubj punct acl punct xcomp punct cop nmod case advmod amod root punct cc det conj case det compound nmod punct

text: Unlike most other large Polish cities , which have long histories , Łódź was created almost from scratch during the 19th century textile industry boom to house textile mills , their owners and their workers , and rapidly grew to become an important industrial and commerce centre .
label: case amod amod amod amod obl punct nsubj acl amod obj punct nsubj aux root advmod case obl case det amod compound compound compound obl mark advcl compound obj punct nmod conj cc nmod conj punct cc advmod conj mark xcomp det amod amod cc conj xcomp punct

text: In recent years , Łódź has been battling rising unemployment and youth migration resulting from the failing textile industry and is repositioning itself as a hub for design and creative industries .
label: case amod obl punct nsubj aux aux root amod obj cc compound conj acl case det amod compound obl cc aux conj obj case det obl case nmod cc amod conj punct

text: Owing to its history , Łódź has an impressive collection of residential , commercial and industrial 19th - century architecture including some of Europe 's largest factory buildings , now mostly repurposed as shopping centres or lofts .
label: advcl case nmod obl punct nsubj root det amod obj case amod punct conj cc conj amod punct compound nmod case nmod case nmod case amod compound nmod punct advmod advmod acl case compound obl cc conj punct

text: Recent local investment and a long - standing cultural scene ensures there is always something more to do than just sightseeing or shopping , with the city hosting some of the best museums and art galleries in the country .
label: amod amod nsubj cc det advmod punct amod amod conj root expl ccomp advmod nsubj amod mark acl case advmod obl cc conj punct mark det nsubj advcl obj case det amod nmod cc compound conj case det obl punct

text: The close proximity of Warsaw and Łódź 's location at the crossroads of the Polish motorway system make it an ideal destination for a day trip or longer city break .
label: det amod nsubj case nmod cc nmod case conj case det nmod case det amod compound nmod root obj det amod xcomp case det compound nmod cc amod compound conj punct

text: Understand
label: root

text: Historic fire station in Księży Młyn area
label: amod compound root case compound compound nmod

text: Name and history
label: root cc conj

text: The origin of the city 's name is unknown , however , the word łódź translates to " boat " in English .
label: det nsubj case det nmod case nmod cop root punct advmod punct det nsubj appos parataxis case punct obl punct case obl punct

text: This is referred to in the emblem and when you hear the dwellers of Łódź ( łodzianin ( man ) łodzianka ( woman ) łodzianie ( plural ) ) calling themselves " the boat people " .
label: nsubj aux root obl case det obl cc advmod nsubj conj det obj case nmod punct appos punct parataxis punct conj punct parataxis punct conj punct parataxis punct punct xcomp obj punct det compound xcomp punct punct

text: A settlement on the area of present - day Łódź was established in the 14th century and in 1423 it was granted a town charter , along with the right to have a marketplace .
label: det nsubj case det nmod case amod punct compound nmod aux root case det amod obl cc case obl nsubj aux conj det compound obj punct advmod case det obl mark acl det obj punct

text: However , the real development of Łódź started with the industrial era at the beginning of the 19th century when the city was chosen to be the heart of the rapidly - growing textile industry .
label: advmod punct det amod nsubj case nmod root case det amod obl case det obl case det amod nmod advmod det nsubj aux advcl mark cop det xcomp case det advmod punct amod compound nmod punct

text: The population of Łódź soared from some 4,000 people in the 1830s and 40,000 in 1865 to over 300,000 inhabitants at the turn of the century , which was an unprecedented growth on a worldwide scale .
label: det nsubj case nmod root case advmod nummod obl case det obl cc conj case obl case advmod nummod obl case det obl case det nmod punct nsubj cop det amod acl case det amod nmod punct

text: The rapid development of Łódź in the second half of the 19th century was brought about by the rise of enormous industrialist fortunes .
label: det amod nsubj case nmod case det amod nmod case det amod nmod aux root compound case det obl case amod compound nmod punct

text: New inhabitants , craftsmen and merchants came to Łódź ; markets and town fairs came to life .
label: amod nsubj punct conj cc conj root case obl punct nsubj cc compound conj parataxis case obl punct

text: The profits obtained from prosperous textile mills opened up practically unlimited possibilities for their owners .
label: det nsubj acl case amod compound obl root compound advmod amod obj case nmod obl punct

text: The city residences became expressions of the riches and power of the local tycoons .
label: det compound nsubj root xcomp case det nmod cc conj case det amod nmod punct

text: They were usually situated next to the owner 's factory .
label: nsubj aux advmod root advmod case det nmod case obl punct

text: Ever since the industrial revolution brought a massive influx of workforce , Łódź had been a city almost equally divided between four cultures - Polish , Jewish , German and Russian .
label: advmod mark det amod nsubj advcl det amod obj case nmod punct nsubj aux cop det root advmod advmod acl case nummod obl punct appos punct conj punct conj cc conj punct

text: The day before the outbreak of World War II , Łódź was inhabited by approximately 672,000 people , among whom 35 % were of Jewish faith and some 15 % were ethnic German .
label: det obl case det nmod case compound nmod dep punct nsubj aux root case advmod nummod obl punct case nmod nummod nsubj cop case amod acl cc advmod nummod nsubj cop amod conj punct

text: Andrzej Wajda 's movie , Promised Land based on a novel by the Nobel laureate Władysław Reymont , depicts those times and is a worthwhile introduction to the city 's bustling history .
label: nmod flat case nsubj punct amod appos acl case det obl case det compound nmod appos flat punct root det obj cc cop det amod conj case det nmod case amod nmod punct

text: During the Nazi occupation , Łódź was incorporated directly into the Third Reich .
label: case det amod obl punct nsubj aux root advmod case det compound obl punct

text: The city was renamed to Litzmannstadt , and Piotrkowska Street was called Adolf - Hitler - Strasse .
label: det nsubj aux root case obl punct cc nsubj flat aux conj compound punct flat punct xcomp punct

text: The Jewish community was practically wiped out , and many others lost their lives .
label: det amod nsubj aux advmod root compound punct cc amod nsubj conj nmod obj punct

text: Although the city was not destroyed in the aftermath , the material losses were serious as the machinery , raw materials and finished goods were taken away by the fleeing Nazis .
label: mark det nsubj aux advmod advcl case det obl punct det compound nsubj cop root mark det nsubj punct amod conj cc amod conj aux advcl advmod case det amod obl punct

text: The day before the liberation , about 80,000 Germans left Łódź in panic .
label: det obl case det nmod punct advmod nummod nsubj root obj case obl punct

text: At the beginning of 1945 , the population was estimated at 300,000 .
label: case det obl case nmod punct det nsubj aux root case obl punct

text: Plac Wolności
label: root compound

text: Łódź today
label: root nmod

text: Since the fall of communism in Poland , Łódź has not enjoyed the rapid economic growth cities like Kraków , Warsaw and Wrocław have experienced , and has had to endure the fall of much of its textile industry , rising unemployment and emigration ( within Poland and abroad ) .
label: case det obl case nmod case nmod punct nsubj aux advmod root det amod amod obj nsubj case nmod punct conj cc conj aux acl punct cc aux conj mark xcomp det obj case nmod case nmod amod obl punct amod conj cc conj punct case nmod cc conj punct punct

text: This led to further dilapidation of the investment - starved city , and many of its streets and buildings show profound signs of neglect .
label: nsubj root case amod obl case det compound punct amod nmod punct cc nsubj case nmod obl cc conj conj amod obj case nmod punct

text: At first glance , for a city of 760,000 and agglomeration of 1.428,000 , there does not seem to be much to see .
label: case amod obl punct case det obl case nmod cc conj case nmod punct expl aux advmod root mark xcomp nsubj mark acl punct

text: However , the situation is rapidly changing now with Łódź campaigning and redesigning itself as an up - and - coming destination .
label: advmod punct det nsubj aux advmod root advmod mark nsubj advcl cc conj obj case det amod punct cc punct conj obl punct

text: To accomplish this , Łódź has been capitalizing on its film history - Łódź is jokingly referred to as the " HollyŁódź " of Poland and hosts several film festivals and many other cultural events .
label: mark advcl obj punct nsubj aux aux root case nmod compound obl punct nsubj aux advmod parataxis obl case det punct obl punct case nmod cc conj amod compound obj cc amod amod amod conj punct

text: Łódź today may not have the glitz and glamour of its heyday ; however , there is a certain charm to Łódź in its partially renovated façades and leitmotivs , not to mention its grand artistic traditions .
label: nsubj obl aux advmod root det obj cc conj case nmod nmod punct advmod punct expl parataxis det amod nsubj case obl case nmod advmod amod obl cc conj punct advmod mark advcl nmod amod amod obj punct

text: Mérida
label: root

text: Mérida is the capital of the state of Yucatán in Mexico .
label: nsubj cop det root case det nmod case nmod case nmod punct

text: It has a population of about 750,000 , and is the largest city in the Yucatán Peninsula .
label: nsubj root det obj case advmod nmod punct cc cop det amod conj case det amod nmod punct

text: Catedral de San Ildefonso
label: root flat flat flat

text: Zócalo or Main Plaza , with the Cathedral in the distance
label: root cc amod conj punct case det nmod case det nmod

text: Understand
label: root

text: Mérida is a city of contrasts .
label: nsubj cop det root case nmod punct

text: You will find elegant hotels , restaurants and malls in the northern part of the city .
label: nsubj aux root amod obj punct conj cc conj case det amod nmod case det nmod punct

text: Downtown , there are hotels and restaurants to suit every budget .
label: obl punct expl root nsubj cc conj mark acl det obj punct

text: A large central market and numerous small shops are found all around the main plaza .
label: det amod amod nsubj cc amod amod conj aux root advmod case det amod obl punct

text: Mérida has a rich cultural life which also reflects its diversity .
label: nsubj root det amod amod obj nsubj advmod acl nmod obj punct

text: Many free concerts , performances and other events are held daily .
label: amod amod nsubj punct conj cc amod conj aux root advmod punct

text: The city was founded by the Spanish conquistadors in the 1540s on top of a centuries - old Maya city called T'ho .
label: det nsubj aux root case det amod obl case det nmod case obl case det compound punct amod compound nmod acl obj punct

text: The palatial home of the family of conquistador leader Montejo can still be seen on the south side of the Zócalo or main square .
label: det amod nsubj case det nmod case compound compound nmod aux advmod aux root case det compound obl case det nmod cc amod conj punct

text: Here and there bits of ancient Maya stonework can be seen reused in Spanish Colonial era buildings in the old part of town .
label: advmod cc conj nsubj case amod compound nmod aux aux root advcl case amod amod compound obl case det amod nmod case nmod punct

text: From the later 1800s to the 1920s Mérida enjoyed prosperous boom times fueled by the henequen or sisal plant harvest , which made Yucatán the rope maker to the world .
label: case det amod obl case det nmod nsubj root amod compound obj acl case det obl cc compound compound conj punct nsubj acl obj det compound xcomp case det nmod punct

text: Progressive Mérida had electric trams and street lights before Mexico City .
label: amod nsubj root amod obj cc compound conj case nmod flat punct

text: The wealthy constructed the grand Pasejo Montejo avenue north of the old town , inspired by the Champs - Élysées in Paris .
label: det nsubj root det amod compound flat obj advmod case det amod obl punct acl case det obl punct flat case obl punct

text: With the development of artificial twines the sisal boom ended , and Mérida slowed to a more sleepy provincial capital until development picked back up in the late 20th century .
label: case det obl case amod nmod det compound nsubj root punct cc nsubj conj case det advmod amod amod obl mark nsubj advcl advmod compound case det amod amod obl punct

text: The city 's ambiance is colonial and the climate is tropical .
label: det nmod case nsubj cop root cc det nsubj cop conj punct

text: The daytime temperature varies ; in January , it is about 24 ° C ( 75 ° F ) and in June , about 35 ° C ( 95 ° F ) .
label: det compound nsubj root punct case nmod punct nsubj cop advmod nummod parataxis compound punct nummod appos compound punct cc case nmod punct advmod nummod conj compound punct nummod appos compound punct punct

text: To beat the heat , most people are busiest in the mornings .
label: mark advcl det obj punct amod nsubj cop root case det obl punct

text: They have lunch and siesta , then go back to work for a few hours in the late afternoon .
label: nsubj root obj cc conj punct advmod conj advmod case obl case det amod obl case det amod nmod punct

text: The cool breezes from the Gulf of Mexico drift into Mérida in the evenings and this is when many of the residents spend their time outdoors .
label: det amod nsubj case det nmod case nmod root case obl case det obl cc nsubj conj advmod nsubj case det obl advcl nmod obj advmod punct

text: You can see them visiting and talking as they stroll along the streets , sit in the plazas or dine in the many sidewalk restaurants .
label: nsubj aux root obj xcomp cc conj mark nsubj advcl case det obl punct conj case det obl cc conj case det amod compound obl punct

text: From Mérida , it is easy to take day trips to a vast array of destinations : archaeological sites , ecological parks , typical villages , caves , beaches , colonial missions and more .
label: case obl punct expl cop root mark csubj compound obj case det amod obl case nmod punct amod conj punct amod conj punct amod conj punct conj punct conj punct amod conj cc conj punct

text: Take your time and really explore the Maya sites , walk for miles along the Gulf of Mexico , attend a village festival , photograph the wildlife , crawl through a cave or swim in a cenote .
label: root nmod obj cc advmod conj det compound obj punct conj case obl case det nmod case nmod punct conj det compound obj punct conj det obj punct conj case det obl cc conj case det obl punct

text: Tourist Information ( Turismo Mérida ) , email : turismo@merida.gob.mx .
label: compound root punct appos flat punct punct parataxis punct dep punct

text: The city maintains several tourist information offices , all of which can offer helpful information on accommodation , free maps , and bus connections .
label: det nsubj root amod compound compound obj punct nsubj case nmod aux acl amod obj case obl punct amod conj punct cc compound conj punct

text: All offices also have free copies of Yucatan Today , a helpful weekly Spanish - English publication listing all events in the city and the surrounding region .
label: det nsubj advmod root amod obj case nmod flat punct det amod amod compound punct amod appos acl det obj case det obl cc det amod conj punct

text: Phoenix
label: root

text: Phoenix is the capital of the state of Arizona as well as the most populous city in the American Southwest and sixth largest city in the United States .
label: nsubj cop det root case det nmod case nmod cc fixed fixed det advmod amod conj case det amod nmod cc advmod amod conj case det amod nmod punct

text: Founded in 1871 , it has become the region 's primary political , cultural , economic , and transportation center .
label: advcl case obl punct nsubj aux root det nmod case amod amod punct conj punct conj punct cc conj xcomp punct

text: At an elevation of 1100 ft ( 335 m ) , it is situated in the biologically unique Sonoran Desert .
label: case det obl case nummod nmod punct nummod appos punct punct nsubj aux root case det advmod amod compound obl punct

text: Over time it has merged with the neighboring cities of Scottsdale , Tempe , Glendale , Peoria , Chandler , and Gilbert to form the Greater Phoenix Metropolitan Area .
label: case obl nsubj aux root case det amod obl case nmod punct conj punct conj punct conj punct conj punct cc conj mark advcl det amod compound amod obj punct

text: Currently exurbs such as Apache Junction , Fountain Hills , Queen Creek , and Sun City are becoming part of this metropolitan area as well .
label: advmod nsubj case fixed compound nmod punct compound conj punct compound conj punct cc compound conj aux root xcomp case det amod nmod advmod fixed punct

text: Phoenix is extremely hot and dry in the summertime , so always have sunscreen with you !
label: nsubj cop advmod root cc conj case det obl punct advmod advmod parataxis obj case obl punct

text: Understand
label: root

text: Why would anybody want to start a city in the middle of a desert ?
label: advmod aux nsubj root mark xcomp det obj case det obl case det nmod punct

text: The answer is , surprisingly , agriculture .
label: det nsubj cop punct advmod punct root punct

text: The Salt and Verde Rivers of central Arizona were exploited for large - scale agriculture by Native Americans as early as the 11th century .
label: det compound cc conj nsubj case amod nmod aux root case amod punct compound obl case amod obl advmod advmod case det amod obl punct

text: The area that now encompasses Phoenix was a center of the Hohokam culture , which built large canal systems and a network of towns and villages , whose remains may be viewed in the city to this day .
label: det nsubj nsubj advmod acl obj cop det root case det compound nmod punct nsubj acl amod compound obj cc det conj case nmod cc conj punct nmod nsubj aux aux acl case det obl case det obl punct

text: White settlers discovered the remnants of the Hohokam culture in the 19th century .
label: amod nsubj root det obj case det compound nmod case det amod obl punct

text: The city 's name reflects its history as a city " reborn from the ashes " of the previous settlement .
label: det nmod case nsubj root nmod obj case det obl punct amod case det obl punct case det amod nmod punct

text: European - American settlement of the area commenced in the 1860s , and in 1911 the completion of the first of several large reservoirs in the mountains north and east of Phoenix insured its success as a center for irrigation - based agriculture .
label: amod punct amod nsubj case det nmod root case det obl punct cc case obl det nsubj case det nmod case amod amod obl case det nmod advmod cc conj case obl conj nmod obj case det nmod case compound punct amod nmod punct

text: Many tens of thousands of acres were planted in citrus and cotton and other crops , and for many years , intensive , year - round irrigated agriculture formed the basis of the economy .
label: amod nsubj case nmod case nmod aux root case obl cc conj cc amod conj punct cc case amod obl punct amod punct compound punct amod amod nsubj conj det obj case det nmod punct

text: Recent years are seeing a revival , and trendy hotels , bars , shops and restaurants are making it a place to be again .
label: amod nsubj aux root det obj punct cc amod nsubj punct conj punct conj cc conj aux conj obj det xcomp mark acl advmod punct

text: Warm and sunny winter weather also ensured a thriving tourism industry , and encouraged many Easterners and Midwesterners to relocate to Phoenix .
label: nsubj cc amod compound conj advmod root det amod compound obj punct cc conj amod obj cc conj mark xcomp case obl punct

text: High - tech industry began to flourish after World War II , and since that time the growth of Phoenix has been explosive .
label: amod punct compound nsubj root mark xcomp case compound obl dep punct cc case det obl det nsubj case nmod aux cop conj punct

text: As a result , a population of just over 100,000 in 1950 has given way to a 2014 estimate of 1,537,058 ( with the metro area estimated at 4,489,109 ) .
label: case det obl punct det nsubj case advmod advmod nmod case nmod aux root obj case det compound obl case nmod punct case det compound nmod acl case obl punct punct

text: Climate
label: root

text: Phoenix has an arid climate with long , hot summers and very mild winters .
label: nsubj root det amod obj case amod punct amod nmod cc advmod amod conj punct

text: It has the highest average temperature of any metropolitan area in the States .
label: nsubj root det amod amod obj case det amod nmod case det nmod punct

text: The weather varies enormously from one season to the next .
label: det nsubj root advmod case nummod obl case det nmod punct

text: While it 's not as cold as in the northern states during the winter , it does freeze sometimes , and temperatures in the 30s ° F ( that 's around or slightly above 0 ° C ) are not unheard of .
label: mark nsubj cop advmod advmod advcl mark case det amod advcl case det obl punct nsubj aux root advmod punct cc nsubj case det compound nmod compound punct nsubj cop advmod cc advmod conj nummod parataxis compound punct cop advmod conj obl punct

text: In the summer , very hot and dry heat is the norm .
label: case det nmod punct advmod amod cc conj nsubj cop det root punct

text: On the hottest days , it can get up to 115 ° F ( 46 ° C ) or more .
label: case det amod obl punct nsubj aux root compound case nummod obl compound punct nummod appos compound punct cc conj punct

text: Monsoon rains with lightning occur regularly from July to September during the late afternoon and evening , occasionally overnight also .
label: compound nsubj case nmod root advmod case obl case obl case det amod obl cc conj punct advmod advmod advmod punct

text: April is the most ideal month .
label: nsubj cop det advmod amod root punct

text: In some neighborhoods , cicada insects make loud sounds from sunset to sunrise .
label: case det obl punct compound nsubj root amod obj case obl case obl punct

text: Talk
label: root

text: English is the dominant language in Phoenix .
label: nsubj cop det amod root case nmod punct

text: However , like much of the Southwest with a large Hispanic population , Spanish is very widely spoken in Phoenix .
label: advmod punct case obl case det obl case det amod amod nmod punct nsubj aux advmod advmod root case obl punct

text: Spanish is a language often used for day - to - day discourse in many places , although English is the language of preference , especially when dealing with businesses and government .
label: nsubj cop det root advmod acl case compound punct case punct nmod obl case amod obl punct mark nsubj cop det advcl case nmod punct advmod advmod advcl case obl cc conj punct

text: Get in
label: root advmod

text: By plane
label: case root

text: Wikimedia Maps
label: compound root

text: Phoenix Sky Harbor International Airport ( IATA : PHX ) +1602275-4958 is the main air gateway to Arizona .
label: compound compound compound amod nsubj punct dep punct appos punct dep cop det amod compound root case nmod punct

text: It is at the southeast end of Downtown .
label: nsubj cop case det amod root case nmod punct

text: It is a hub for American Airlines and Southwest Airlines .
label: nsubj cop det root case amod nmod cc compound conj punct

text: Terminals are numbered from 2 - 4 .
label: nsubj aux root case obl case obl punct

text: There is no Terminal 1 .
label: expl root det nsubj dep punct

text: Terminal 2 : Alaska ( Gates 10 & 11 ) , Great Lakes ( Gates C & D ) , Spirit , Sun Country , United
label: root dep punct dep punct appos dep cc conj punct punct amod conj punct appos dep cc conj punct punct conj punct compound conj punct conj

text: Terminal 3 : Delta , Frontier , Hawaiian , JetBlue
label: root dep punct dep punct conj punct conj punct conj

text: Terminal 4 : Aeroméxico , Air Canada , American , British Airways , Southwest , Volaris , WestJet
label: root dep punct dep punct conj flat punct conj punct amod conj punct conj punct conj punct conj

text: Valley Metro #13 goes west to S 75th Ave along S Buckeye ( via Greyhound depot ) from Terminal 2 .
label: compound compound nsubj root advmod case compound amod obl case obl flat punct case compound obl punct case obl dep punct

text: Likewise one can take the PHX skytrain over to the nearby 44th & Washington St Station to catch the #1 ( west to the downtown Central Station and Priest & Washington in Tempe to the east along Washington St ) ; #44 bus ( north to the Desert Ridge Marriott Resort in Deer Valley along N 44th St & Tatum ) ; and the light rail ( east to Tempe & Mesa and to Midtown ( along Central Ave ) via downtown in the other direction ) .
label: advmod nsubj aux root det compound obj advmod case det amod compound cc compound conj obl mark advcl det obj punct advmod case det amod amod nmod cc conj cc conj case nmod case det nmod case compound nmod punct punct compound conj punct advmod case det compound compound compound nmod case compound nmod case compound compound nmod cc conj punct punct cc det amod conj punct advmod case nmod cc conj cc case conj punct case amod obl punct case obl case det amod obl punct punct

text: Understand
label: root

text: Due to its remarkable biodiversity , with over a third of the local plant species found nowhere else , Socotra has been designated a UNESCO World Heritage Site .
label: case fixed nmod amod obl punct case advmod det nmod case det amod compound nmod acl advmod advmod punct nsubj aux aux root det compound compound compound xcomp punct

text: With over 40,000 inhabitants , though , it 's not just a nature reserve .
label: case advmod nummod nmod punct advmod punct nsubj cop advmod advmod det compound root punct

text: The Island is new to tourism , so if you are looking for a luxurious vacation this is not the right destination .
label: det nsubj cop root case obl punct advmod mark nsubj aux advcl case det amod obl nsubj cop advmod det amod parataxis punct

text: However , Socotra is a perfect destination for the adventurous and nature loving travelers .
label: advmod punct nsubj cop det amod root case det nmod cc compound amod conj punct

text: Socotra takes pride in their eco - tourism and values their spectacular plant and wildlife that may sometimes be only found on this island .
label: nsubj root obj case nmod compound punct obl cc conj nmod amod obj cc conj nsubj aux advmod aux advmod acl case det obl punct

text: Although the lodging and facilities may not be the same as more modern and developed locations , Socotra is a beautiful and magnificent destination choice .
label: mark det nsubj cc conj aux advmod cop det advcl case advmod amod cc conj obl punct nsubj cop det amod cc conj compound root punct

text: Great care is shown to both guests and the environment .
label: amod nsubj aux root case cc obl cc det conj punct

text: Socotra is an eco - tourism system with limited infrastructure and new to the international tourist market , and therefore the hotel accommodations are not quite like other destinations .
label: nsubj cop det compound punct compound root case amod nmod cc conj case det amod compound obl punct cc advmod det compound conj cop advmod advmod case amod obl punct

text: However there are four hotels in Hadibo : Taj Socotra Hotel , Hafijj Hotel , Socotra Hotel , and Summer land Hotel .
label: advmod expl root nummod nsubj case nmod punct compound compound dep punct compound conj punct compound conj punct cc compound compound conj punct

text: These hotels may not be the most luxerious , but they do provide air - conditionting , televisions , and refrigerators in all of the rooms .
label: det root aux advmod cop det advmod amod punct cc nsubj aux conj compound punct obj punct conj punct cc conj case obl case det nmod punct

text: Most of the rooms at these hotels have their own bathroom , but there are a few rooms at the Hafijj Hotel and Socotra Hotel that must share bathrooms .
label: nsubj case det obl case det nmod root nmod amod obj punct cc expl conj det amod nsubj case det compound nmod cc compound conj nsubj aux acl obj punct

text: Fortunately , there is a restaurant in each of the hotels with simple yet delicious cuisine .
label: advmod punct expl root det nsubj case nmod case det nmod case amod cc conj nmod punct

text: Considering Socotra is a fairly new eco - tourism destination , their facilities are decent .
label: advcl nsubj cop det advmod amod compound punct compound ccomp punct nmod nsubj cop root punct

text: In addition , there is also another hotel at the airport as well as multiple guest houses around the island .
label: case obl punct expl root advmod det nsubj case det nmod cc fixed fixed amod compound conj case det nmod punct

text: The most popular lodging is actually camping on the beaches .
label: det advmod amod nsubj aux advmod root case det obl punct

text: There are several campsites that allow tourists to barbeque on the beach with beautiful mountain views in the background .
label: expl root amod nsubj nsubj acl iobj mark xcomp case det obl case amod compound nmod case det obl punct

text: Tourists can choose to purchase camping tour packages which include a driver or guide that will show tourists around the beaches as well as provide meals during their stay .
label: nsubj aux root mark xcomp compound compound obj nsubj acl det obj cc conj nsubj aux acl iobj case det nmod cc fixed fixed conj obj case nmod obl punct

text: It is a fantastic way to enjoy the beauty and wildlife of the island .
label: nsubj cop det amod root mark acl det obj cc conj case det nmod punct

text: A runway that provides fairly regular airline transportation was only constructed in 1999 .
label: det nsubj nsubj acl advmod amod compound obj aux advmod root case obl punct

text: Like everything else , infrastructure and transportation has only just begun in recent years .
label: case obl advmod punct nsubj cc conj aux advmod advmod root case amod obl punct

text: There are also plans for new harbor facilities that will allow fisherman to sell and catch more easily and make importing food and fuel simpler .
label: expl root advmod nsubj case amod compound nmod nsubj aux acl iobj mark xcomp cc conj advmod advmod cc conj xcomp obj cc conj xcomp punct

text: In addition , there are also two information centers located at the airport and Hadibo .
label: case obl punct expl root advmod nummod compound nsubj acl case det obl cc conj punct

text: When to go : Climate is an important consideration .
label: root mark acl punct nsubj cop det amod parataxis punct

text: And this depends on your interest .
label: cc nsubj root case nmod obl punct

text: Nature enthusiasts should go from early October to late April .
label: compound nsubj aux root case amod obl case amod obl punct

text: The monsoon occurs in July till mid-August ( during July in the south east and south west of the island , wind surfing activity can be arranged ) .
label: det nsubj root case obl case obl punct case nmod case det compound nmod cc compound conj case det nmod punct compound compound nsubj aux aux dep punct punct

text: Generally , wildlife and natural viewing is best from the end of January through May .
label: advmod punct nsubj cc amod conj cop root case det obl case nmod case obl punct

text: Get in
label: root advmod

text: By plane
label: case root

text: Dixam , in the centre of the island
label: root punct case det nmod case det nmod

text: There are flights from Sana'a via Al Mukalla .
label: expl root nsubj case nmod case nmod flat punct

text: Yemenia Airlines offers one flight per week on Thursday morning .
label: compound nsubj root nummod obj case nmod case nmod obl punct

text: Felix Airways offers two flights per week on Wednesday afternoon and Saturday morning .
label: compound nsubj root nummod obj case nmod case compound nmod cc conj obl punct

text: Flight durations are almost three hours .
label: compound nsubj cop advmod nummod root punct

text: There are also flights from Sharjah via Al Mukalla .
label: expl root advmod nsubj case nmod case nmod flat punct

text: Get around
label: root advmod

text: There is a public bus from the airport to Hadibo and from Hadibo to Qalansia .
label: expl root det amod nsubj case det nmod case nmod cc case conj case orphan punct

text: Beside these two buses , there is no public transport , but car rental with driver is available .
label: case det nummod obl punct expl root det amod nsubj punct cc compound conj case nmod cop amod punct

text: There is a lot of walking and hiking along with camel back rides available .
label: expl root det nsubj case nmod cc conj advmod mark compound compound nsubj advcl punct

text: See
label: root

text: Socotra is considered the jewel of biodiversity in the Arabian Sea .
label: nsubj aux root det xcomp case nmod case det compound obl punct

text: Although the region is small , it is characterized by unique land and marine biodiversity .
label: mark det nsubj cop advcl punct nsubj aux root case amod obl cc amod conj punct

text: The interior of the island is dominated by the beautiful and green Hagghier mountains and limestone plateau .
label: det nsubj case det nmod aux root case det amod cc conj compound obl cc compound conj punct

text: While on the outer coastline , breathtaking natural beaches have pure white sand dunes and palm trees .
label: mark case det amod advcl punct amod amod nsubj root amod amod compound obj cc compound conj punct

text: Socotra Island is very rich and is home to many rare spectacular species of reefs , fish , birds , plants , and trees which are not found anywhere else in the world .
label: compound nsubj cop advmod root cc cop conj case amod amod amod nmod case nmod punct conj punct conj punct conj punct cc conj nsubj aux advmod acl advmod advmod case det obl punct

text: The limestone plateau and the Hagghier Mountains are the richest areas for endemic plant species , but endemics are found throughout the island in every type of vegetation .
label: det compound nsubj cc det compound conj cop det amod root case amod compound nmod punct cc nsubj aux conj case det obl case det nmod case nmod punct

text: One of the most famous plants is the dragon 's blood tree “ dracaena cinnabara ” which exists only on Socotra and nowhere else on the Earth .
label: nsubj case det advmod amod nmod cop det nmod case compound root punct compound appos punct nsubj acl advmod case obl cc advmod conj case det obl punct

text: The tree got its name because if any damage is made to the bark then a dark red liquid oozes out .
label: det nsubj root nmod obj mark mark det nsubj aux advcl case det obl advmod det amod amod nsubj advcl compound punct

text: The dragon 's blood tree thrives in Socotra 's arid climate
label: det nmod case compound nsubj root case nmod case amod obl

text: There is also the Desert Rose ( adenium obesium ) which looks like a blooming elephant leg .
label: expl root advmod det compound nsubj punct compound dep punct nsubj acl case det amod compound obl punct

text: Also found in Socotra 's landscape is the ever - strange and extremely rare Cucumber Tree .
label: advmod csubj case nmod case obl cop det advmod punct amod cc advmod conj compound root punct

text: In addition there are over 120 species of birds and about 190 species of butterflies .
label: case obl expl root case nummod obl case nmod cc advmod nummod conj case nmod punct

text: There is so much beauty all around the island , it is difficult not the appreciate to magnificent scenery and wildlife .
label: expl root advmod amod nsubj advmod case det obl punct expl cop advcl advmod mark csubj det amod obj cc conj punct

text: Sydfynske Øhav
label: root flat

text: Sydfynske Øhav , the South Funen Archipelago , is located south of the Danish island of Funen , comprising 55 islands and islets , at the mouth of the Baltic Sea , with a bit more than 20,000 inhabitants in total .
label: nsubj flat punct det compound compound appos punct aux root advmod case det amod obl case nmod punct acl nummod obj cc conj punct case det nmod case det amod nmod punct case det obl advmod fixed nummod obl case nmod punct

text: It is one of Denmark 's most scenic areas , and should be a top destination of anyone taking the time to explore Denmark outside the capital .
label: nsubj cop root case nmod case advmod amod nmod punct cc aux cop det amod conj case nmod acl det obj mark advcl obj case det obl punct

text: Understand
label: root

text: The islands were formed during the last ice age , by ice sliding over the area from the south , only the ancient hilltops was spared from submersion , and forms the many islands and islets peaking above the sea everywhere .
label: det nsubj aux root case det amod compound obl punct case obl acl case det obl case det obl punct advmod det amod nsubj aux parataxis case obl punct cc conj det amod obj cc conj acl case det obl advmod punct

text: The area has a milder climate than the country 's average , and because of this , is home to flora and fauna not seen anywhere else in Denmark .
label: det nsubj root det amod obj case det nmod case obl punct cc case fixed obl punct cop conj case obl cc conj advmod acl advmod advmod case obl punct

text: There are strong local movements to convert the area into a National Park .
label: expl root amod amod nsubj mark acl det obj case det amod obl punct

text: Flora & fauna
label: root cc conj

text: The area is one of the most diverse natural environments in the country , and is designated as an international wildlife protection area , as it is home of several rare and protected species .
label: det nsubj cop root case det advmod amod amod nmod case det nmod punct cc aux conj case det amod compound compound obl punct mark nsubj cop advcl case amod amod cc conj nmod punct

text: If you are interested ornithology the many shallow waters around the islands and islets is a treat with thousands of birds and colonies , one of the more notable is the Arctic Tern , which migrates to Antarctica and back ( nearly 40,000 kilometers ) every year .
label: mark nsubj cop advcl obl det amod amod nsubj case det nmod cc conj cop det root case nmod case nmod cc conj punct nsubj case det advmod nmod cop det amod parataxis punct nsubj acl case obl cc conj punct advmod nummod parataxis punct det obl punct

text: This is the longest regular migration by any known animal .
label: nsubj cop det amod amod root case det amod nmod punct

text: You also find Shore Crabs , Beach Otters and - rare for Denmark - Seals in the shallow waters and beaches .
label: nsubj advmod root compound obj punct compound conj cc punct parataxis case obl punct conj case det amod obl cc conj punct

text: On dry land , up on the many islands you can find badgers , stoats and several types of deer .
label: case amod obl punct advmod case det amod obl nsubj aux root obj punct conj cc amod conj case nmod punct

text: While possibly the most exciting animals are found beneath the water : the Harbour Porpoise , Denmark 's only resident whale population .
label: mark advmod det advmod amod nsubj aux root case det obl punct det compound parataxis punct nmod case amod amod compound appos punct

text: Get in
label: root advmod

text: Tåsinge , Langeland and a few of the smaller islands are connected with bridges , but to most of the islands transportation is done with tiny ferries ploughing through the island sea several times per day .
label: nsubj punct conj cc det conj case det amod nmod aux root case obl punct cc case obl case det obl nsubj aux conj case amod obl acl case det compound obl amod obl case nmod punct

text: The main entry points are Svendborg which is easily reach both by highway , bus and train - and Faaborg , which is best reached by bus from Odense .
label: det amod compound nsubj cop root nsubj aux advmod acl cc case obl punct conj cc conj punct cc conj punct nsubj aux advmod acl case obl case obl punct

text: From Langeland there are ferries to some other islands .
label: case obl expl root nsubj case det amod nmod punct

text: For easy reference ferries are listed under the individual islands .
label: case amod obl nsubj aux root case det amod obl punct

text: From Spodsbjerg on Langeland there is a ferry connection across the great belt to Tårs on Lolland .
label: case obl case nmod expl root det compound nsubj case det amod nmod case nmod case nmod punct

text: Get around
label: root advmod

text: Bringing a car to the islands serves little point but to rob your wallet of your hard earned cash , and you will be much better served by bringing or renting a bike in Svendborg or Faaborg , or just simply walk since the islands are generally small enough to make this feasible .
label: csubj det obj case det obl root amod obj mark mark acl nmod obj case nmod advmod amod obl punct cc nsubj aux aux advmod advmod conj mark advcl cc conj det obj case obl cc conj punct cc advmod advmod conj mark det nsubj cop advmod advcl advmod mark advcl obj xcomp punct

text: While some islands are connected by the same ferry , you will generally have to go back to the mainland to pass between the islands , if you rely on public transportation .
label: mark det nsubj aux advcl case det amod obl punct nsubj aux advmod root mark xcomp advmod case det obl mark advcl case det obl punct mark nsubj advcl case amod obl punct

text: However the best way to visit is really by boat , and there are plenty of options to do this .
label: advmod det amod nsubj mark acl cop advmod case root punct cc expl conj nsubj case nmod mark advcl obj punct

text: A popular option , and one good for your health too , is by sea kayak .
label: det amod nsubj punct cc conj amod case nmod obl advmod punct cop case compound root punct

text: There are several mapped routes in the area , but remember to be realistic about your fitness , as some of these routes take you a fair bit away from land .
label: expl root amod amod nsubj case det obl punct cc conj mark cop xcomp case nmod obl punct mark nsubj case det nmod advcl obj det amod obl advmod case obl punct

text: Several rental places also gives you the option of trained guide , which can both provide information about the sights you visit , and make sure you are safe .
label: amod compound nsubj advmod root iobj det obj case amod nmod punct nsubj aux cc acl obj case det nmod nsubj acl punct cc conj xcomp nsubj cop ccomp punct

text: It is also possible to rent Smack Dinghies with sails to ease the strain , or larger cattle barges if you are in a group at Øhavet 's smakkecenter on Strynø .
label: expl cop advmod root mark csubj compound obj case nmod mark advcl det obj punct cc amod compound conj mark nsubj cop case det orphan case nmod case orphan case nmod punct

text: Øhavets Smakkecenter , Strynø Brovej 12 ( Strynø ) , ☏ +4550981306 , ✉ info@smakkecenter.dk .
label: root flat punct list flat dep punct parataxis punct punct nsubj list punct nsubj list punct

text: Smack Dinghies : 225 DKK per hour / 825 DKK per day , Sea Kayak : 125 DKK per hour / 350 DKK per day , 1 hour instruction : 450 DKK .
label: compound nsubj punct nummod root case nmod cc nummod conj case nmod punct compound nsubj punct nummod conj case nmod cc nummod conj case nmod punct nummod compound nsubj punct nummod conj punct

text: Walk
label: root

text: The archipelago trail ( da : Øhavsstien ) is a 220 km hiking trail connected by ferries that circles the entire area .
label: det compound nsubj punct dep punct parataxis punct cop det nummod compound compound root acl case obl nsubj acl det amod obj punct

text: Completed in 2008 the trail is well marked with regular signs set on wooden poles .
label: advcl case obl det nsubj aux advmod root case amod obl acl case amod obl punct

text: Allow 4 - 7 days for the whole trail depending on experience and your desired pace , but it is also possible do to day trips along the route .
label: root nummod case nmod obj case det amod obl case fixed obl cc nmod amod conj punct cc expl cop advmod conj mark csubj compound obj case det obl punct

text: The local tourist offices in Svendborg and Faaborg can arrange baggage forwarding between your chosen camps or accommodations during peak season .
label: det amod compound nsubj case nmod cc conj aux root compound obj case nmod amod nmod cc conj case compound obl punct

text: Pre arranged package tours are also available from Travel Heels in Taasinge or Vagabond Tours in Tranekær , in cooperation with the local tourist authority .
label: amod goeswith compound nsubj cop advmod root case compound obl case nmod cc compound conj case nmod punct case obl case det amod compound nmod punct

text: If you choose to do the trek individually be mindful that substantial part of the trails crosses private property , so be considerate .

text: Birkholm Is only 1 km ² and home of a stubborn but loving 8 people , making it one of the smallest populated islands in the country , how long the island can sustain a full year population remains to be seen , but permanent life on the island will probably be a thing of the past in a not too distant future .
